atk-s0512a0:22_0: Saha saṃvaṇṇanaṃ yasmā, dharate satthu sāsanaṃ;
atk-s0512a0:24_0: Tasmā taṃ avalambitvā, ogāhitvā ca sabbaso;
atk-s0512a0:32_1: Atītāsu jātīsu satthu cariyānubhāvappakāsinī pariyattīti katvā,
atk-s0512a0:32_4: Atha vā yasmā sā pariyatti tasseva satthu purimajātīsu cariyānaṃ ānubhāvappakāsanena bhājanabhūtā,
atk-s0512a0:32_6: bhājanatthopi hi piṭakasaddo niddiṭṭho “atha puriso āgaccheyya,
atk-s0512a0:32_15: khuddakanikāyoti pañcasu nikāyesu khuddakanikāyapariyāpannaṃ. Suttaṃ, geyyaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:34_0: Caturāsīti sahassāni, ye me dhammā pavattino”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:35_0: Evaṃ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena paṭiññātesu caturāsītiyā dhammakkhandhasahassesu katipayadhammakkhandhasaṅgahaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:37_0: Etthantare yaṃ caritaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ bodhipācana”nti. –
atk-s0512a0:38_0: Ayaṃ gāthā ādi. Tassa ito pabhuti anukkamena atthasaṃvaṇṇanā hoti.
atk-s0512a0:41_2: santikenidānanti imāni tīṇi nidānāni dassetvā vuccamānā suṇantehi samudāgamato paṭṭhāya suṭṭhu viññātā nāma hoti.
atk-s0512a0:41_3: Tasmā tesaṃ nidānānaṃ ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-s0512a0:42_0: Dīpaṅkaradasabalassa pādamūlasmiñhi katābhinīhārassa mahābodhisattassa yāva tusitabhavane nibbatti,
atk-s0512a0:42_6: Imesu tīsu nidānesu yasmā dūrenidānaavidūrenidānāni sabbasādhāraṇāni,
atk-s0512a0:42_7: tasmā tāni jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vitthāritanayeneva vitthārato veditabbāni.
atk-s0512a0:42_8: Santikenidāne pana atthi visesoti tiṇṇampi nidānānaṃ ayamādito paṭṭhāya saṅkhepakathā.
atk-s0512a0:43_0: Dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato pādamūle katābhinīhāro bodhisattabhūto lokanātho attano abhinīhārānurūpaṃ samattiṃsapāramiyo pūretvā,
atk-s0512a0:43_3: tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto sakyarājakule paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā anantena parihārena mahantena sirisobhaggena
atk-s0512a0:43_4: vaḍḍhamāno anukkamena yobbanaṃ patvā ekūnatiṃse vayasmiṃ katamahābhinikkhamano,
atk-s0512a0:43_6: vesākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ bodhirukkhamūle nisinno sūriye anatthaṅgamiteyeva mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā purimayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā,
atk-s0512a0:44_1: āsāḷhipuṇṇamāyaṃ bārāṇasiṃ gantvā isipatane migadāye aññāsikoṇḍaññappamukhā aṭṭhārasa brahmakoṭiyo dhammāmataṃ pāyento,
atk-s0512a0:44_4: te sabbeva saṭṭhi arahante lokānuggahāya vissajjetvā,
atk-s0512a0:44_5: uruvelaṃ gacchanto kappāsikavanasaṇḍe tiṃsa bhaddavaggiye sotāpattiphalādīsu patiṭṭhāpetvā,
atk-s0512a0:44_6: uruvelaṃ gantvā aḍḍhuḍḍhāni pāṭihāriyasahassāni dassetvā uruvelakassapādayo sahassajaṭilaparivāre tebhātikajaṭile vinetvā,
atk-s0512a0:44_7: tehi parivuto rājagahanagarūpacāre laṭṭhivanuyyāne nisinno bimbisārappamukhe dvādasanahute brāhmaṇagahapatike sāsane otāretvā,
atk-s0512a0:45_0: Athevaṃ bhagavati veḷuvane viharante sāriputtamoggallānesu aggasāvakaṭṭhāne ṭhapitesu sāvakasannipāte jāte,
atk-s0512a0:45_1: suddhodanamahārājā “putto kira me chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ caritvā paramābhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko
atk-s0512a0:45_2: rājagahaṃ nissāya veḷuvane viharatī”ti sutvā dasapurisasahassaparivāre,
atk-s0512a0:45_3: anukkamena dasa amacce pesesi “puttaṃ me idhānetvā dassethā”ti.
atk-s0512a0:45_4: Tesu rājagahaṃ gantvā satthu dhammadesanāya arahatte patiṭṭhitesu kāḷudāyittherena rañño adhippāye ārocite
atk-s0512a0:45_5: bhagavā vīsatisahassakhīṇāsavaparivuto rājagahato nikkhamitvā saṭṭhiyojanaṃ kapilavatthuṃ dvīhi māsehi
atk-s0512a0:45_7: Sakyarājāno “amhākaṃ ñātiseṭṭhaṃ passissāmā”ti sannipatitvā nigrodhārāmaṃ bhagavato ca bhikkhusaṅghassa ca vasanayoggaṃ kāretvā,
atk-s0512a0:45_12: Bhagavā tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā mānaṃ bhañjitvā te dhammadesanāya bhājane kātuṃ abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:45_13: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā tesaṃ sīse pādapaṃsuṃ okiramāno viya,
atk-s0512a0:45_15: Rājā taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā “ayaṃ loke aggapuggalo”ti vandi.
atk-s0512a0:45_16: Raññā pana vandite te ṭhātuṃ nāma na sakkonti,
atk-s0512a0:46_0: Tadā kira bhagavā yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ karonto lokavivaraṇapāṭihāriyampi akāsi –
atk-s0512a0:46_1: yasmiṃ vattamāne manussā manussaloke yathāṭhitā yathānisinnāva cātumahārājikato paṭṭhāya yāva akaniṭṭhabhavanā
atk-s0512a0:46_2: sabbe deve tattha tattha attano bhavane kīḷante dibbānubhāvena jotante mahatiṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavante
atk-s0512a0:46_3: santāni samāpattisukhāni anubhavante aññamaññaṃ dhammaṃ sākacchante ca buddhānubhāvena attano maṃsacakkhunāva passanti.
atk-s0512a0:46_6: lokantaraniraye cāti tattha tattha mahādukkhaṃ anubhavamāne satte passanti.
atk-s0512a0:46_7: Dasasahassilokadhātuyaṃ devā mahaccadevānubhāvena tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā acchariyabbhutacittajātā pañjalikā namassamānā payirupāsanti,
atk-s0512a0:46_8: buddhaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttā gāthāyo udāharantā thomenti apphoṭenti hasanti pītisomanassaṃ pavedenti.
atk-s0512a0:47_0: “Bhummā mahārājikā tāvatiṃsā, yāmā ca devā tusitā ca nimmitā;
atk-s0512a0:48_0: Paranimmitā yepi ca brahmakāyikā, ānanditā vipulamakaṃsu ghosa”nti.
atk-s0512a0:49_0: Tadā hi dasabalo “atulaṃ attano buddhabalaṃ dassessāmī”ti mahākaruṇāya samussāhito ākāse dasasahassacakkavāḷasamāgame caṅkamaṃ māpetvā,
atk-s0512a0:49_1: dvādasayojanavitthate sabbaratanamaye caṅkame ṭhito yathāvuttaṃ devamanussanayanavihaṅgānaṃ ekanipātabhūtamacchariyaṃ
atk-s0512a0:49_3: puna tasmiṃ caṅkame caṅkamanto veneyyānaṃ ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ acinteyyānubhāvāya anopamāya buddhalīḷāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0512a0:50_0: “Na hete jānanti sadevamānusā, buddho ayaṃ kīdisako naruttamo;
atk-s0512a0:51_0: Iddhibalaṃ paññābalañca kīdisaṃ, buddhabalaṃ lokahitassa kīdisaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:52_0: “Na hete jānanti sadevamānusā, buddho ayaṃ edisako naruttamo;
atk-s0512a0:53_0: Iddhibalaṃ paññābalañca edisaṃ, buddhabalaṃ lokahitassa edisaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:56_0: Evaṃ tathāgate attano buddhānubhāvadīpanaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā dhammaṃ desente āyasmā dhammasenāpati
atk-s0512a0:56_1: sāriputto rājagahe gijjhakūṭapabbate ṭhito dibbacakkhunā passitvā,
atk-s0512a0:56_2: tena buddhānubhāvasandassanena acchariyabbhutacittajāto “handāhaṃ bhiyyosomattāya buddhānubhāvaṃ lokassa
atk-s0512a0:56_3: pākaṭaṃ karissāmī”ti sañjātaparivitakko attano parivārabhūtānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ tamatthaṃ ārocetvā
atk-s0512a0:56_4: iddhiyā ākāsena tāvadeva āgantvā saparivāro bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalamañjaliṃ
atk-s0512a0:56_5: sirasi paggayha tathāgatassa mahābhinīhāraṃ pāramiparipūraṇañca pucchi.
atk-s0512a0:56_6: Bhagavā taṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā tattha sannipatitamanussānañceva dasasahassacakkavāḷadevabrahmānañca attano
atk-s0512a0:60_0: Kamhi kāle tayā dhīra, patthitā bodhimuttamā.
atk-s0512a0:67_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā buddhavaṃse desite āyasmā dhammasenāpati “aho buddhānaṃ hetusampadā,
atk-s0512a0:67_3: dukkaraṃ vata bhagavatā kataṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ evaṃ pāramiyo pūrentena,
atk-s0512a0:67_5: yadidaṃ sabbaññutā balesu ca vasībhāvo evaṃmahiddhikatā evaṃmahānubhāvatā”ti buddhaguṇārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0512a0:67_6: So anaññasādhāraṇaṃ bhagavato sīlaṃ samādhi paññā vimutti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ hiriottappaṃ saddhāvīriyaṃ
atk-s0512a0:67_7: satisampajaññaṃ sīlavisuddhi diṭṭhivisuddhi samathavipassanā tīṇi kusalamūlāni tīṇi sucaritāni tayo sammāvitakkā
atk-s0512a0:67_8: tisso anavajjasaññāyo tisso dhātuyo cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā cattāro iddhipādā cattāro
atk-s0512a0:67_9: ariyamaggā cattāri ariyaphalāni catasso paṭisambhidā catuyoniparicchedakañāṇāni cattāro ariyavaṃsā cattāri
atk-s0512a0:67_10: vesārajjañāṇāni pañca padhāniyaṅgāni pañcaṅgiko sammāsamādhi pañcindriyāni pañca balāni pañca nissaraṇiyā
atk-s0512a0:67_11: dhātuyo pañca vimuttāyatanañāṇāni pañca vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā cha sāraṇīyā dhammā cha anussatiṭṭhānāni
atk-s0512a0:67_12: cha gāravā cha nissaraṇiyā dhātuyo cha satatavihārā cha anuttariyāni cha nibbedhabhāgiyā saññā cha abhiññā
atk-s0512a0:67_13: cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni satta aparihāniyā dhammā satta ariyadhanāni satta bojjhaṅgā satta sappurisadhammā
atk-s0512a0:67_14: satta niddasavatthūni satta saññā satta dakkhiṇeyyapuggaladesanā satta khīṇāsavabaladesanā aṭṭha paññāpaṭilābhahetudesanā
atk-s0512a0:67_15: aṭṭha sammattāni aṭṭha lokadhammātikkamā aṭṭha ārambhavatthūni aṭṭha akkhaṇadesanā aṭṭha mahāpurisavitakkā
atk-s0512a0:67_16: aṭṭha abhibhāyatanadesanā aṭṭha vimokkhā nava yonisomanasikāramūlakā dhammā nava pārisuddhipadhāniyaṅgāni
atk-s0512a0:67_17: nava sattāvāsadesanā nava āghātappaṭivinayā nava paññā nava nānattadesanā nava anupubbavihārā dasa nāthakaraṇā
atk-s0512a0:67_18: dhammā dasa kasiṇāyatanāni dasa kusalakammapathā dasa sammattāni dasa ariyavāsā dasa asekkhā dhammā dasa
atk-s0512a0:67_19: ratanāni dasa tathāgatabalāni ekādasa mettānisaṃsā dvādasa dhammacakkākārā terasa dhutaṅgaguṇā cuddasa
atk-s0512a0:67_20: buddhañāṇāni pañcadasa vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā soḷasavidhā ānāpānassatī soḷasa aparampariyā dhammā
atk-s0512a0:67_21: aṭṭhārasa buddhadhammā ekūnavīsati paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni catucattālīsa ñāṇavatthūni paññāsa udayabbayañāṇāni
atk-s0512a0:67_24: āsayādivibhāvanañāṇāni cāti evamādike acinteyyānubhāve buddhaguṇe dhammanvayato anugacchanto anussaranto
atk-s0512a0:67_27: Thero hi attanopi nāma guṇānaṃ antaṃ vā pamāṇaṃ vā āvajjento na passati,
atk-s0512a0:67_28: so bhagavato guṇānaṃ pamāṇaṃ kiṃ passissati?
atk-s0512a0:67_29: Yassa yassa hi paññā mahatī ñāṇaṃ visadaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:67_31: iti thero bhagavato guṇānaṃ pamāṇaṃ vā paricchedaṃ vā apassanto “mādisassa nāma sāvakapāramiñāṇe ṭhitassa buddhaguṇā ñāṇena paricchindituṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0512a0:67_34: kevalaṃ panete ekassa buddhañāṇasseva sabbaso gocarā, nāññesaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:67_35: Kathetuṃ pana sammāsambuddhehipi vitthārato na sakkāyevā”ti niṭṭhamagamāsi.
atk-s0512a0:68_0: “Buddhopi buddhassa bhaṇeyya vaṇṇaṃ, kappampi ce aññamabhāsamāno;
atk-s0512a0:69_0: Khīyetha kappo ciradīghamantare, vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassā”ti. ;
atk-s0512a0:70_0: Evaṃ buddhānaṃ guṇamahantataṃ nissāya uppannabalavapītisomanasso puna cintesi –
atk-s0512a0:70_1: “evarūpānaṃ nāma buddhaguṇānaṃ hetubhūtā buddhakārakā dhammā pāramiyo aho mahānubhāvā.
atk-s0512a0:70_2: Katamāsu nu kho jātīsu pāramitā paripācitā,
atk-s0512a0:70_4: handāhaṃ imamatthaṃ pucchanto evampi samudāgamato paṭṭhāya buddhānubhāvaṃ imassa sadevakassa lokassa pākaṭataraṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0512a0:70_5: So evaṃ cintetvā bhagavantaṃ imaṃ pañhaṃ apucchi –
atk-s0512a0:70_9: Athassa bhagavā tasmiṃ ratanacaṅkame tisandhipallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā yugandharapabbate bālasūriyo viya virocamāno nisinno “sāriputta,
atk-s0512a0:70_10: mayhaṃ buddhakārakā dhammā samādānato paṭṭhāya nirantaraṃ sakkaccakāritāya vīriyūpatthambhena ca sabbesu
atk-s0512a0:70_11: kappesu bhavato bhavaṃ jātito jātiṃ paripaccantāyeva ahesuṃ,
atk-s0512a0:70_12: imasmiṃ pana bhaddakappe imāsu jātīsu te paripakkā jātā”ti dassento “kappe ca satasahasse”tiādinā cariyāpiṭakaṃ
atk-s0512a0:70_14: Apare pana “ratanacaṅkame caṅkamanto devātidevo devabrahmādīhi pūjiyamāno nigrodhārāme otaritvā vīsatisahassakhīṇāsavaparivuto
atk-s0512a0:70_15: paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno bhagavā vuttanayeneva āyasmatā sāriputtena pucchito cariyāpiṭakaṃ desesī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0512a0:70_16: Ettāvatā dūrenidānaavidūrenidānāni saṅkhepato dassetvā cariyāpiṭakassa santikenidānaṃ vitthārato niddiṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:71_1: Idāni “kappe ca satasahasse”tiādinayappavattāya cariyāpiṭakapāḷiyā atthasaṃvaṇṇanā hoti.
atk-s0512a0:71_9: sāvakena saddhiṃ mantayamānā na jānimhā”tiādīsu paṭibhāge.
atk-s0512a0:71_15: tathāgato kappaṃ vā tiṭṭheyya kappāvasesaṃ vā”tiādīsu paramāyumhi.
atk-s0512a0:71_30: kappaṃ nirayamhi paccatī”ti ca ādīsu antarakappe.
atk-s0512a0:72_0: “Na kappayanti na purekkharonti, dhammāpi tesaṃ na paṭicchitāse;
atk-s0512a0:73_0: Na brāhmaṇo sīlavatena neyyo, pāraṅgato na pacceti tādī”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:74_1: Tathā hi vuttaṃ niddese “kappāti uddānato dve kappā taṇhākappo diṭṭhikappo”ti.
atk-s0512a0:75_2: ettakāni vassānīti vā ettakāni vassasatānīti vā ettakāni vassasahassānīti vā ettakāni vassasatasahassānīti
atk-s0512a0:75_3: vā saṃvaccharavasena gaṇetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā kevalaṃ sāsaparāsiupamādīhi kappetabbo parikappetabbaparimāṇoti attho.
atk-s0512a0:76_2: so na sukaro saṅkhātuṃ ‘ettakāni vassānī’ti vā ‘ettakāni vassasatānī’ti vā ‘ettakāni vassasahassānī’ti vā ‘ettakāni vassasatasahassānī’ti vā.
atk-s0512a0:76_7: yojanaṃ āyāmena yojanaṃ vitthārena yojanaṃ ubbedhena mahāsāsaparāsi.
atk-s0512a0:76_8: Tato vassasatassa vassasahassassa accayena ekamekaṃ sāsapaṃ uddhareyya,
atk-s0512a0:76_10: mahāsāsaparāsi iminā upakkamena parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gaccheyya,
atk-s0512a0:77_0: Svāyaṃ mahākappo saṃvaṭṭādivasena catuasaṅkhyeyyakappasaṅgaho. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0512a0:79_16: Tesu tīsu saṃvaṭṭesu yathākkamaṃ kappavināsakamahāmeghato yāva jālāya vā udakassa vā vātassa vā upacchedo idaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ saṃvaṭṭo nāma.
atk-s0512a0:80_7: Iti imāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni eko mahākappo hoti.
atk-s0512a0:81_4: Caturo ca asaṅkhiyeti etthāpi eseva nayo.
atk-s0512a0:81_5: Kassa pana asaṅkhiyeti aññassa avuttattā kappassa ca vuttattā pakaraṇato kappānanti ayamattho viññāyateva.
atk-s0512a0:81_6: Na hi vuttaṃ vajjetvā avuttassa kassaci gahaṇaṃ yuttanti. Ca-
atk-s0512a0:81_8: mahākappānaṃ caturo asaṅkhyeyye satasahasse ca mahākappeti ayañhettha attho.
atk-s0512a0:81_9: Asaṅkhiyeti ettha saṅkhātuṃ na sakkāti asaṅkhiyā,
atk-s0512a0:81_12: Te hi ekato paṭṭhāya mahābalakkhapariyosānāni ekūnasaṭṭhiṭṭhānāni vajjetvā dasamahābalakkhāni asaṅkhyeyyaṃ nāma,
atk-s0512a0:81_16: tassa asaṅkhyeyyabhāvābhāvato ekaṃ ṭhānantaraṃ asaṅkhyeyyañcāti viruddhametaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:81_17: Nanu ca asaṅkhyabhāvena asaṅkhyeyyattepi tassa catubbidhabhāvo na yujjatīti?
atk-s0512a0:82_0: Atīte kira ekasmiṃ kappe taṇhaṅkaro medhaṅkaro saraṇaṅkaro dīpaṅkaroti cattāro sammāsambuddhā anukkamena loke uppajjiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:82_1: Tesu dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato kāle amaravatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:82_2: Tattha sumedho nāma brāhmaṇo paṭivasati ubhato sujāto mātito ca pitito ca,
atk-s0512a0:82_3: saṃsuddhagahaṇiko yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho jātivādena,
atk-s0512a0:82_4: abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato.
atk-s0512a0:82_5: So aññaṃ kammaṃ akatvā brāhmaṇasippameva uggaṇhi.
atk-s0512a0:82_7: Athassa rāsivaḍḍhako amacco āyapotthakaṃ āharitvā suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttādibharite sāragabbhe vivaritvā “ettakaṃ te, kumāra,
atk-s0512a0:82_10: ettakaṃ te ayyakapayyakāna”nti yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā dhanaṃ ācikkhitvā “etaṃ dhanaṃ paṭipajjāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0512a0:82_12: “imaṃ evaṃ bahuṃ dhanaṃ saṃharitvā mayhaṃ mātāpitādayo paralokaṃ gacchantā ekakahāpaṇampi gahetvā na gatā,
atk-s0512a0:82_13: mayā pana gahetvā gamanakāraṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0512a0:82_14: So rañño ārocetvā nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā mahājanassa dānaṃ datvā himavantappadesaṃ gantvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0512a0:82_15: pabbajitvā sattāheneva aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca ca abhiññāyo nibbattetvā samāpattivihārehi viharati.
atk-s0512a0:83_0: Tasmiñca kāle dīpaṅkaradasabalo paramābhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko catūhi khīṇāsavasatasahassehi
atk-s0512a0:83_1: parivuto anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno rammavatīnagaraṃ nāma patvā tassa avidūre sudassanamahāvihāre paṭivasati.
atk-s0512a0:83_2: Rammavatīnagaravāsino “satthā kira amhākaṃ nagaraṃ patvā sudassanamahāvihāre paṭivasatī”ti sutvā gandhamālādihatthā
atk-s0512a0:83_3: satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā ekamantaṃ nisinnā dhammadesanaṃ sutvā svātanāya
atk-s0512a0:83_5: Te punadivase mahādānaṃ sajjetvā nagaraṃ alaṅkaritvā dasabalassa āgamanamaggaṃ haṭṭhatuṭṭhā sodhenti.
atk-s0512a0:84_0: Tasmiñca kāle sumedhatāpaso ākāsena gacchanto te haṭṭhatuṭṭhe manusse disvā “ambho,
atk-s0512a0:84_1: kassa tumhe imaṃ maggaṃ sodhethā”ti pucchi?
atk-s0512a0:84_2: Tehi “sammāsambuddhassa āgamanamaggaṃ sodhemā”ti vutte atītesu buddhesu katādhikārattā “buddho”ti vacanaṃ
atk-s0512a0:84_3: sutvā uppannapītisomanasso tāvadeva ākāsato oruyha “mayhampi okāsaṃ detha,
atk-s0512a0:84_4: ahampi sodhessāmī”ti tehi dassitaṃ okāsaṃ “kiñcāpi ahaṃ imaṃ iddhiyā sattaratanavicittaṃ katvā alaṅkarituṃ pahomi,
atk-s0512a0:84_5: ajja pana mayā kāyaveyyāvaccaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0512a0:84_6: kāyārahaṃ puññaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti cintetvā tiṇakacavarādayo nīharitvā paṃsuṃ āharitvā samaṃ karonto sodheti.
atk-s0512a0:84_7: Aniṭṭhiteyeva pana tassa padesassa sodhane dīpaṅkaro bhagavā mahānubhāvānaṃ chaḷabhiññānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:84_8: catūhi satasahassehi parivuto taṃ maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0512a0:84_9: Sumedhapaṇḍito “sammāsambuddho buddhasāvakā ca mā cikkhallaṃ akkamantū”ti attano vākacīrañca cammakhaṇḍañca
atk-s0512a0:84_10: jaṭākalāpañca pasāretvā sayañca yena bhagavā tena sīsaṃ katvā avakujjo nipajji.
atk-s0512a0:84_13: imassa bhagavato sāvako hutvā ajjeva kilese ghātessāmi.
atk-s0512a0:84_15: Yaṃnūnāhampi evarūpo sammāsambuddho hutvā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ saṃsāramahaṇṇavato tāreyya”nti.
atk-s0512a0:84_17: Atha bhagavā āgantvā tassa ussīsake ṭhatvā cittācāraṃ samijjhanabhāvañcassa ñatvā “ayaṃ ito kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:84_18: catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake gotamo nāma sammāsambuddho bhavissatī”ti sabbaṃ imaṃ bhagavato pavattiṃ
atk-s0512a0:85_0: Tato aparepi koṇḍaññabhagavantaṃ ādiṃ katvā anukkamena uppannā yāva kassapadasabalapariyosānā sammāsambuddhā
atk-s0512a0:85_2: Iti amhākaṃ bodhisattassa pāramiyo pūrentasseva catuvīsati sammāsambuddhā uppannā.
atk-s0512a0:85_7: Porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tamhā kappā paṭṭhāya sabbabuddhe dassetuṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a0:88_0: “Maṅgalo ca sumano ca, revato sobhito muni;
atk-s0512a0:92_0: “Tisso phusso ca sambuddho, vipassī sikhi vessabhū;
atk-s0512a0:97_0: Tattha dīpaṅkaradasabalassa ca koṇḍaññadasabalassa ca antare mahākappānaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ buddhasuñño loko ahosi,
atk-s0512a0:97_1: tathā bhagavato koṇḍaññassa ca bhagavato maṅgalassa ca antare,
atk-s0512a0:97_2: tathā bhagavato sobhitassa ca bhagavato anomadassissa ca antare,
atk-s0512a0:97_3: tathā bhagavato nāradassa ca bhagavato padumuttarassa ca antare.
atk-s0512a0:106_0: Evaṃ gaṇanātītatāya asaṅkhyeyyattepi catūsu ṭhānesu mahākappānaṃ gaṇanātikkamena “caturo ca asaṅkhiye”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:106_2: Yasmā pana padumuttaradasabalassa ca sumedhadasabalassa ca antare tiṃsakappasahassāni,
atk-s0512a0:106_3: sujātadasabalassa ca piyadassīdasabalassa ca antare navasahassādhikānaṃ kappānaṃ saṭṭhisahassāni dvāsītuttarāni aṭṭha ca satāni,
atk-s0512a0:106_4: dhammadassīdasabalassa ca siddhatthadasabalassa ca antare vīsati kappā,
atk-s0512a0:106_5: siddhatthadasabalassa ca tissadasabalassa ca antare eko kappo,
atk-s0512a0:106_6: bhagavato vipassissa ca bhagavato sikhissa ca antare saṭṭhi kappā,
atk-s0512a0:106_7: bhagavato ca vessabhussa bhagavato ca kakusandhassa antare tiṃsa kappā,
atk-s0512a0:106_8: iti padumuttaradasabalassa uppannakappato paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā tesaṃ tesaṃ buddhānaṃ uppannakappehi iminā ca bhaddakappena saddhiṃ satasahassamahākappā.
atk-s0512a0:106_10: Imasmiṃ panatthe vitthāriyamāne sabbaṃ buddhavaṃsapāḷiṃ āharitvā saṃvaṇṇetabbaṃ hotīti ativitthārabhīrukassa
atk-s0512a0:106_14: sopi aṭṭhasāliniyā dhammasaṅgahavaṇṇanāya jātakaṭṭhakathāya ca vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0512a0:109_0: Janā saṅgamma mantenti, mañca tañca kimantara”nti. –
atk-s0512a0:110_2: aññatarā itthī vijjantarikāya bhājanaṃ dhovantī”tiādīsu khaṇe,
atk-s0512a0:110_5: “Antarā ca gayaṃ antarā ca bodhi”ntiādīsu vivare.
atk-s0512a0:110_6: “Na upajjhāyassa bhaṇamānassa antarantarā kathā opātetabbā”tiādīsu vemajjhe.
atk-s0512a0:110_10: yasmiṃ mahākappe amhākaṃ bhagavā sumedhapaṇḍito hutvā dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato pādamūle –
atk-s0512a0:113_0: Evaṃ vuttehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ mahābhinīhāraṃ akāsi,
atk-s0512a0:113_3: yamhi cetasmiṃ bhaddakappe sabbaso pūritapāramī hutvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhi.
atk-s0512a0:113_4: Imesaṃ dvinnaṃ mahākappānaṃ antare yathāvuttaparicchede kālaviseseti.
atk-s0512a0:113_7: caturo ca asaṅkhiye”ti idañhi mahākappānaṃ paricchedato aparicchedato ca saṅkhyādassanaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:113_8: Sā kho panāyaṃ saṅkhyā saṅkhyeyyassa ādipariyosānaggahaṇaṃ vinā na sambhavatīti yattha bodhisambhārānamārambho
atk-s0512a0:113_9: yattha ca te pariyositā tadubhayampi avadhibhāvena “etthantare”ti ettha atthato dassitanti viññāyati.
atk-s0512a0:113_13: Nanu ca nippadesena tesaṃ apariyādānato abhividhi ca idha na sambhavatīti?
atk-s0512a0:114_1: sabbaṃ taṃ bodhipācananti ettha caritanti cariyā,
atk-s0512a0:114_14: Tattha padesato dvinnaṃ bodhisattānaṃ paccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānañca lokatthacariyā,
atk-s0512a0:114_16: Vuttañhetaṃ niddese “cariyāti aṭṭha cariyāyo iriyāpathacariyā āyatanacariyā”ti vitthāro.
atk-s0512a0:114_23: evampi paṭipannassa kusalā dhammā āyatantīti āyatanacariyāya carati,
atk-s0512a0:114_24: evampi paṭipanno visesamadhigacchatīti visesacariyāya caratī”ti yā imā aparāpi aṭṭha cariyā vuttā,
atk-s0512a0:114_28: Hetucariyāya eva pana idhādhippetattā maggacariyāpatticariyānaṃ idha anavarodho veditabbo.
atk-s0512a0:115_1: saddo sabbasabbaṃ āyatanasabbaṃ sakkāyasabbaṃ padesasabbanti catūsu atthesu dissati.
atk-s0512a0:115_2: Tathā hi “sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthamāgacchantī”tiādīsu sabbasabbasmiṃ.
atk-s0512a0:115_8: mano ceva dhammā cā”ti ettha āyatanasabbasmiṃ.
atk-s0512a0:116_1: “Bodhirukkhamūle paṭhamābhisambuddho”ti ca “antarā ca gayaṃ antarā ca bodhi”nti ca āgataṭṭhāne bujjhati etthāti rukkho bodhi.
atk-s0512a0:116_2: “Bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇa”nti āgataṭṭhāne cattāri ariyasaccāni bujjhati etenāti ariyamaggo bodhi.
atk-s0512a0:116_3: “Patvāna bodhiṃ amataṃ asaṅkhata”nti āgataṭṭhāne bujjhati etasmiṃ nimittabhūteti nibbānaṃ bodhi.
atk-s0512a0:116_4: “Pappoti bodhiṃ varabhūrimedhaso”ti āgataṭṭhāne sabbe dhamme sabbākārena bujjhati etenāti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ bodhi.
atk-s0512a0:116_11: taṃ sabbaṃ anavasesaṃ mahābodhiyā pācanaṃ sādhakaṃ nibbattakanti.
atk-s0512a0:116_13: Atha vā sabbanti etthantare yathāvuttakālaparicchede yaṃ caritaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:117_0: Tasso hi bodhisambhāresu bhāvanā sabbasambhārabhāvanā nirantarabhāvanā cirakālabhāvanā sakkaccabhāvanā cāti.
atk-s0512a0:117_2: caturo ca asaṅkhiye”ti iminā cirakālabhāvanā vuttā.
atk-s0512a0:117_4: tena paṭhame atthavikappe sabbaggahaṇena ca nirantarabhāvanā,
atk-s0512a0:117_5: dutiye atthavikappe sabbaṃ carita”nti iminā sabbasambhārabhāvanā,
atk-s0512a0:117_7: yathā taṃ caritaṃ sammāsambodhiṃ pāceti evaṃbhūtabhāvadīpanato.
atk-s0512a0:117_12: na hi mahābodhisattānaṃ mahābhinīhārato uddhaṃ bodhisambhārasambharaṇacittato aññaṃ cittaṃ nappavattatīti sakkā vattuṃ.
atk-s0512a0:117_15: na hi sabbāni tesaṃ kiriyamayacittāni bodhisambhārasambharaṇavaseneva pavattanti.
atk-s0512a0:117_19: tato paṭṭhāya yāva carimattabhāvā na sā nāma jāti upalabbhati,
atk-s0512a0:117_20: yā sabbena sabbaṃ bodhisambhārasambhatā na siyā antamaso dānapāramimattaṃ upādāya.
atk-s0512a0:117_22: Yāva ca te kammādīsu vasībhāvaṃ na pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0512a0:117_24: Yadā pana sabbaso kammādīsu vasībhāvappattā honti,
atk-s0512a0:117_25: atha tato paṭṭhāya nippadesato eva bodhisambhāresu samīhanaṃ sātaccakiriyā ca sampajjati.
atk-s0512a0:117_27: evaṃ yena yena bodhisattānaṃ tattha tattha yathādhippāyaṃ samijjhanaṃ sampajjatīti.
atk-s0512a0:117_28: Evametāya gāthāya bodhisambhāresu sabbasambhārabhāvanā cirakālabhāvanā nirantarabhāvanā sakkaccabhāvanā cāti catassopi bhāvanā pakāsitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0512a0:118_0: Tatra yasmā bodhisattacaritaṃ bodhisambhārā bodhicariyā aggayānaṃ pāramiyoti atthato ekaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:118_2: yasmā ca parato vibhāgena vakkhamānānaṃ dānapāramiādīnaṃ caritanti idaṃ avisesavacanaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:118_3: tasmā sabbabodhisambhāresu kosallajananatthaṃ pāramiyo idha saṃvaṇṇetabbā.
atk-s0512a0:119_1: Iti bhagavā attano bodhisattabhūmiyaṃ caritaṃ ārambhato paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā mahābodhiyā paripācanamevāti
atk-s0512a0:119_2: avisesato dassetvā idāni tassa paramukkaṃsagamanena atisayato bodhiparipācanabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ imasmiṃ
atk-s0512a0:120_0: Tattha atītakappeti ito purime purimatare vā sabbasmiṃ atikkante yathāvuttaparicchede mahākappe,
atk-s0512a0:120_10: bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjatī”ti ettha pana paṇītapaṇītatarāni sappinavanītādibhesajjāni bhavābhavāti adhippetāni.
atk-s0512a0:120_11: Sampattibhavesu paṇītatarā paṇītatamā bhavābhavātipi vadanti eva,
atk-s0512a0:120_12: tasmā idhāpi so eva attho veditabbo,
atk-s0512a0:120_13: khuddake ceva mahante ca bhavasminti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0512a0:124_1: Evaṃ bhagavā āyasmato sāriputtattherassa sadevamanussāya ca parisāya attano pubbacariyāya savane ussāhaṃ
atk-s0512a0:124_2: janetvā idāni taṃ pubbacaritaṃ bhavantarapaṭicchannaṃ hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya paccakkhaṃ karonto “yadā
atk-s0512a0:125_9: Viharāmīti dibbabrahmaariyaāneñjavihārehi samuppāditasukhavisesena iriyāpathavihārena sarīradukkhaṃ vicchinditvā harāmi attabhāvaṃ pavattemi.
atk-s0512a0:125_10: Akitti nāma tāpasoti evaṃnāmako tāpaso hutvā yadā ahaṃ tasmiṃ araññe viharāmīti attho.
atk-s0512a0:125_11: Satthā tadā attano akittitāpasabhāvaṃ dhammasenāpatissa vadati.
atk-s0512a0:126_0: Atīte kira imasmiṃyeva bhaddakappe bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte nāma rājini rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto asītikoṭivibhavassa
atk-s0512a0:126_5: So soḷasavassakāle takkasilaṃ gantvā sabbasippāni uggahetvā paccāgamāsi.
atk-s0512a0:126_7: So tesaṃ petakiccāni kāretvā katipayadivasātikkamena ratanāvalokanaṃ āyuttakapurisehi kārayamāno “ettakaṃ mattikaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:126_9: ettakaṃ pitāmaha”nti sutvā saṃviggamānaso hutvā “idaṃ dhanameva paññāyati,
atk-s0512a0:126_12: ahaṃ pana naṃ ādāya gamissāmī”ti rājānaṃ āpucchitvā bheriṃ carāpesi –
atk-s0512a0:127_0: So sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā dhane akhīyamāne “kiṃ me imāya dhanakīḷāya,
atk-s0512a0:127_1: atthikā gaṇhissantī”ti nivesanadvāraṃ vivaritvā hiraññasuvaṇṇādibharite sāragabbhe vivarāpetvā “dinnaṃyeva
atk-s0512a0:127_2: harantū”ti gehaṃ pahāya ñātiparivaṭṭassa paridevantassa bhaginiṃ gahetvā bārāṇasito nikkhamitvā nadiṃ
atk-s0512a0:127_3: uttaritvā dve tīṇi yojanāni gantvā pabbajitvā ramaṇīye bhūmibhāge paṇṇasālaṃ karitvā vasati.
atk-s0512a0:127_8: Tassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ sutvā bahū manussā gāmanigamarājadhānivāsino tassa guṇehi ākaḍḍhiyamānahadayā anupabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:127_15: mayā ekākinā viharituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā paramappicchabhāvato vivekaninnatāya ca kassaci ajānāpetvā
atk-s0512a0:127_16: ekakova nikkhamitvā anupubbena damiḷaraṭṭhaṃ patvā kāvīrapaṭṭanasamīpe uyyāne viharanto jhānābhiññāyo
atk-s0512a0:127_19: So taṃ jigucchanto chaḍḍetvā ākāsena gantvā kāradīpe otari.
atk-s0512a0:127_21: So tattha mahantaṃ kārarukkhaṃ upanissāya paṇṇasālaṃ māpetvā vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0512a0:127_22: Appicchatāya pana katthaci agantvā tassa rukkhassa phalakāle phalāni khādanto phale asati pattāni udakasittāni khādanto jhānasamāpattīhi vītināmesi.
atk-s0512a0:128_0: Tassa sīlatejena sakkassa paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0512a0:128_1: Sakko “ko nu kho maṃ imamhā ṭhānā cāvetukāmo”ti āvajjento paṇḍitaṃ disvā “kimatthaṃ nu kho ayaṃ tāpaso evaṃ dukkaraṃ tapaṃ carati,
atk-s0512a0:128_5: Ayañhi suvisuddhakāyavacīmanosamācāro jīvite nirapekkho udakasittāni kārapattāni khādati,
atk-s0512a0:128_6: sace sakkattaṃ pattheti attano sittāni kārapattāni mayhaṃ dassati, no ce,
atk-s0512a0:128_7: na dassatī”ti brāhmaṇavaṇṇena tassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0512a0:128_8: Bodhisattopi kārapattāni sedetvā “sītalībhūtāni khādissāmī”ti paṇṇasāladvāre nisīdi.
atk-s0512a0:128_9: Athassa purato sakko brāhmaṇarūpena bhikkhāya atthiko hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0512a0:128_12: cirassaṃ vata me yācako diṭṭho”ti somanassappatto hutvā “ajja mama manorathaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:128_13: dassāmī”ti pakkabhājaneneva ādāya gantvā dānapāramiṃ āvajjetvā attano asesetvāva tassa bhikkhābhājane pakkhipi.
atk-s0512a0:128_14: Sakko taṃ gahetvā thokaṃ gantvā antaradhāyi.
atk-s0512a0:128_15: Mahāsattopi tassa datvā puna pariyeṭṭhiṃ anāpajjitvā teneva pītisukhena vītināmesi.
atk-s0512a0:129_0: Dutiyadivase pana kārapattāni pacitvā “hiyyo dakkhiṇeyyaṃ alabhiṃ,
atk-s0512a0:129_1: ajja nu kho katha”nti paṇṇasāladvāre nisīdi.
atk-s0512a0:129_4: Tatiyadivase ca tatheva datvā “aho vata me lābhā,
atk-s0512a0:129_7: evameva māsampi dvemāsampi dānaṃ dadeyya”nti cintesi.
atk-s0512a0:129_8: Tīsupi divasesu “tena dānena na lābhasakkārasilokaṃ na cakkavattisampattiṃ na sakkasampattiṃ na brahmasampattiṃ
atk-s0512a0:129_10: api ca idaṃ me dānaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇassa paccayo hotū”ti yathādhikāraṃ cittaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0512a0:135_0: Mama dvāre ṭhitaṃ disvā, sakaṭāhena ākiriṃ.
atk-s0512a0:149_0: “Na tassa dānaṃ dadamāno, yasaṃ lābhañca patthayiṃ;
atk-s0512a0:151_0: Tattha tadāti yadā ahaṃ akittināmako tāpaso hutvā tasmiṃ dīpe kārāraññe viharāmi, tadā.
atk-s0512a0:151_5: Tāpi hi taṇhāsaṃkilesassa kosajjassa ca tapanato “tapo”ti vuccati,
atk-s0512a0:151_6: ukkaṃsagatā ca tā bodhisattassa imasmiṃ attabhāveti.
atk-s0512a0:151_9: Santattoti yathāvuttaguṇānubhāvajanitena dhammatāsiddhena paṇḍukambalasilāsanassa uṇhākārena santāpito.
atk-s0512a0:151_12: Paṇṇasālāya samīpe gahitampi kārapaṇṇaṃ paṇṇasālāya araññamajjhagatattā “pavanā ābhata”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:152_0: Atelañca aloṇikanti deyyadhammassa anuḷārabhāvepi ajjhāsayasampattiyā dānadhammassa mahājutikabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:152_2: Sakaṭāhena ākirinti iminā attano kiñcipi asesetvā dinnabhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0512a0:153_0: Punesanaṃ jahitvānāti “ekadivasaṃ dvikkhattuṃ ghāsesanaṃ na sallekha”nti cintetvā dānapītiyā titto viya
atk-s0512a0:153_1: hutvā tasmiṃ divase puna āhārapariyeṭṭhiṃ akatvā.
atk-s0512a0:154_0: Akampitoti sudūravikkhambhitattā macchariyena acalito dānajjhāsayato calanamattampi akārito.
atk-s0512a0:155_0: Na me tappaccayāti gāthāya vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti.
atk-s0512a0:155_1: Tattha tappaccayāti dānapaccayā tīsu divasesu chinnāhāratāya sarīrasmiṃ yena vevaṇṇiyena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:155_2: tampi me sarīrasmiṃ vivaṇṇiyaṃ dānapaccayāyeva natthi. Kasmā?
atk-s0512a0:155_3: Dānavisayena pītisukhena dānavisayāya eva ca ratiyā.
atk-s0512a0:155_4: Vītināmemi taṃ divanti taṃ sakalaṃ timattadivasaṃ vītināmemi,
atk-s0512a0:155_7: evameva dātuṃ pahomīti dassetuṃ “yadi māsampī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:156_3: Lābhañcāti devamanussesu cakkavattiādibhāvena laddhabbaṃ lābhaṃ vā na patthayiṃ.
atk-s0512a0:156_4: Atha kho sabbaññutaṃ sammāsambodhiṃ patthayāno ākaṅkhamāno tāni tīsu divasesu anekavāraṃ uppannāni dānamayāni
atk-s0512a0:156_5: puññakammāni dānassa vā parivārabhūtāni kāyasucaritādīni puññakammāni ācariṃ akāsinti.
atk-s0512a0:157_0: Iti bhagavā tasmiṃ attabhāve attano sudukkaraṃ puññacaritamattameva idha mahātherassa pakāsesi.
atk-s0512a0:157_1: Jātakadesanāyaṃ pana catutthadivase sakkassa upasaṅkamitvā bodhisattassa ajjhāsayajānanaṃ varena upanimantanā
atk-s0512a0:157_2: bodhisattassa varasampaṭicchanasīsena dhammadesanā deyyadhammadakkhiṇeyyānaṃ puna sakkassa anāgamanassa
atk-s0512a0:159_0: Kiṃ patthayaṃ mahābrahme, eko sammasi ghammani.
atk-s0512a0:163_0: Varaṃ kassapa te dammi, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi.
atk-s0512a0:165_0: Yena putte ca dāre ca, dhanadhaññaṃ piyāni ca;
atk-s0512a0:166_0: Laddhā narā na tappanti, so lobho na mayī vase.
atk-s0512a0:170_0: Yena jātena jīyanti, so doso na mayī vase.
atk-s0512a0:173_0: Bālaṃ na passe na suṇe, na ca bālena saṃvase;
atk-s0512a0:174_0: Bālenallāpasallāpaṃ, na kare na ca rocaye.
atk-s0512a0:175_0: “Kiṃ nu te akaraṃ bālo, vada kassapa kāraṇaṃ;
atk-s0512a0:178_0: Dunnayo seyyaso hoti, sammā vutto pakuppati;
atk-s0512a0:179_0: Vinayaṃ so na jānāti, sādhu tassa adassanaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:182_0: Dhīraṃ passe suṇe dhīraṃ, dhīrena saha saṃvase;
atk-s0512a0:184_0: “Kiṃ nu te akaraṃ dhīro, vada kassapa kāraṇaṃ;
atk-s0512a0:187_0: Sunayo seyyaso hoti, sammā vutto na kuppati;
atk-s0512a0:188_0: Vinayaṃ so pajānāti, sādhu tena samāgamo.
atk-s0512a0:192_0: Dibbā bhakkhā pātubhaveyyuṃ, sīlavanto ca yācakā.
atk-s0512a0:194_0: Dadaṃ cittaṃ pasādeyyaṃ, etaṃ sakka varaṃ vare.
atk-s0512a0:197_0: Na maṃ puna upeyyāsi, etaṃ sakka varaṃ vare.
atk-s0512a0:199_0: Dassanaṃ abhikaṅkhanti, kiṃ nu me dassane bhayaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:201_0: Disvā tapo pamajjeyyaṃ, etaṃ te dassane bhaya”nti. ;
atk-s0512a0:202_1: na te ito paṭṭhāya santikaṃ āgamissāmī”ti taṃ abhivādetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0512a0:202_2: Mahāsatto yāvajīvaṃ tattheva vasanto āyupariyosāne brahmaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0512a0:203_0: Anuruddhatthero tadā sakko ahosi, lokanātho akittipaṇḍito.
atk-s0512a0:204_8: Tāsaṃ upakārānupakāre dhamme jānitvā anupakāre dhamme pahāya upakāradhammesu pavattāpanapurecarā sahajātā
atk-s0512a0:204_9: ca upāyakosallabhūtā atisallekhavuttisādhanī ca paññā paññāpāramīti imāpi dasa pāramiyo labbhanti.
atk-s0512a0:205_0: Dānajjhāsayassa pana atiuḷārabhāvena dānamukhena desanā pavattā.
atk-s0512a0:205_13: dānasīlādayo dasa puññakiriyavatthūnīti evamādayo ye anekasataanekasahassappabhedā bodhisambhārabhūtā mahābodhisattaguṇā.
atk-s0512a0:205_14: Te sabbepi yathārahaṃ idha niddhāretvā vattabbā.
atk-s0512a0:206_0: Api cettha mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ mahantañca ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ pahāya mahābhinikkhamanasadisaṃ gehato nikkhamanaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:206_1: nikkhamitvā pabbajitassa bahujanasammatassa sato paramappicchabhāvena kulesu gaṇesu ca alaggatā,
atk-s0512a0:206_5: anāhārasseva sato divasattayampi dānapītiyā parituṭṭhassa nibbikārasarīrayāpanaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:206_6: māsadvimāsamattampi kālaṃ yācake sati āhāraṃ tatheva datvā “dānagateneva pītisukhena sarīraṃ yāpessāmī”ti
atk-s0512a0:206_8: dānaṃ datvā puna āhārapariyeṭṭhiyā akaraṇahetubhūtā paramasallekhavuttīti evamādayo mahāsattassa guṇānubhāvā veditabbā.
atk-s0512a0:212_0: Api laṅgheyya velantaṃ, bodhisattā na dhammataṃ.
atk-s0512a0:215_0: “Yesaṃ ve attani sneho, nihīyati yathā yathā;
atk-s0512a0:217_0: “Yathā cittaṃ vase hoti, na ca cittavasānugā;
atk-s0512a0:218_0: Tathā kammaṃ vase hoti, na ca kammavasānugā.
atk-s0512a0:226_3: atha kho puna aparaṃ aññaṃ saṅkhacariyampi pavakkhissaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:226_7: Mahāsamuddaṃ taritukāmoti suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ gantuṃ nāvāya mahāsamuddaṃ taritukāmo.
atk-s0512a0:226_9: Sayambhuñāṇena paccekabodhiyā adhigatattā sayameva bhūtanti sayambhuṃ.
atk-s0512a0:226_11: tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā ṭhitanti attho.
atk-s0512a0:226_12: Tattāya kaṭhinabhūmiyāti ghammasantāpena santattāya sakkharavālukānicitattā kharāya kakkhaḷāya bhūmiyā.
atk-s0512a0:227_2: Imamatthanti imaṃ idāni vakkhamānaṃ “idaṃ khetta”ntiādikaṃ atthaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:227_3: Vicintayinti tadā saṅkhabrāhmaṇabhūto cintesinti satthā vadati.
atk-s0512a0:228_0: Atīte ayaṃ bārāṇasī moḷinī nāma ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:228_1: Moḷinīnagare brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto saṅkho nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā aḍḍho mahaddhano catūsu
atk-s0512a0:228_2: nagaradvāresu nagaramajjhe attano nivesanadvāreti chasu ṭhānesu cha dānasālāyo kāretvā devasikaṃ chasatasahassāni
atk-s0512a0:228_5: “ahaṃ gehe dhane khīṇe dānaṃ dātuṃ na sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0512a0:228_6: aparikkhīṇeyeva dhane nāvāya suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ gantvā dhanaṃ āharissāmī”ti.
atk-s0512a0:228_7: So nāvaṃ bhaṇḍassa pūrāpetvā puttadāraṃ āmantetvā “yāvāhaṃ āgacchissāmi,
atk-s0512a0:228_8: tāva me dānaṃ anupacchindantā pavatteyyāthā”ti vatvā dāsakammakaraparivuto upāhanaṃ āruyha chattena dhāriyamānena paṭṭanagāmābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0512a0:229_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe gandhamādane eko paccekabuddho sattāhaṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā nirodhasamāpattito
atk-s0512a0:229_1: vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ volokento taṃ dhanāharaṇatthaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā “mahāpuriso dhanaṃ āharituṃ gacchati,
atk-s0512a0:229_2: bhavissati nu kho assa mahāsamudde antarāyo,
atk-s0512a0:229_3: no”ti āvajjetvā “bhavissatī”ti ñatvā “esa maṃ disvā chattañca upāhanañca mayhaṃ datvā upāhanadānanissandena
atk-s0512a0:229_5: karissāmissa anuggaha”nti ākāsena gantvā tassa avidūre otaritvā majjhanhikasamaye caṇḍavātātapena aṅgārasanthatasadisaṃ
atk-s0512a0:229_7: So taṃ disvāva haṭṭhatuṭṭho “puññakkhettaṃ me āgataṃ,
atk-s0512a0:229_8: ajja mayā ettha bījaṃ ropetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0512a0:230_1: Khettanti khittaṃ bījaṃ mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena tāyatīti khettaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:231_0: 14. Mahāgamanti vipulaphalāgamaṃ, sassasampattidāyakanti attho. Bījaṃ na ropetīti bījaṃ na vapati.
atk-s0512a0:233_6: idamīdisaṃ anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ labhitvā tattha pūjāsakkāraṃ yadi na karomi,
atk-s0512a0:234_1: Yathā amaccotiādīnaṃ dvinnaṃ gāthānaṃ ayaṃ saṅkhepattho –
atk-s0512a0:234_2: yathā nāma yo koci raññā muddādhikāre ṭhapito lañchanadharo amaccapuriso senāpati vā so antepure jane
atk-s0512a0:234_3: bahiddhā ca balakāyādīsu rañño yathānusiṭṭhaṃ na paṭipajjati na tesaṃ dhanadhaññaṃ deti,
atk-s0512a0:234_6: evameva ahampi puññakammassa rato laddhabbapuññaphalasaṅkhātaṃ puññakāmo dakkhiṇāya vipulaphalabhāvakaraṇena
atk-s0512a0:234_7: vipulaṃ disvāna taṃ dakkhiṇaṃ uḷāraṃ dakkhiṇeyyaṃ labhitvā tassa dānaṃ yadi na dadāmi puññato āyatiṃ
atk-s0512a0:235_0: Evaṃ pana cintetvā mahāpuriso dūratova upāhanā orohitvā vegena upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā “bhante,
atk-s0512a0:235_1: mayhaṃ anuggahatthāya imaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ upagacchathā”ti vatvā tasmiṃ rukkhamūlaṃ upasaṅkamante tattha
atk-s0512a0:235_2: vālukaṃ ussāpetvā uttarāsaṅgaṃ paññāpetvā paccekabuddhe tattha nisinne vanditvā vāsitaparissāvitena udakena
atk-s0512a0:235_9: imaṃ chattaṃ matthake katvā gacchathā”ti chattupāhanaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0512a0:235_10: Sopissa anuggahatthāya taṃ gahetvā pasādasaṃvaḍḍhanatthaṃ passantasseva vehāsaṃ uppatitvā gandhamādanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0512a0:239_0: Bodhisatto taṃ disvā ativiya pasannacitto paṭṭanaṃ gantvā nāvaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0512a0:239_1: Athassa mahāsamuddaṃ tarantassa sattame divase nāvā vivaramadāsi.
atk-s0512a0:239_3: Mahājano maraṇabhayabhīto attano attano devatā namassitvā mahāviravaṃ viravi.
atk-s0512a0:239_4: Bodhisatto ekaṃ upaṭṭhākaṃ gahetvā sakalasarīraṃ telena makkhetvā sappinā saddhiṃ sakkharacuṇṇāni yāvadatthaṃ
atk-s0512a0:239_5: khāditvā tampi khādāpetvā tena saddhiṃ kūpakayaṭṭhimatthakaṃ āruyha “imāya disāya amhākaṃ nagara”nti
atk-s0512a0:239_6: disaṃ vavatthapetvā macchakacchapaparipanthato attānaṃ saccādhiṭṭhānena pamocento tena saddhiṃ usabhamattaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:239_10: So tasmimpi kāle loṇodakena mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā uposathiko ahosiyeva.
atk-s0512a0:240_0: Tadā pana īdisānaṃ purisavisesānaṃ rakkhaṇatthāya catūhi lokapālehi ṭhapitā maṇimekhalā nāma devadhītā
atk-s0512a0:240_1: attano issariyena sattāhaṃ pamajjitvā sattame divase taṃ disvā “sacāyaṃ idha marissa,
atk-s0512a0:240_2: ativiya gārayhā abhavissa”nti saṃviggahadayā suvaṇṇapātiyā dibbabhojanassa pūretvā vegenāgantvā “brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0512a0:241_0: “Yaṃ tvaṃ sukhenābhisamekkhase maṃ, bhuñjassu bhattaṃ iti maṃ vadesi;
atk-s0512a0:242_0: Pucchāmi taṃ nāri mahānubhāve, devī nusi tvaṃ uda mānusī nū”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:245_0: Anukampikā no ca paduṭṭhacittā, taveva atthāya idhāgatāsmi.
atk-s0512a0:247_0: Sabbassa tyāhaṃ paṭipādayāmi, yaṃ kiñci tuyhaṃ manasābhipatthita”nti. –
atk-s0512a0:248_1: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “ayaṃ devadhītā samuddapiṭṭhe mayhaṃ ‘idañcidañca dammī’ti vadati,
atk-s0512a0:248_4: taṃ pana puññaṃ ayaṃ devadhītā jānāti nu kho,
atk-s0512a0:248_6: pucchissāmi tāva na”nti cintetvā pucchanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0512a0:249_0: “Yaṃ kiñci yiṭṭhañca hutañca mayhaṃ, sabbassa no issarā tvaṃ sugatte;
atk-s0512a0:250_0: Sussoṇi subbhūru vilaggamajjhe, kissa me kammassa ayaṃ vipāko”ti. ;
atk-s0512a0:251_2: Sabbassa no issarā tvanti amhākaṃ puññakammassa sabbassa tvaṃ issarā,
atk-s0512a0:251_6: Subbhūrūti sundarehi bhamukehi ūrūhi ca samannāgate.
atk-s0512a0:251_8: Kissa meti mayā katakammesu katarakammassa ayaṃ vipāko,
atk-s0512a0:251_9: yenāhaṃ appatiṭṭhe mahāsamudde ajja patiṭṭhaṃ labhāmīti.
atk-s0512a0:252_0: Taṃ sutvā devadhītā “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo ‘yaṃ attanā kusalakammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0512a0:252_1: taṃ kammaṃ na jānātī’ti saññāya pucchati maññe,
atk-s0512a0:252_2: kathessāmi na”nti nāvābhiruhanadivase paccekabuddhassa chattupāhanadānapuññameva tassa kāraṇanti kathentī –
atk-s0512a0:253_0: “Ghamme pathe brāhmaṇa ekabhikkhuṃ, ugghaṭṭapādaṃ tasitaṃ kilantaṃ;
atk-s0512a0:254_0: Paṭipādayī saṅkha upāhanāni, sā dakkhiṇā kāmaduhā tavajjā”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:257_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “evarūpepi nāma appatiṭṭhe mahāsamudde mayā dinnaṃ chattupāhanadānaṃ mama sabbakāmadadaṃ jātaṃ aho sudinna”nti tuṭṭhacitto –
atk-s0512a0:259_0: Aññassa yānassa na hettha bhūmi, ajjeva maṃ moḷiniṃ pāpayassū”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:261_0: Tattha phalakūpapannāti mahānāvatāya bahūhi phalakehi upetā.
atk-s0512a0:262_0: Devadhītā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā tuṭṭhahaṭṭhā dīghato aṭṭhausabhaṃ vitthārato catuusabhaṃ gambhīrato vīsatiyaṭṭhikaṃ
atk-s0512a0:262_1: sattaratanamayaṃ nāvaṃ māpetvā kūpaphiyārittayuttāni indanīlarajatasuvaṇṇamayādīni nimminitvā sattannaṃ
atk-s0512a0:262_2: ratanānaṃ pūretvā brāhmaṇaṃ āliṅgetvā nāvaṃ āropesi,
atk-s0512a0:262_4: Brāhmaṇo attanā katakalyāṇato tassa pattiṃ adāsi,
atk-s0512a0:262_6: Atha devadhītā tampi āliṅgetvā nāvāya patiṭṭhāpetvā taṃ nāvaṃ moḷinīnagaraṃ netvā brāhmaṇassa ghare dhanaṃ
atk-s0512a0:263_0: “Sā tattha vittā sumanā patītā, nāvaṃ sucittaṃ abhinimminitvā;
atk-s0512a0:264_0: Ādāya saṅkhaṃ purisena saddhiṃ, upānayī nagaraṃ sādhuramma”nti. ;
atk-s0512a0:265_0: Mahāpurisassa hi cittasampattiyā paccekabuddhassa ca nirodhato vuṭṭhitabhāvena sattasu cetanāsu ādicetanā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyā atiuḷāraphalā ca jātā.
atk-s0512a0:268_0: Api ca dānaṃ paripūrento, evaṃ tassa adāsaha”nti.
atk-s0512a0:269_1: sataguṇatoti sataguṇena ahaṃ tadā saṅkhabhūto sukhumālo,
atk-s0512a0:269_3: api ca evaṃ santepi dānaṃ paripūrento,
atk-s0512a0:269_4: evaṃ mayhaṃ dānapāramī paripūretūti tassa paccekabuddhassa attano sarīradukkhaṃ anapekkhitvā chattupāhanaṃ
atk-s0512a0:269_5: adāsinti attano dānajjhāsayassa uḷārabhāvaṃ satthā pavedesi.
atk-s0512a0:270_0: Bodhisattopi yāvajīvaṃ amitadhanagehaṃ ajjhāvasanto bhiyyosomattāya dānāni datvā sīlāni rakkhitvā āyupariyosāne sapariso devanagaraṃ pūresi.
atk-s0512a0:271_0: Tadā devadhītā uppalavaṇṇā ahosi, puriso ānandatthero, lokanātho saṅkhabrāhmaṇo.
atk-s0512a0:272_0: Tassa suvisuddhaniccasīlauposathasīlādivasena sīlapāramī dānasīlādīnaṃ paṭipakkhato nikkhantattā kusaladhammavasena nekkhammapāramī,
atk-s0512a0:272_1: dānādinipphādanatthaṃ abbhussahanavasena tathā mahāsamuddataraṇavāyāmavasena ca vīriyapāramī,
atk-s0512a0:272_7: sabbapāramīnaṃ upakārānupakāre dhamme jānitvā anupakāre dhamme pahāya upakāradhammesu pavattāpanapurecarā
atk-s0512a0:272_8: sahajātā ca upāyakosallabhūtā paññā paññāpāramīti imāpi pāramiyo labbhanti.
atk-s0512a0:273_0: Dānajjhāsayassa pana atiuḷārabhāvena dānapāramīvasena desanā pavattā.
atk-s0512a0:273_2: tasmā heṭṭhā vuttā mahākaruṇādayo bodhisattaguṇā idhāpi yathārahaṃ niddhāretabbā.
atk-s0512a0:273_3: Tathā attano bhogasukhaṃ anapekkhitvā mahākaruṇāya “dānapāramiṃ pūressāmī”ti dānasambhārasaṃharaṇatthaṃ samuddataraṇaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:273_5: sīlakhaṇḍabhayena devadhītāyapi upagatāya āhārānāharaṇanti evamādayo mahāsattassa guṇā veditabbā.
atk-s0512a0:273_6: Idāni vakkhamānesu sesacaritesu imināva nayena guṇaniddhāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:279_0: Tatiye indapatthe puruttameti indapatthanāmake kururaṭṭhassa puravare uttamanagare.
atk-s0512a0:279_1: Rājāti dhammena samena catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi parisaṃ rañjetīti rājā.
atk-s0512a0:280_2: Brāhmaṇā upagañchu manti kaliṅgarājena uyyojitā aṭṭha brāhmaṇā maṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:280_3: Upasaṅkamitvā ca pana āyācuṃ maṃ hatthināganti hatthibhūtaṃ mahānāgaṃ maṃ āyāciṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:280_5: Maṅgalasammatanti tāyayeva lakkhaṇasampattiyā maṅgalaṃ abhivuḍḍhikāraṇanti abhisammataṃ janehi.
atk-s0512a0:281_3: Chātako mahāti mahatī jighacchābādhā vattatīti attho.
atk-s0512a0:281_10: tena idāni mahādubbhikkhaṃ tattha mahantaṃ chātakabhayaṃ uppannaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:281_11: tassa vūpasamatthāya imaṃ añjanagirisaṅkāsaṃ tuyhaṃ añjananāmakaṃ maṅgalahatthiṃ dehi,
atk-s0512a0:282_0: Atīte kururaṭṭhe indapatthanagare bodhisatto kururājassa aggamahesiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā anupubbena viññutaṃ patto,
atk-s0512a0:282_1: takkasilaṃ gantvā yogavihitāni sippāyatanāni vijjāṭṭhānāni ca uggahetvā paccāgato pitarā uparajje ṭhapito,
atk-s0512a0:282_2: aparabhāge pitu accayena rajjaṃ patvā dasa rājadhamme akopento dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi dhanañjayo nāma nāmena.
atk-s0512a0:282_3: So catūsu nagaradvāresu nagaramajjhe nivesanadvāreti cha dānasālāyo kāretvā devasikaṃ chasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0512a0:282_4: dhanaṃ vissajjento sakalajambudīpaṃ unnaṅgalaṃ katvā dānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0512a0:283_0: Tasmiṃ kāle kaliṅgaraṭṭhe dubbhikkhabhayaṃ chātakabhayaṃ rogabhayanti tīṇi bhayāni uppajjiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:283_1: Sakalaraṭṭhavāsino dantapuraṃ gantvā rājabhavanadvāre ukkuṭṭhimakaṃsu “devaṃ vassāpehi devā”ti.
atk-s0512a0:283_2: Rājā taṃ sutvā “kiṃkāraṇā ete viravantī”ti amacce pucchi.
atk-s0512a0:283_4: Rājā porāṇakarājāno deve avassante kiṃ karontīti.
atk-s0512a0:283_5: “Devo vassatū”ti dānaṃ datvā uposathaṃ adhiṭṭhāya samādinnasīlā sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā dabbasanthare sattāhaṃ nipajjantīti.
atk-s0512a0:283_8: evaṃ rājā ahaṃ mayā kattabbakiccaṃ akāsiṃ,
atk-s0512a0:283_11: indapatthanagare dhanañjayassa nāma kururājassa maṅgalahatthimhi ānīte devo vassissatīti.
atk-s0512a0:283_15: dānajjhāsayo so rājā dānābhirato yācito samāno alaṅkatasīsampi chinditvā pasādasampannāni akkhīnipi uppāṭetvā sakalarajjampi niyyātetvā dadeyya,
atk-s0512a0:283_20: Rājā aṭṭha brāhmaṇe pakkosāpetvā sakkārasammānaṃ katvā paribbayaṃ datvā hatthiyācanatthaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0512a0:283_21: Te sabbattha ekarattivāsena turitagamanaṃ gantvā katipāhaṃ nagaradvāre dānasālāsu bhuñjantā sarīraṃ santappetvā
atk-s0512a0:283_22: rañño dānaggaṃ āgamanapathe kālaṃ āgamayamānā pācīnadvāre aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:284_0: Bodhisattopi pātova nhātānulitto sabbālaṅkārappaṭimaṇḍito alaṅkatavaravāraṇakhandhagato mahantena rājānubhāvena
atk-s0512a0:284_1: dānasālaṃ gantvā otaritvā sattaṭṭhajanānaṃ sahatthena dānaṃ datvā “imināva nīhārena dethā”ti vatvā hatthiṃ
atk-s0512a0:284_3: Brāhmaṇā pācīnadvāre ārakkhassa balavatāya okāsaṃ alabhitvā dakkhiṇadvāraṃ gantvā rājānaṃ āgacchantaṃ
atk-s0512a0:284_4: ullokayamānā dvārato nātidūre unnataṭṭhāne ṭhitā sampattaṃ rājānaṃ hatthe ukkhipitvā jayāpesuṃ.
atk-s0512a0:284_5: Rājā vajiraṅkusena vāraṇaṃ nivattetvā tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā te brāhmaṇe “kiṃ icchathā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0512a0:284_6: Brāhmaṇā “kaliṅgaraṭṭhaṃ dubbhikkhabhayena chātakabhayena rogabhayena ca upaddutaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:284_7: So upaddavo imasmiṃ tava maṅgalahatthimhi nīte vūpasammissati.
atk-s0512a0:284_8: Tasmā imaṃ añjanavaṇṇaṃ nāgaṃ amhākaṃ dehī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:285_2: mayhañca samādānabhedo siyā”ti hatthikkhandhato otaritvā “sace analaṅkataṭṭhānaṃ atthi,
atk-s0512a0:285_3: alaṅkaritvā dassāmī”ti samantato oloketvā analaṅkataṭṭhānaṃ adisvā soṇḍāya naṃ gahetvā brāhmaṇānaṃ hatthesu
atk-s0512a0:285_4: ṭhapetvā ratanabhiṅgārena pupphagandhavāsitaṃ udakaṃ pātetvā adāsi.
atk-s0512a0:288_0: Mā me bhijji samādānaṃ, dassāmi vipulaṃ gajaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:291_0: Jalaṃ hatthe ākiritvā, brāhmaṇānaṃ adaṃ gaja”nti.
atk-s0512a0:292_2: Mā me bhijji samādānanti sabbaññutaññāṇatthāya sabbassa yācakassa sabbaṃ anavajjaṃ icchitaṃ dadanto dānapāramiṃ pūressāmīti yaṃ mayhaṃ samādānaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:292_4: Tasmā dassāmi vipulaṃ gajanti mahantaṃ imaṃ maṅgalahatthiṃ dassāmīti.
atk-s0512a0:294_0: Tasmiṃ pana hatthimhi dinne amaccā bodhisattaṃ etadavocuṃ – “kasmā, mahārāja,
atk-s0512a0:294_3: raññā nāma evarūpo opavayho maṅgalahatthī issariyaṃ abhivijayañca ākaṅkhantena na dātabbo”ti.
atk-s0512a0:295_3: saṅgāmavijaye vā uttamaṃ padhānaṃ pavaraṃ nāgaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:295_4: Kiṃ te rajjaṃ karissatīti tasmiṃ nāge apagate tava rajjaṃ kiṃ karissati,
atk-s0512a0:296_1: Rajjampi me dade sabbanti tiṭṭhatu nāgo tiracchānagato,
atk-s0512a0:296_2: idaṃ me sabbaṃ kururaṭṭhampi yācakānaṃ dadeyyaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:296_3: Sarīraṃ dajjamattanoti rajjepi vā kiṃ vattabbaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:296_5: sabbopi hi me ajjhattikabāhiro pariggaho lokahitatthameva mayā pariccatto.
atk-s0512a0:296_6: Yasmā sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayhaṃ sabbaññutā ca dānapāramiṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbapāramiyo apūrentena na sakkā laddhuṃ,
atk-s0512a0:297_0: Evampi tasmiṃ nāge ānīte kaliṅgaraṭṭhe devo na vassateva.
atk-s0512a0:297_2: kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti pucchitvā “kururājā garudhamme rakkhati,
atk-s0512a0:297_3: tenassa raṭṭhe anvaddhamāsaṃ anudasāhaṃ devo vassati,
atk-s0512a0:297_5: na imassa tiracchānagatassā”ti jānitvā “mayampi garudhamme rakkhissāma,
atk-s0512a0:297_6: gacchatha dhanañcayakorabyassa santike te suvaṇṇapaṭṭe likhāpetvā ānethā”ti amacce pesesi.
atk-s0512a0:299_0: Rajjuggāho sārathī seṭṭhi, doṇo dovāriko tathā;
atk-s0512a0:301_0: Te amaccā bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0512a0:301_9: majjaṃ na pātabba”nti suvaṇṇapaṭṭe likhāpetvā “evaṃ santepi mātu santike gaṇhathā”ti āha.
atk-s0512a0:302_0: Dūtā rājānaṃ vanditvā tassā santikaṃ gantvā “devi,
atk-s0512a0:302_3: Bodhisattassa mātāpi tatheva attano kukkuccassa atthibhāvaṃ vatvāva tehi yācitā adāsi.
atk-s0512a0:302_5: Te sabbesampi santike suvaṇṇapaṭṭe garudhamme likhāpetvā dantapuraṃ gantvā kaliṅgarañño datvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0512a0:302_6: Sopi rājā tasmiṃ dhamme vattamāno pañca sīlāni pūresi.
atk-s0512a0:302_10: Bodhisatto yāvajīvaṃ dānādīni puññāni katvā sapariso saggapuraṃ pūresi.
atk-s0512a0:305_0: Rajjuggāho ca kaccāno, doṇamāpako ca kolito.
atk-s0512a0:310_0: Idhāpi nekkhammapāramiādayo sesadhammā ca vuttanayeneva niddhāretabbāti.
atk-s0512a0:313_5: Cakkavattīti cakkaratanaṃ vatteti catūhi vā sampatticakkehi vattati,
atk-s0512a0:313_7: parahitāya ca iriyāpathacakkānaṃ vatto etasmiṃ atthītipi cakkavattī.
atk-s0512a0:313_8: Atha vā catūhi acchariyadhammehi saṅgahavatthūhi ca samannāgatena,
atk-s0512a0:313_9: parehi anabhibhavanīyassa anatikkamanīyassa āṇāsaṅkhātassa cakkassa vatto etasmiṃ atthītipi cakkavattī.
atk-s0512a0:313_10: Pariṇāyakaratanapubbaṅgamena hatthiratanādipamukhena mahābalakāyena puññānubhāvanibbattena kāyabalena ca samannāgatattā mahabbalo.
atk-s0512a0:314_0: Atīte kira mahāpuriso sudassanattabhāvato tatiye attabhāve gahapatikule nibbatto dharamānakassa buddhassa
atk-s0512a0:314_1: sāsane ekaṃ theraṃ araññavāsaṃ vasantaṃ attano kammena araññaṃ paviṭṭho rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ disvā “idha
atk-s0512a0:314_2: mayā ayyassa paṇṇasālaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā attano kammaṃ pahāya dabbasambhāraṃ chinditvā nivāsayoggaṃ
atk-s0512a0:314_3: paṇṇasālaṃ katvā dvāraṃ yojetvā kaṭṭhattharaṇaṃ katvā “karissati nu kho paribhogaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:314_4: na nu kho karissatī”ti ekamante nisīdi.
atk-s0512a0:314_5: Thero antogāmato āgantvā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā kaṭṭhattharaṇe nisīdi.
atk-s0512a0:314_12: So adhivāsanākāreneva “vasissatī”ti ñatvā “nibaddhaṃ mayhaṃ gharadvāraṃ āgantabba”nti paṭijānāpetvā niccaṃ attano ghareyeva bhattavissaggaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0512a0:314_13: So paṇṇasālāyaṃ kaṭasārakaṃ pattharitvā mañcapīṭhaṃ paññapesi,
atk-s0512a0:314_21: Evamādinā āvāsaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā therassa ticīvaraṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ samaṇaparikkhāraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0512a0:314_24: So pañca sīlāni rakkhanto uposathaṃ karonto yāvajīvaṃ theraṃ upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0512a0:314_25: Thero tattheva vasanto arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0512a0:315_1: Bodhisattopi yāvatāyukaṃ puññaṃ katvā devaloke nibbattitvā tato cuto manussalokaṃ āgacchanto kusāvatiyā
atk-s0512a0:315_2: rājadhāniyā nibbattitvā mahāsudassano nāma rājā ahosi cakkavattī.
atk-s0512a0:315_4: rājā mahāsudassano nāma ahosi khattiyo muddhāvasitto”tiādinā nayena sutte āgato eva.
atk-s0512a0:315_8: tāni sabbāni tassa therassa katāya ekissā paṇṇasālāya nissandena nibbattāni,
atk-s0512a0:315_9: caturāsīti pallaṅkasahassāni nāgasahassāni assasahassāni rathasahassāni tassa dinnassa mañcapīṭhassa,
atk-s0512a0:315_12: caturāsīti itthisahassāni puttasahassāni gahapatisahassāni ca pattathālakādiparibhogārahassa pabbajitaparikkhāradānassa,
atk-s0512a0:315_16: So sattahi ratanehi catūhi iddhīhi ca samannāgato rājādhirājā hutvā sakalaṃ sāgarapariyantaṃ pathavimaṇḍalaṃ
atk-s0512a0:315_17: dhammena abhivijiya ajjhāvasanto anekasatesu ṭhānesu dānasālāyo kāretvā mahādānaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0512a0:315_18: Divasassa tikkhattuṃ nagare bheriṃ carāpesi “yo yaṃ icchati,
atk-s0512a0:316_5: tassa tassa pākārassa anto ca bahi cāti attho.
atk-s0512a0:316_6: Ko kiṃ icchatīti brāhmaṇādīsu yo koci satto annādīsu deyyadhammesu yaṃ kiñci icchati.
atk-s0512a0:316_8: Kassa kiṃ dīyatu dhananti anekavāraṃ pariyāyantarehi ca dānaghosanāya pavattitabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:317_1: Idāni dānaghosanāya tassa tassa deyyadhammassa anucchavikapuggalaparikittanaṃ dassetuṃ “ko chātako”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:318_2: Ko mālaṃ ko vilepanantipi “icchatī”ti padaṃ ānetvā yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:319_1: Ko pathe chattamādetīti ko pathiko pathe magge attano vassavātātaparakkhaṇatthaṃ chattaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0512a0:319_3: Kopāhanā mudū subhāti dassanīyatāya subhā sukhasamphassatāya mudū upāhanā attano pādānaṃ cakkhūnañca rakkhaṇatthaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:319_4: Ko ādetīti ko tāhi atthikoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0512a0:320_1: Na taṃ dasasu ṭhānesūti taṃ dānaṃ na dasasu ṭhānesu paṭiyattanti yojanā.
atk-s0512a0:320_3: api ca kho anekasatesu ṭhānesu paṭiyattaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:320_4: Yācake dhananti yācake uddissa dhanaṃ paṭiyattaṃ upakkhaṭaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:320_5: Dvādasayojanāyāme hi nagare sattayojanavitthate sattasu pākārantaresu satta tālapantiparikkhepā,
atk-s0512a0:320_6: tāsu tālapantīsu caturāsīti pokkharaṇisahassāni pāṭiyekkaṃ pokkharaṇitīre mahādānaṃ paṭṭhapitaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:321_1: rājā mahāsudassano tāsaṃ pokkharaṇīnaṃ tīre evarūpaṃ dānaṃ annaṃ annatthikassa,
atk-s0512a0:322_2: mahāpuriso hi itthīnañca purisānañca anucchavike alaṅkāre kāretvā itthimattameva tattha paricāravasena
atk-s0512a0:322_3: sesañca sabbaṃ pariccāgavasena ṭhapetvā “rājā mahāsudassano dānaṃ deti,
atk-s0512a0:322_5: Mahājanā pokkharaṇitīraṃ gantvā nhatvā vatthādīni nivāsetvā mahāsampattiṃ anubhavitvā yesaṃ tādisāni atthi,
atk-s0512a0:322_9: Ye hatthiyānādīsupi nisīditvā yathāsukhaṃ vicaritvā varasayanesupi sayitvā sampattiṃ anubhavitvā itthīhipi
atk-s0512a0:322_10: saddhiṃ sampattiṃ anubhavitvā sattavidharatanapasādhanāni pasādhetvā sampattiṃ anubhavitvā yaṃ yaṃ atthikā,
atk-s0512a0:322_13: Tampi dānaṃ uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya devasikaṃ dīyateva.
atk-s0512a0:322_17: Rattiñcāpi divāpi yadā yadā atthikā āgacchanti,
atk-s0512a0:322_19: Evaṃ mahāpuriso yāvajīvaṃ sakalajambudīpaṃ unnaṅgalaṃ katvā mahādānaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0512a0:322_20: Tena vuttaṃ “divā vā yadi vā rattiṃ,
atk-s0512a0:323_0: Tattha divā vā yadi vā rattiṃ,
atk-s0512a0:323_1: yadi etīti etenassa yathākālaṃ dānaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0512a0:323_2: Yācakānañhi lābhāsāya upasaṅkamanakālo eva bodhisattānaṃ dānassa kālo nāma.
atk-s0512a0:323_4: Laddhā yadicchakaṃ bhoganti etena yathābhirucitaṃ dānaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:323_5: Yo yo hi yācako yaṃ yaṃ deyyadhammaṃ icchati,
atk-s0512a0:323_7: Na tassa mahagghadullabhādibhāvaṃ attano uparodhaṃ cintesi.
atk-s0512a0:323_8: Pūrahatthova gacchatīti etena yāvadicchakaṃ dānaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0512a0:323_10: tattakaṃ aparihāpetvāva mahāsatto deti uḷārajjhāsayatāya ca mahiddhikatāya ca.
atk-s0512a0:324_2: Samādānato paṭṭhāya hi mahāsattā yāvapāripūri vemajjhe na kālaparicchedaṃ karonti,
atk-s0512a0:324_3: bodhisambhārasambharaṇe saṅkocābhāvena antarantarā avosānāpattito maraṇenapi anupacchedo eva,
atk-s0512a0:324_6: Napāhaṃ dessaṃ dhanaṃ dammīti idaṃ dhanaṃ nāma mayhaṃ na dessaṃ amanāpanti evarūpaṃ mahādānaṃ dento gehato ca dhanaṃ nīharāpemi.
atk-s0512a0:324_7: Napi natthi nicayo mayīti mama samīpe dhananicayo dhanasaṅgaho nāpi natthi,
atk-s0512a0:324_8: sallekhavuttisamaṇo viya asaṅgahopi na homīti attho.
atk-s0512a0:324_9: Idaṃ yena ajjhāsayena tassidaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattitaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:325_1: Idāni taṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathāpi āturo nāmā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0512a0:325_3: yathā nāma āturo rogābhibhūto puriso rogato attānaṃ parimocetukāmo dhanena hiraññasuvaṇṇādinā vejjaṃ
atk-s0512a0:325_4: tikicchakaṃ tappetvā ārādhetvā yathāvidhi paṭipajjanto tato rogato vimuccati.
atk-s0512a0:326_1: Tatheva evameva ahampi aṭṭabhūtaṃ sakalalokaṃ kilesarogato sakalasaṃsāradukkharogato ca parimocetukāmo
atk-s0512a0:326_2: tassa tato parimocanassa ayaṃ sabbasāpateyyapariccāgo dānapāramiupāyoti jānamāno bujjhamāno asesato deyyadhammassa
atk-s0512a0:326_3: paṭiggāhakānañca vasena anavasesato mahādānassa vasena sattānaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ paripūretuṃ attano ca na mayhaṃ
atk-s0512a0:326_5: tasmā ūnamananti pavattaṃ ūnaṃ manaṃ pūrayituṃ pavattayituṃ vanibbake yācake adāsiṃ taṃ dānaṃ evarūpaṃ mahādānaṃ dadāmi,
atk-s0512a0:326_6: tañca kho tasmiṃ dānadhamme tassa ca phale nirālayo anapekkho apaccāso kiñcipi apaccāsīsamāno kevalaṃ
atk-s0512a0:327_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto mahādānaṃ pavattento attano puññānubhāvanibbattaṃ dhammapāsādaṃ abhiruyha mahābyūhakūṭāgāradvāre
atk-s0512a0:327_1: eva kāmavitakkādayo nivattetvā tattha sovaṇṇamaye rājapallaṅke nisinno jhānābhiññāyo nibbattetvā tato
atk-s0512a0:327_2: nikkhamitvā sovaṇṇamayaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ pavisitvā tattha rajatamaye pallaṅke nisinno cattāro brahmavihāre
atk-s0512a0:327_3: bhāvetvā caturāsīti vassasahassāni jhānasamāpattīhi vītināmetvā maraṇasamaye dassanāya upagatānaṃ subhaddādevīpamukhānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:330_0: Imāya gāthāya ovaditvā āyupariyosāne brahmalokaparāyano ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:332_0: Idhāpi dasa pāramiyo sarūpato labbhanti eva,
atk-s0512a0:332_1: dānajjhāsayassa pana uḷāratāya dānapāramī eva pāḷiyaṃ āgatā.
atk-s0512a0:332_3: Tathā uḷāre sattaratanasamujjale catudīpissariyepi ṭhitassa tādisaṃ bhogasukhaṃ analaṅkaritvā kāmavitakkādayo
atk-s0512a0:332_4: dūrato vikkhambhetvā tathārūpe mahādāne pavattentasseva caturāsīti vassasahassāni samāpattīhi vītināmetvā
atk-s0512a0:332_5: aniccatādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammakathaṃ katvāpi vipassanāya anussukkanaṃ sabbattha anissaṅgatāti evamādayo
atk-s0512a0:335_0: Pañcame sattarājapurohitoti sattabhūādīnaṃ sattannaṃ rājūnaṃ sabbakiccānusāsakapurohito.
atk-s0512a0:335_1: Pūjito naradevehīti tehi eva aññehi ca jambudīpe sabbeheva khattiyehi catupaccayapūjāya sakkārasammānena ca pūjito.
atk-s0512a0:335_2: Mahāgovindabrāhmaṇoti mahānubhāvatāya govindassābhisekena abhisittatāya ca “mahāgovindo”ti saṅkhaṃ gato brāhmaṇo,
atk-s0512a0:335_3: abhisittakālato paṭṭhāya hi bodhisattassa ayaṃ samaññā jātā,
atk-s0512a0:335_6: Rājāpi paccūsasamaye attano maṅgalāvudhaṃ pajjalitaṃ disvā bhīto attano purohitaṃ bodhisattassa pitaraṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ āgataṃ pucchitvā “mā bhāyi, mahārāja,
atk-s0512a0:335_10: na taṃ nissāya tuyhaṃ antarāyo atthi,
atk-s0512a0:335_11: sakalajambudīpe pana paññāya tena samo na bhavissati,
atk-s0512a0:335_12: tassetaṃ pubbanimitta”nti purohitena samassāsito tuṭṭhacitto “kumārassa khīramūlaṃ hotū”ti sahassaṃ datvā “vayappattakāle mayhaṃ dassethā”ti āha.
atk-s0512a0:335_13: So vuddhippatto aparabhāge alamatthadasso sattannaṃ rājūnaṃ sabbakiccānusāsako hutvā pabbajitvā ca satte
atk-s0512a0:335_15: Iti jotitattā pālanasamatthatāya ca “jotipālo”tissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:336_0: Tattha bodhisatto disampatissa nāma rañño purohitassa govindabrāhmaṇassa putto hutvā attano pitu tassa ca rañño accayena tassa putto reṇu,
atk-s0512a0:336_3: dve ca dhataraṭṭhāti ime satta rājāno yathā aññamaññaṃ na vivadanti.
atk-s0512a0:336_4: Evaṃ rajje patiṭṭhāpetvā tesaṃ atthadhamme anusāsanto jambudīpatale sabbesaṃ rājūnaṃ aññesañca brāhmaṇānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:336_5: devanāgagahapatikānaṃ sakkato garukato mānito pūjito apacito uttamaṃ gāravaṭṭhānaṃ patto ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:340_0: Atha bodhisattassa puññānubhāvasamussāhitehi rājūhi tesaṃ anuyuttehi khattiyehi brāhmaṇagahapatikehi
atk-s0512a0:340_1: negamajānapadehi ca uparūpari upanīto samantato mahogho viya ajjhottharamāno aparimeyyo uḷāro lābhasakkāro uppajji,
atk-s0512a0:340_2: yathā taṃ aparimāṇāsu jātīsu upacitavipulapuññasañcayassa uḷārābhijātassa parisuddhasīlācārassa pesalassa
atk-s0512a0:340_6: yaṃnūnāhaṃ iminā sabbasatte santappetvā dānapāramiṃ paripūreyya”nti.
atk-s0512a0:340_7: So nagarassa majjhe catūsu dvāresu attano nivesanadvāreti cha dānasālāyo kāretvā devasikaṃ aparimitadhanapariccāgena mahādānaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0512a0:340_11: Evaṃ divase divase mahāpariccāgaṃ karontassa cassa cittassa titti vā santoso vā nāhosi,
atk-s0512a0:340_13: Dānaggañcassa lābhāsāya āgacchantehi deyyadhammaṃ gahetvā gacchantehi ca mahāsattassa ca guṇavisese kittayantehi
atk-s0512a0:344_0: Tattha tadāhanti yadā sattarājapurohito mahāgovindabrāhmaṇo homi,
atk-s0512a0:344_3: Akkhobhanti abbhantarehi ca bāhirehi ca paccatthikehi appaṭisedhanīyatāya kenaci akkhobhanīyaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:344_5: Atipuṇṇadānajjhāsayassa deyyadhammassa ca uḷārabhāvena vipulabhāvena ca ativiya paripuṇṇanti attho.
atk-s0512a0:344_7: yathā sāgare udakaṃ sakalenapi lokena harantena khepetuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0512a0:345_0: 39. Osānagāthāya varaṃ dhananti uttamaṃ icchitaṃ vā dhanaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0512a0:346_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto paṭhamakappikamahāmegho viya mahāvassaṃ avibhāgena mahantaṃ dānavassaṃ vassāpento dānabyāvaṭo
atk-s0512a0:346_1: hutvāpi sesaṃ sattannaṃ rājūnaṃ atthadhamme appamatto anusāsati.
atk-s0512a0:346_4: Tassa aparena samayena evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato “sakkhi mahāgovindo brāhmaṇo brahmānaṃ passati,
atk-s0512a0:346_5: sakkhi mahāgovindo brāhmaṇo brahmunā sākaccheti sallapati mantetī”ti.
atk-s0512a0:346_7: “etarahi kho mayhaṃ ayaṃ abhūto kittisaddo abbhuggato ‘brahmānaṃ passati,
atk-s0512a0:346_8: sakkhi mahāgovindo brāhmaṇo brahmunā sākaccheti sallapati mantetī’ti,
atk-s0512a0:346_10: So “te satta rājāno satta ca brāhmaṇamahāsāle satta ca nhātakasatāni attano puttadārañca āpucchitvā brahmānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:346_11: passeyya”nti cittaṃ paṇidhāya vassike cattāro māse brahmavihārabhāvanamanuyuñji.
atk-s0512a0:346_12: Tassa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya brahmā sanaṅkumāro purato pāturahosi.
atk-s0512a0:347_0: “Vaṇṇavā yasavā sirimā, ko nu tvamasi mārisa;
atk-s0512a0:348_0: Ajānantā taṃ pucchāma, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ maya”nti. ;
atk-s0512a0:351_0: Sabbe jānanti maṃ devā, evaṃ govinda jānāhī”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:354_0: Agghe bhavantaṃ pucchāma, agghaṃ kurutu no bhava”nti. –
atk-s0512a0:355_0: Upanītaṃ atithisakkāraṃ anatthikopi brahmā tassa cittasampahaṃsanatthaṃ vissāsakaraṇatthañca sampaṭicchanto “paṭiggaṇhāma te agghaṃ, yaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:359_0: Atha naṃ mahāpuriso samparāyikaṃ eva atthaṃ –
atk-s0512a0:361_0: Katthaṭṭhito kimhi ca sikkhamāno, pappoti macco amataṃ brahmaloka”nti. –
atk-s0512a0:365_0: Nirāmagandho virato methunasmā, etthaṭṭhito ettha ca sikkhamāno;
atk-s0512a0:368_0: Tattha maṃ ve kumāraṃ jānantīti ve ekaṃsena maṃ “kumāro”ti jānanti.
atk-s0512a0:368_2: Sanantananti ciratanaṃ porāṇaṃ. Evaṃ, govinda, jānāhīti, govinda,
atk-s0512a0:369_0: Āsananti idaṃ bhoto brahmuno nisīdanatthāya āsanaṃ paññattaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:369_1: Idaṃ udakaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ pādānaṃ dhovanatthaṃ pānīyaṃ pipāsaharaṇatthāya.
atk-s0512a0:369_3: Idaṃ madhusākaṃ atakkaṃ aloṇikaṃ adhūpanaṃ udakena seditaṃ sākaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0512a0:369_4: Tadā hi bodhisattassa taṃ catumāsaṃ brahmacariyaṃ abhisallekhavuttiparamukkaṭṭhaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:369_6: tayidaṃ agghaṃ kurutu paṭiggaṇhātu no bhavaṃ idaṃ agghanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0512a0:369_7: Iti mahāpuriso brahmuno nesaṃ aparibhuñjanaṃ jānantopi vattasīse ṭhatvā attano āciṇṇaṃ atithipūjanaṃ dassento evamāha.
atk-s0512a0:369_8: Brahmāpissa adhippāyaṃ jānanto “paṭiggaṇhāma te agghaṃ, yaṃ tvaṃ, govinda,
atk-s0512a0:370_0: Tattha tassa te āsane mayaṃ nisinnā nāma homa,
atk-s0512a0:371_0: Kaṅkhī akaṅkhiṃ paravediyesūti ahaṃ savicikiccho parena sayaṃ abhisaṅkhatattā parassa pākaṭesu paravediyesu pañhesu nibbicikicchaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:372_4: Ekodibhūtoti eko udeti pavattatīti ekodibhūto ekībhūto,
atk-s0512a0:372_6: Atha vā eko udetīti ekodi, samādhi.
atk-s0512a0:372_15: Ettha ca sikkhamānoti etesu dhammesu sikkhamāno,
atk-s0512a0:373_0: Atha mahāpuriso tassa brahmuno vacanaṃ sutvā āmagandhe jigucchanto “idānevāhaṃ pabbajissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0512a0:373_4: Evaṃ sati mayhampi tava santike āgamanaṃ svāgamanameva bhavissati, tvaṃ, tāta,
atk-s0512a0:373_6: evaṃ mahantaṃ nāma sampattiṃ issariyañca pahāya pabbajanaṃ nāma gandhahatthino ayobandhanaṃ chinditvā vanagamanaṃ viya atiuḷāraṃ,
atk-s0512a0:373_7: buddhatanti nāmesā”ti mahābodhisattassa daḷhīkammaṃ katvā brahmalokameva gato.
atk-s0512a0:373_8: Mahāsattopi “mama ito nikkhamitvā pabbajanaṃ nāma na yuttaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:373_10: tasmā tesaṃ ārocetvā sace tepi pabbajanti sundarameva,
atk-s0512a0:373_11: no ce purohitaṭṭhānaṃ niyyātetvā pabbajissāmī”ti cintetvā reṇussa tāva rañño ārocetvā tena bhiyyosomattāya
atk-s0512a0:373_12: kāmehi nimantiyamāno attano saṃvegahetuṃ ekantena pabbajitukāmatañcassa nivedetvā tena “yadi evaṃ ahampi
atk-s0512a0:373_13: pabbajissāmī”ti vutte “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā eteneva nayena sattabhūādayo cha khattiye,
atk-s0512a0:373_16: attano bhariyāyo ca āpucchitvā sattāhamattameva tesaṃ cittānurakkhaṇatthaṃ ṭhatvā mahābhinikkhamanasadisaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0512a0:374_0: Tassa te sattarājāno ādiṃ katvā sabbeva anupabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:374_2: Anekayojanavitthārāya parisāya parivuto mahāpuriso dhammaṃ desento gāmanigamajanapadarājadhānīsu cārikaṃ carati,
atk-s0512a0:374_5: Manussā “govindapaṇḍito kira āgacchatī”ti sutvā puretarameva maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā taṃ alaṅkārāpetvā paccuggantvā
atk-s0512a0:374_8: Mahāpuriso mahājanaṃ puññe patiṭṭhāpesi sīlasampadāya indriyasaṃvare bhojane mattaññutāya jāgariyānuyoge
atk-s0512a0:375_0: Bodhisatto yāvatāyukaṃ pāramiyo pūrento samāpattisukhena vītināmetvā āyupariyosāne brahmaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0512a0:375_1: Tassa taṃ brahmacariyaṃ iddhañceva phītañca vitthārikaṃ bāhujaññaṃ puthubhūtaṃ yāva devamanussehi suppakāsitaṃ ciraṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ pavattittha.
atk-s0512a0:375_2: Tassa ye sāsanaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ ājāniṃsu,
atk-s0512a0:375_3: te kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ brahmalokaṃ upapajjiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:375_5: te appekacce paranimmitavasavattīnaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:375_7: tusitānaṃ yāmānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ cātumahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:375_10: Iti mahājano yebhuyyena brahmalokūpago saggūpago ca ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:376_4: Tathā reṇuādīnaṃ sattannaṃ rājūnaṃ aññamaññāvirodhena yathā sakarajje patiṭṭhāpanaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:376_5: tathā mahati sattavidhe rajje tesaṃ atthadhammānusāsane appamādo,
atk-s0512a0:376_6: “brahmunāpi sākacchaṃ samāpajjatī”ti pavattasambhāvanaṃ yathābhūtaṃ kātuṃ cattāro māse paramukkaṃsagato brahmacariyavāso.
atk-s0512a0:376_8: brahmuno ovāde ṭhatvā sattahi rājūhi sakalena ca lokena upanītaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya chaḍḍetvā
atk-s0512a0:376_10: buddhānaṃ sāsanassa viya attano sāsanassa cirakālānuppabandhoti evamādayo guṇānubhāvā vibhāvetabbāti.
atk-s0512a0:379_1: Chaṭṭhe mithilāyaṃ puruttameti mithilānāmake videhānaṃ uttamanagare.
atk-s0512a0:379_2: Nimi nāma mahārājāti nemiṃ ghaṭento viya uppanno “nimī”ti laddhanāmo,
atk-s0512a0:379_3: mahantehi dānasīlādiguṇavisesehi mahatā ca rājānubhāvena samannāgatattā mahanto rājāti mahārājā.
atk-s0512a0:379_4: Paṇḍito kusalatthikoti attano ca paresañca puññatthiko.
atk-s0512a0:380_0: Atīte kira videharaṭṭhe mithilānagare amhākaṃ bodhisatto maghadevo nāma rājā ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:380_1: So caturāsīti vassasahassāni kumārakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā caturāsīti vassahassāni uparajjaṃ kāretvā caturāsīti
atk-s0512a0:380_2: vassasahassāni rajjaṃ kārento “yadā me sirasmiṃ palitāni passeyyāsi,
atk-s0512a0:380_3: tadā me āroceyyāsī”ti kappakassa vatvā aparabhāge tena palitāni disvā ārocite suvaṇṇasaṇḍāsena uddharāpetvā
atk-s0512a0:380_4: hatthe patiṭṭhāpetvā palitaṃ oloketvā “pātubhūto kho mayhaṃ devadūto”ti saṃvegajāto “idāni mayā pabbajituṃ
atk-s0512a0:380_5: vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā satasahassuṭṭhānakaṃ gāmavaraṃ kappakassa datvā jeṭṭhakumāraṃ pakkosāpetvā tassa –
atk-s0512a0:383_0: Vatvā sādhukaṃ rajje samanusāsitvā yadipi attano aññānipi caturāsīti vassasahassāni āyu atthi,
atk-s0512a0:383_1: evaṃ santepi maccuno santike ṭhitaṃ viya attānaṃ maññamāno saṃviggahadayo pabbajjaṃ roceti.
atk-s0512a0:386_0: So puttaṃ “imināva nīhārena vatteyyāsi yathā mayā paṭipannaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:386_1: mā kho tvaṃ antimapuriso ahosī”ti ovaditvā nagarā nikkhamma bhikkhupabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā caturāsīti vassasahassāni
atk-s0512a0:386_3: Puttopissa bahūni vassasahassāni dhammena rajjaṃ kāretvā teneva upāyena pabbajitvā brahmalokaparāyano ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:386_5: tathā tassa puttoti evaṃ dvīhi ūnāni caturāsīti khattiyasahassāni sīse palitaṃ disvāva pabbajitāni.
atk-s0512a0:386_6: Atha bodhisatto brahmaloke ṭhitova “pavattati nu kho mayā manussaloke kataṃ kalyāṇaṃ na pavattatī”ti āvajjento addasa “ettakaṃ addhānaṃ pavattaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:386_8: So “na kho panāhaṃ mayhaṃ paveṇiyā ucchijjituṃ dassāmī”ti attano vaṃse jātarañño eva aggamahesiyā kucchimhi
atk-s0512a0:386_9: paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā attano vaṃsassa nemiṃ ghaṭento viya nibbatto.
atk-s0512a0:386_10: Tena vuttaṃ “nemiṃ ghaṭento viya uppannoti nimīti laddhanāmo”ti.
atk-s0512a0:387_0: Tassa hi nāmaggahaṇadivase pitarā ānītā lakkhaṇapāṭhakā.
atk-s0512a0:387_4: Taṃ sutvā rājā yathāvuttenatthena “nimī”tissa nāmaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0512a0:387_5: so daharakālato paṭṭhāya sīle uposathakamme ca yuttappayutto ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:387_6: Athassa pitā purimanayeneva palitaṃ disvā kappakassa gāmavaraṃ datvā puttaṃ rajje samanusāsitvā nagarā
atk-s0512a0:387_7: nikkhamma pabbajitvā jhānāni nibbattetvā brahmalokaparāyano ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:388_0: Nimirājā pana dānajjhāsayatāya catūsu nagaradvāresu nagaramajjhe cāti pañca dānasālāyo kāretvā mahādānaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0512a0:388_1: Ekekāya dānasālāya satasahassaṃ satasahassaṃ katvā devasikaṃ pañcasatasahassāni pariccaji,
atk-s0512a0:388_8: Tassa ovāde ṭhatvā mahājano dānādīni puññāni katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbatti,
atk-s0512a0:388_11: Tadā pana attano dānajjhāsayassa uḷārabhāvaṃ savisesaṃ dānapāramiyā pūritabhāvañca pavedento satthā –
atk-s0512a0:392_3: Catummukhanti catūsu disāsu catūhi dvārehi yuttaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:392_4: Dānasālāya hi mahantabhāvato deyyadhammassa yācakajanassa ca bahubhāvato na sakkā ekeneva dvārena dānadhammaṃ
atk-s0512a0:392_5: pariyantaṃ kātuṃ deyyadhammañca pariyosāpetunti sālāya catūsu disāsu cattāri mahādvārāni kārāpesi.
atk-s0512a0:392_6: Tattha dvārato paṭṭhāya yāva koṇā deyyadhammo rāsikato tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0512a0:392_7: Aruṇuggaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva pakatiyā saṃvesanakālo,
atk-s0512a0:392_13: atha kho aḍḍhānaṃ mahābhogānampi upakappanavasena mahāsudassanadānasadisaṃ uḷāratarapaṇītatarānaṃ deyyadhammānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:392_14: pariccajanato sabbepi sakalajambudīpavāsino manussā paṭiggahesuñceva paribhuñjiṃsu ca.
atk-s0512a0:392_15: Sakalajambudīpañhi unnaṅgalaṃ katvā mahāpuriso tadā mahādānaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0512a0:392_17: evaṃ migapakkhike ādiṃ katvā tiracchānagatānampi dānasālāya bahi ekamante tesaṃ upakappanavasena dānaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0512a0:393_1: Idāni tattha deyyadhammaṃ ekadesena dassento “acchādanañca sayanaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:394_3: Annaṃ pānañca bhojananti tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ yathābhirucitaṃ nānaggarasaṃ annañceva pānañca avasiṭṭhaṃ nānāvidhabhojanavikatiñca.
atk-s0512a0:394_4: Abbocchinnaṃ karitvānāti ārambhato paṭṭhāya yāva āyupariyosānā ahorattaṃ avicchinnaṃ katvā.
atk-s0512a0:395_1: Idāni tassa dānassa sammāsambodhiṃ ārabbha dānapāramibhāvena pavattitabhāvaṃ dassento yathā tadā attano ajjhāsayo pavatto,
atk-s0512a0:395_4: yathā nāma sevakapuriso attano sāmikaṃ kālānukālaṃ sevanavasena upagato laddhabbadhanahetu kāyena vācāya
atk-s0512a0:395_5: manasā sabbathāpi kāyavacīmanokammehi yathā so ārādhito hoti,
atk-s0512a0:395_7: tathā ahampi bodhisattabhūto sadevakassa lokassa sāmibhūtaṃ anuttaraṃ buddhabhāvaṃ sevetukāmo tassa ārādhanatthaṃ
atk-s0512a0:395_8: sabbabhave sabbasmiṃ nibbattanibbattabhave dānapāramiparipūraṇavasena dānena sabbasatte santappetvā bodhisaṅkhātato
atk-s0512a0:395_9: ariyamaggañāṇato jātattā “bodhija”nti laddhanāmaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ parato sabbathā nānūpāyehi esissāmi
atk-s0512a0:395_11: taṃ uttamaṃ bodhiṃ sammāsambodhiṃ jīvitapariccāgādiṃ yaṃkiñci katvā icchāmi abhipatthemīti.
atk-s0512a0:396_0: Evamidha dānajjhāsayassa uḷārabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ dānapāramivaseneva desanā katā.
atk-s0512a0:396_2: tathā hissa heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva sīlādiguṇehi attānaṃ alaṅkaritvā mahājanaṃ tattha patiṭṭhapentassa ovāde
atk-s0512a0:396_3: ṭhatvā nibbattadevatā sudhammāyaṃ devasabhāyaṃ sannipatitā “aho amhākaṃ nimirājānaṃ nissāya mayaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0512a0:396_5: evarūpāpi nāma anuppanne buddhe mahājanassa buddhakiccaṃ sādhayamānā acchariyamanussā loke uppajjantī”ti mahāpurisassa guṇe vaṇṇentā abhitthaviṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:400_0: Taṃ sutvā sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbe devā bodhisattaṃ daṭṭhukāmā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0512a0:400_1: Athekadivasaṃ mahāpurisassa uposathikassa uparipāsādavaragatassa pacchimayāme pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinnassa
atk-s0512a0:400_2: evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi “dānaṃ nu kho varaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:400_4: So taṃ attano kaṅkhaṃ chindituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0512a0:400_5: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakkassa bhavanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0512a0:400_6: Sakko taṃ kāraṇaṃ āvajjento bodhisattaṃ tathā vitakkentaṃ disvā “handassa vitakkaṃ chindissāmī”ti āgantvā
atk-s0512a0:400_7: purato ṭhito tena “kosi tva”nti puṭṭho attano devarājabhāvaṃ ārocetvā “kiṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0512a0:406_0: Tattha puthutitthāyatanesu methunaviratimattaṃ hīnaṃ brahmacariyaṃ nāma,
atk-s0512a0:406_8: Sāsane pana parisuddhasīlassa bhikkhuno aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ patthentassa brahmacariyacetanā hīnatāya hīnaṃ nāma,
atk-s0512a0:406_12: Parisuddhasīlassa pana vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattappatti uttamaṃ nāma,
atk-s0512a0:406_15: dānato brahmacariyavāsova sataguṇena sahassaguṇena satasahassaguṇena mahapphalo”ti vaṇṇesi.
atk-s0512a0:406_26: Dvīsupi appamatto hutvā dānañca dehi sīlañca rakkhāhī”ti vatvā taṃ ovaditvā sakaṭṭhānameva gato.
atk-s0512a0:407_2: Sakko “mithilāyaṃ nimirañño kaṅkha chinditu”nti tamatthaṃ pakāsetvā bodhisattassa guṇe vitthārato vaṇṇesi.
atk-s0512a0:407_8: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā rathena gantvā tattha mahāsattaṃ āropetvā tena yācito yathākammaṃ pāpakammīnaṃ
atk-s0512a0:407_9: puññakammīnañca ṭhānāni ācikkhanto anukkamena devalokaṃ nesi.
atk-s0512a0:407_10: Devāpi kho “nimirājā āgato”ti sutvā dibbagandhavāsapupphahatthā yāva cittakūṭadvārakoṭṭhakā paccuggantvā
atk-s0512a0:407_11: mahāsattaṃ dibbagandhādīhi pūjentā sudhammaṃ devasabhaṃ ānayiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:407_12: Rājā rathā otaritvā devasabhaṃ pavisitvā sakkena saddhiṃ ekāsane nisīditvā tena dibbehi kāmehi nimantiyamāno “alaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0512a0:407_13: mayhaṃ imehi yācitakūpamehi kāmehī”ti paṭikkhipitvā anekapariyāyena dhammaṃ desetvā manussagaṇanāya sattāhameva ṭhatvā “gacchāmahaṃ manussalokaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:407_16: So taṃ vejayantarathaṃ āropetvā pācīnadisābhāgena mithilaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0512a0:407_17: Mahājano dibbarathaṃ disvā rañño paccuggamanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0512a0:407_18: Mātali sīhapañjare mahāsattaṃ otāretvā āpucchitvā sakaṭṭhānameva gato.
atk-s0512a0:407_21: Rājā devalokasampattiṃ vaṇṇetvā “tumhepi dānādīni puññāni karotha,
atk-s0512a0:407_22: evaṃ tasmiṃ devaloke uppajjissathā”ti dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0512a0:407_23: So aparabhāge pubbe vuttanayena palitaṃ disvā puttassa rajjaṃ paṭicchāpetvā kāme pahāya pabbajitvā cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā brahmalokūpago ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:409_0: Tassa idhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva bodhisambhārā niddhāretabbā.
atk-s0512a0:409_1: Tathā brahmalokasampattiṃ pahāya pubbe attanā pavattitaṃ kalyāṇavattaṃ anuppabandhessāmīti mahākaruṇāya manussaloke nibbattanaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:409_7: tena dibbasampattiyā nimantiyamānopi taṃ analaṅkaritvā puññasambhāraparibrūhanatthaṃ puna manussavāsūpagamanaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:409_8: lābhasampattīsu sabbattha alaggabhāvoti evamādayo guṇānubhāvā niddhāretabbāti.
atk-s0512a0:412_1: Sattame ekarājassa atrajoti ekarājassa nāma kāsirañño orasaputto.
atk-s0512a0:413_0: Atīte kira ayaṃ bārāṇasī pupphavatī nāma ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:413_1: Tattha vasavattirañño putto ekarājā nāma rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0512a0:413_2: Bodhisatto tassa gotamiyā nāma aggamahesiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0512a0:413_4: Tassa padasā gamanakāle aparopi putto uppanno,
atk-s0512a0:413_6: Tassa padasā gamanakāle ekā dhītā uppannā,
atk-s0512a0:413_8: Vemātikā ca nesaṃ bhaddaseno sūro cāti dve bhātaro ahesuṃ.
atk-s0512a0:413_9: Bodhisatto anupubbena vuddhippatto sippesu ca vijjāṭṭhānesu ca pāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0512a0:413_10: Tassa rājā anucchavikaṃ candaṃ nāma rājadhītaraṃ ānetvā uparajjaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0512a0:413_13: Tassa pana rañño khaṇḍahālo nāma purohito,
atk-s0512a0:413_15: So lañjavittako hutvā lañjaṃ gahetvā assāmike sāmike karoti,
atk-s0512a0:413_17: Athekadivasaṃ aṭṭaparājito eko puriso vinicchayaṭṭhāne upakkosento nikkhamitvā rājūpaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantaṃ
atk-s0512a0:413_18: bodhisattaṃ disvā tassa pādesu nipatitvā “sāmi khaṇḍahālo vinicchaye vilopaṃ khādati,
atk-s0512a0:413_19: ahaṃ tena lañjaṃ gahetvā parājayaṃ pāpito”ti aṭṭassaramakāsi.
atk-s0512a0:413_20: Bodhisatto “mā bhāyī”ti taṃ assāsetvā vinicchayaṃ netvā sāmikameva sāmikaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0512a0:414_0: Rājā “bodhisattena kira aṭṭo suvinicchito”ti sutvā taṃ āmantetvā “tāta,
atk-s0512a0:414_1: ito paṭṭhāya tvameva aṭṭakaraṇe vinicchayaṃ vinicchināhī”ti vinicchayaṃ bodhisattassa adāsi.
atk-s0512a0:414_3: So tato paṭṭhāya bodhisatte āghātaṃ bandhitvā otārāpekkho vicari.
atk-s0512a0:414_5: So ekadivasaṃ supinantena devalokaṃ passitvā tattha gantukāmo hutvā “purohitaṃ brahmalokagāmimaggaṃ ācikkhā”ti āha.
atk-s0512a0:414_6: So “atidānaṃ dadanto sabbacatukkena yaññaṃ yajassū”ti vatvā raññā “kiṃ atidāna”nti puṭṭho “attano piyaputtā
atk-s0512a0:414_7: piyabhariyā piyadhītaro mahāvibhavaseṭṭhino maṅgalahatthiassādayoti ete cattāro cattāro katvā dvipadacatuppade
atk-s0512a0:414_8: yaññatthāya pariccajitvā tesaṃ galalohitena yajanaṃ atidānaṃ nāmā”ti saññāpesi.
atk-s0512a0:415_0: Rājāpi tasmiṃ paṇḍitasaññī hutvā “tena vuttavidhi saggamaggo”ti saññāya taṃ paṭipajjitukāmo mahantaṃ
atk-s0512a0:415_1: yaññāvāṭaṃ kārāpetvā tattha bodhisattādike cattāro rājakumāre ādiṃ katvā khaṇḍahālena vuttaṃ sabbaṃ dvipadacatuppadaṃ
atk-s0512a0:415_4: Taṃ sutvā mahājano mahantaṃ kolāhalaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0512a0:415_5: Rājā vippaṭisārī hutvā khaṇḍahālena upatthambhito punapi tathā taṃ āṇāpesi.
atk-s0512a0:415_6: Bodhisatto “khaṇḍahālena vinicchayaṭṭhānaṃ alabhantena mayi āghātaṃ bandhitvā mameva maraṇaṃ icchantena
atk-s0512a0:415_7: mahājanassa anayabyasanaṃ uppādita”nti jānitvā nānāvidhehi upāyehi rājānaṃ tato duggahitaggāhato vivecetuṃ
atk-s0512a0:415_13: Khaṇḍahālo suvaṇṇapātiṃ upanāmetvā khaggaṃ ādāya “tassa gīvaṃ chindissāmī”ti aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0512a0:415_14: Taṃ disvā candā nāma rājaputtassa devī “aññaṃ me paṭisaraṇaṃ natthi,
atk-s0512a0:415_15: attano saccabalena sāmikassa sotthiṃ karissāmī”ti añjaliṃ paggayha parisāya antare vicarantī “idaṃ ekanteneva pāpakammaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:415_17: Iminā mayhaṃ saccavacanena mama sāmikassa sotthi hotu.
atk-s0512a0:416_0: “Yā devatā idha loke, sabbā tā saraṇaṃ gatā;
atk-s0512a0:417_0: Anāthaṃ tāyatha mamaṃ, yathāhaṃ patimā siya”nti. –
atk-s0512a0:418_1: Sakko devarājā tassā paridevanasaddaṃ sutvā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā jalitaṃ ayokūṭaṃ ādāya āgantvā rājānaṃ tāsetvā sabbe vissajjāpesi.
atk-s0512a0:418_2: Sakkopi tadā attano dibbarūpaṃ dassetvā sampajjalitaṃ sajotibhūtaṃ vajiraṃ paribbhamanto “are,
atk-s0512a0:418_5: candakumāraṃ sabbañca imaṃ janaṃ bandhanato mocehi,
atk-s0512a0:418_7: ettheva te imassa ca duṭṭhabrāhmaṇassa sīsaṃ phālessāmī”ti ākāse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0512a0:418_8: Taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā rājā brāhmaṇo ca sīghaṃ sabbe bandhanā mocesuṃ.
atk-s0512a0:419_0: Atha mahājano ekakolāhalaṃ katvā sahasā yaññāvāṭaṃ ajjhottharitvā khaṇḍahālassa ekekaṃ leḍḍuppahāraṃ
atk-s0512a0:419_1: dento tattheva naṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā rājānampi māretuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0512a0:419_2: Bodhisatto puretarameva pitaraṃ palissajitvā ṭhito māretuṃ na adāsi.
atk-s0512a0:419_6: taṃ caṇḍālaṃ katvā bahinagare vāsāpessāmā”ti rājavesaṃ hāretvā kāsāvaṃ nivāsāpetvā haliddipilotikāya
atk-s0512a0:419_7: sīsaṃ veṭhetvā caṇḍālaṃ katvā caṇḍālagāmaṃ pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:419_8: Ye pana taṃ pasughātayaññaṃ yajiṃsu ceva yajāpesuñca anumodiṃsu ca,
atk-s0512a0:420_0: “Sabbe patiṭṭhā nirayaṃ, yathā taṃ pāpakaṃ karitvāna;
atk-s0512a0:421_0: Na hi pāpakammaṃ katvā, labbhā sugatiṃ ito gantu”nti. ;
atk-s0512a0:422_0: Atha sabbāpi rājaparisā nāgarā ceva jānapadā ca samāgantvā bodhisattaṃ rajje abhisiñciṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:422_1: So dhammena rajjaṃ anusāsanto taṃ attano mahājanassa ca akāraṇeneva uppannaṃ anayabyasanaṃ anussaritvā
atk-s0512a0:422_2: saṃvegajāto puññakiriyāsu bhiyyosomattāya ussāhajāto mahādānaṃ pavattesi,
atk-s0512a0:426_0: Tattha yajanā muttoti khaṇḍahālena vihitayaññavidhito vuttanayena ghātetabbato mutto.
atk-s0512a0:426_1: Nikkhanto yaññavāṭatoti abhisekakaraṇatthāya ussāhajātena mahājanena saddhiṃ tato yaññabhūmito niggato.
atk-s0512a0:426_2: Saṃvegaṃ janayitvānāti evaṃ “bahuantarāyo lokasannivāso”ti ativiya saṃvegaṃ uppādetvā.
atk-s0512a0:426_3: Mahādānaṃ pavattayinti cha dānasālāyo kārāpetvā mahatā dhanapariccāgena vessantaradānasadisaṃ mahādānamadāsiṃ.
atk-s0512a0:426_4: Etena abhisekakaraṇato paṭṭhāya tassa mahādānassa pavattitabhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0512a0:427_1: Dakkhiṇeyye adatvānāti dakkhiṇārahe puggale deyyadhammaṃ apariccajitvā.
