atk-s0512a0:925_0: Tena ca samayena aññataro tāpaso supaṇṇarājato laddhaṃ alampāyanamantaṃ tassa anucchavikāni osadhāni
atk-s0512a0:925_1: mantūpacārañca attānaṃ upaṭṭhahantassa aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa adāsi.
atk-s0512a0:925_2: So “laddho me jīvikūpāyo”ti katipāhaṃ vasitvā tāpasaṃ āpucchitvā pakkamanto anupubbena yamunātīraṃ patvā taṃ mantaṃ sajjhāyanto mahāmaggena gacchati.
atk-s0512a0:925_3: Tadā bodhisattassa bhavanato tassa paricārikā nāgamāṇavikā taṃ sabbakāmadadaṃ maṇiratanaṃ ādāya yamunātīre
atk-s0512a0:925_4: vālukārāsimatthake ṭhapetvā tassobhāsena rattiyaṃ kīḷitvā aruṇuggamane tassa brāhmaṇassa mantasaddaṃ
atk-s0512a0:925_5: sutvā “supaṇṇo”ti saññāya bhayatajjitā maṇiratanaṃ aggahetvā pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā nāgabhavanaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:926_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe so nesādabrāhmaṇo puttena saddhiṃ migavadhāya araññaṃ gacchanto tassa hatthe taṃ maṇiratanaṃ
atk-s0512a0:926_2: disvā “idaṃ bhūridattassa sabbakāmadadaṃ maṇiratana”nti sañjānitvā taṃ gaṇhitukāmo tena saddhiṃ allāpasallāpaṃ
atk-s0512a0:926_6: yaṃ tvaṃ gahetvā gāmanigamarājadhāniyo caranto bahudhanaṃ lacchasī”ti.
atk-s0512a0:926_7: “Tena hi dassetvā gaṇhāhī”ti vutte taṃ ādāya bodhisattaṃ uposathakaraṇaṭṭhāne vammikamatthake bhoge ābhujitvā
atk-s0512a0:926_8: nipannaṃ avidūre ṭhito hatthaṃ pasāretvā dassesi.
atk-s0512a0:927_0: Mahāsatto taṃ nesādaṃ disvā “ayaṃ uposathassa me antarāyaṃ kareyyāti nāgabhavanaṃ netvā mahāsampattiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpitopi na icchi.
atk-s0512a0:927_1: Tato apakkamitvā sayaṃ gantukāmo mayā dīyamānampi maṇiratanaṃ gaṇhituṃ na icchi.
atk-s0512a0:927_5: Mayā kho pana paṭhamaṃyeva caturaṅgasamannāgato uposatho adhiṭṭhito,
atk-s0512a0:927_7: Alampāyano maṃ chindatu vā mā vā,
atk-s0512a0:927_8: nevassa kujjhissāmī”ti cintetvā akkhīni nimmīletvā adhiṭṭhānapāramiṃ purecārikaṃ katvā bhogantare sīsaṃ pakkhipitvā niccalova hutvā nipajji.
atk-s0512a0:927_12: Alampāyano nāgaṃ disvā tuṭṭho maṇiṃ kismiñci agaṇetvā “gaṇha,
atk-s0512a0:927_14: So tassa hatthato bhassitvā pathaviyaṃ patitamattova pathaviṃ pavisitvā nāgabhavanameva gato.
atk-s0512a0:927_15: Nesādabrāhmaṇo maṇiratanato bhūridattena saddhiṃ mittabhāvato ca parihāyitvā nippaccayova pakkanto.
atk-s0512a0:928_1: Alampāyanopi mahānubhāvehi osadhehi attano sarīraṃ makkhetvā thokaṃ khāditvā kheḷaṃ attano kāyasmiṃ paribhāvetvā
atk-s0512a0:928_2: dibbamantaṃ jappanto bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā naṅguṭṭhe gahetvā ākaḍḍhitvā sīse daḷhaṃ gaṇhanto mukhamassa
atk-s0512a0:928_3: vivaritvā osadhaṃ khāditvā mukhe sahakheḷaṃ osiñci.
atk-s0512a0:928_4: Sucijātiko mahāsatto sīlabhedabhayena akujjhitvā akkhīni na ummīlesi.
atk-s0512a0:928_5: Atha naṃ osadhamantabalena naṅguṭṭhe gahetvā heṭṭhā sīsaṃ katvā sañcāletvā gahitagocaraṃ chaḍḍāpetvā
atk-s0512a0:928_6: bhūmiyaṃ dīghaso nipajjāpetvā masūrakaṃ maddanto viya hatthehi parimaddi.
atk-s0512a0:929_0: Puna naṅguṭṭhe gahetvā dussaṃ pothento viya pothesi.
atk-s0512a0:929_1: Mahāsatto evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhontopi neva kujjhittha.
atk-s0512a0:929_3: Iti so mahāsattaṃ dubbalaṃ katvā vallīhi peḷaṃ sajjetvā mahāsattaṃ tattha pakkhipi.
atk-s0512a0:929_4: Sarīraṃ panassa mahantaṃ tattha na pavisati.
atk-s0512a0:929_5: Atha naṃ paṇhiyā koṭṭento pavesetvā peḷaṃ ādāya ekaṃ gāmaṃ gantvā gāmamajjhe otāretvā “nāgassa naccaṃ daṭṭhukāmā āgacchantū”ti saddamakāsi.
atk-s0512a0:929_10: evaṃ alampāyano bahudhanaṃ labhitvā tuṭṭho maṃ vissajjessati,
atk-s0512a0:930_0: Atha naṃ so peḷato nikkhamantaṃ “mahā hohī”ti āha,
atk-s0512a0:930_2: “Khuddako vaṭṭo viphaṇo ekaphaṇo dviphaṇo yāva sahassaphaṇo ucco nīco dissamānakāyo adissamānakāyo dissamānaupaḍḍhakāyo
atk-s0512a0:930_3: nīlo pīto lohito odāto mañjiṭṭho hohi,
atk-s0512a0:930_5: jālasikhaṃ udakañca vissajjehī”ti vutte tena vuttaṃ taṃ taṃ ākāraṃ nimminitvā naccaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0512a0:930_6: Taṃ disvā manussā acchariyabbhutacittajātā bahuṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇavatthālaṅkārādiṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:930_8: So kiñcāpi mahāsattaṃ gaṇhanto “sahassaṃ labhitvā taṃ vissajjessāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0512a0:930_9: Taṃ pana dhanaṃ labhitvā “gāmakepi tāva mayā ettakaṃ dhanaṃ laddhaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:930_10: nagare kira bahudhanaṃ labhissāmī”ti dhanalobhena na muñci.
atk-s0512a0:931_0: So tasmiṃ gāme kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapetvā ratanamayaṃ peḷaṃ kāretvā tattha mahāsattaṃ pakkhipitvā sukhayānakaṃ
atk-s0512a0:931_1: āruyha mahantena parivārena gāmanigamarājadhānīsu taṃ kīḷāpetvā bārāṇasiṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0512a0:931_5: Gocaraṃ agaṇhantampi ca naṃ cattāro nagaradvāre ādiṃ katvā tattha tattha māsamattaṃ kīḷāpesi.
atk-s0512a0:932_0: Tattha saṃsitoti eso nāgo amukassa nigrodharukkhassa samīpe vammikamatthake sayitoti evaṃ ṭhānaṃ dassetvā kathito.
atk-s0512a0:932_1: Akataññunāti attanā kataṃ upakāraṃ ajānantena mittadubbhinā nesādabrāhmaṇenāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0512a0:932_4: Kīḷeti maṃ tahiṃ tahinti tattha tattha gāmanigamarājadhānīsu attano jīvikatthaṃ maṃ kīḷāpeti.
atk-s0512a0:933_1: Tiṇatopi lahuko mamāti attano jīvitapariccāgo tiṇasalākapariccāgatopi lahuko hutvā mama upaṭṭhātīti attho.
atk-s0512a0:933_3: parivattanaṃ viya tatopi taṃ bhāriyataraṃ hutvā mayhaṃ upaṭṭhātīti dasseti.
atk-s0512a0:934_1: Nirantaraṃ jātisatanti mama jātīnaṃ anekasatampi anekasatāsupi jātīsu nirantarameva sīlassa avītikkamanahetu.
atk-s0512a0:934_3: Neva sīlaṃ pabhindeyyanti sīlaṃ pana samādinnaṃ ekampi neva bhindeyyaṃ na vināseyyaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:935_1: Idāni yadatthaṃ attano jīvitampi pariccajitvā tadā sīlameva rakkhitaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:935_2: tāya ca sīlarakkhāya tathā anatthakārakesu nesādaalampāyanabrāhmaṇesu cittassa aññathattaṃ na kataṃ,
atk-s0512a0:936_0: Evaṃ pana mahāsatte ahituṇḍikahatthagate tassa mātā dussupinaṃ disvā puttañca tattha apassantī sokābhibhūtā ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:936_1: Athassā jeṭṭhaputto sudassano taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā subhogaṃ “himavantaṃ gantvā pañcasu mahānadīsu sattasu
atk-s0512a0:936_3: Kāṇāriṭṭhaṃ “devalokaṃ gantvā sace devatāhi dhammaṃ sotukāmāhi bhūridatto tattha nīto,
atk-s0512a0:936_5: Sayaṃ pana “manussaloke gavesissāmī”ti tāpasavesena nāgabhavanato nikkhami.
atk-s0512a0:936_6: Accimukhī nāmassa vemātikā bhaginī bodhisatte adhimattasinehā taṃ anubandhi.
atk-s0512a0:936_7: Taṃ maṇḍūkacchāpiṃ katvā jaṭantare pakkhipitvā mahāsattassa uposathakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbattha
atk-s0512a0:936_8: gavesanto anukkamena bārāṇasiṃ patvā rājadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0512a0:936_9: Tadā alampāyano rājaṅgaṇe mahājanassa majjhe rañño bhūridattassa kīḷaṃ dassetuṃ peḷaṃ vivaritvā “ehi mahānāgā”ti saññamadāsi.
atk-s0512a0:937_0: Mahāsatto sīsaṃ nīharitvā olokento jeṭṭhabhātikaṃ disvā peḷato nikkhamma tadabhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0512a0:937_2: So gantvā taṃ abhivādetvā nivattitvā peḷameva pāvisi.
atk-s0512a0:937_3: Alampāyano “iminā ayaṃ tāpaso daṭṭho”ti saññāya “mā bhāyi,
atk-s0512a0:937_6: mayā sadiso ahituṇḍiko nāma natthī”ti tena vādappaṭivādaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā “tvaṃ imaṃ nāgaṃ gahetvā gajjasi,
atk-s0512a0:937_7: ahaṃ taṃ imāya maṇḍūkacchāpiyā icchanto nāsayissāmī”ti bhaginiṃ pakkositvā hatthaṃ pasāresi.
atk-s0512a0:937_8: Sā tassa saddaṃ sutvā jaṭantare nipannā tikkhattuṃ maṇḍūkavassitaṃ vassitvā nikkhamitvā aṃsakūṭe nisīditvā
atk-s0512a0:937_9: uppatitvā tassa hatthatale tīṇi visabindūni pātetvā puna tassa jaṭantarameva pāvisi.
atk-s0512a0:938_0: Sudassano visabinduṃ dassetvā “idaṃ binduṃ sace pathaviyaṃ pātessati,
atk-s0512a0:938_5: yāvatā tattha udakajātā pāṇā sabbe mareyyu”nti vatvā rājānaṃ saddahāpetuṃ tayo āvāṭe khaṇāpetvā ekaṃ nānābhesajjānaṃ pūresi,
atk-s0512a0:938_7: tatiyaṃ dibbosadhānañceva pūretvā majjhe āvāṭe visabinduṃ pakkhipi.
atk-s0512a0:938_10: Tatopi jālā uṭṭhāya dibbosadhapuṇṇaṃ gahetvā dibbosadhāni jhāpetvā nibbāyi.
atk-s0512a0:938_11: Alampāyanaṃ tattha āvāṭassa avidūre ṭhitaṃ usumā pharitvā sarīracchaviṃ uppāṭetvā gatā.
atk-s0512a0:938_13: So bhayatajjito “nāgarājānaṃ vissajjemī”ti tikkhattuṃ vācaṃ nicchāresi.
atk-s0512a0:938_14: Taṃ sutvā bodhisatto ratanapeḷāya nikkhamitvā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ attabhāvaṃ māpetvā devalīḷāya ṭhito.
atk-s0512a0:938_15: Sudassano ca accimukhī ca tatheva aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:939_0: Tato sudassano attano bhāgineyyabhāvaṃ rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0512a0:939_1: Taṃ sutvā rājā te āliṅgitvā sīse cumbitvā antepuraṃ netvā mahantaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ katvā bhūridattena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karonto “tāta,
atk-s0512a0:939_2: evaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ taṃ alampāyano kathaṃ gaṇhī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0512a0:939_4: raññā nāma iminā niyāmena rajjaṃ kāretuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti mātulassa dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0512a0:939_7: na sakkā amhehi idha papañcaṃ kātu”nti mātulaṃ āpucchitvā bhūridattaaccimukhīhi saddhiṃ nāgabhavanameva gato.
atk-s0512a0:940_0: Atha tattha mahāpuriso gilānaseyyāya nipanno gilānapucchanatthaṃ āgatāya mahatiyā nāgaparisāya vede ca
atk-s0512a0:940_1: yaññe ca brāhmaṇe ca sambhāvetvā kāṇāriṭṭhe kathente taṃ vādaṃ bhinditvā nānānayehi dhammaṃ desetvā sīlasampadāya
atk-s0512a0:940_2: diṭṭhisampadāya ca patiṭṭhāpetvā yāvajīvaṃ sīlāni rakkhitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā āyupariyosāne saggapuraṃ pūresi.
atk-s0512a0:942_0: Tassa idhāpi sesapāramiyo heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva niddhāretabbā.
atk-s0512a0:942_1: Idhāpi yojanasatike attano nāgabhavanaṭṭhāne soḷasahi nāgakaññāsahassehi cittarūpaṃ viya paricāriyamāno
atk-s0512a0:942_2: devalokasampattisadise nāgalokissariye ṭhitopi issariyamadaṃ akatvā anvaddhamāsaṃ mātāpituupaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:942_4: sakalāya nāgaparisāya cātumahārājikaparisāya tāvatiṃsaparisāya ca samuṭṭhitapañhānaṃ taṃtaṃparisamajjhe
atk-s0512a0:942_5: kumudanālakalāpaṃ viya sunisitasatthena attano paññāsatthena tāvadeva pacchinditvā tesaṃ cittānukūladhammadesanā,
atk-s0512a0:942_6: vuttappakāraṃ bhogasampattiṃ pahāya attano sarīrajīvitanirapekkhaṃ caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ uposathādhiṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:942_8: tasmiñca mukhe visamissakheḷapātanaṃ naṅguṭṭhe gahetvā āviñchanaṃ kaḍḍhanaṃ bhūmiyaṃ ghaṃsanaṃ maddanaṃ
atk-s0512a0:942_9: pothananti evamādiṃ nānappakāravippakāraṃ karontepi evarūpaṃ mahādukkhaṃ anubhavatopi kujjhitvā olokanamattena
atk-s0512a0:942_10: taṃ chārikaṃ kātuṃ samatthassāpi sīlapāramiṃ āvajjitvā sīlakhaṇḍanabhayena īsakampi cittassa vikārābhāvo,
atk-s0512a0:942_12: subhogena punānītassa akataññuno mittadubbhissa nesādabrāhmaṇassa sīlaṃ anadhiṭṭhahitvāpi akujjhanaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:942_13: kāṇāriṭṭhena kathitaṃ micchāvādaṃ bhinditvā anekapariyāyena dhammaṃ bhāsitvā nāgaparisāya sīlesu sammādiṭṭhiyañca
atk-s0512a0:945_1: Tatiye campeyyakoti aṅgamagadharaṭṭhānaṃ antare campā nāma nadī,
atk-s0512a0:945_2: tassā heṭṭhā nāgabhavanampi avidūrabhavattā campā nāma,
atk-s0512a0:945_4: Tadāpi dhammiko āsinti tasmiṃ campeyyanāgarājakālepi ahaṃ dhammacārī ahosiṃ.
atk-s0512a0:946_0: Bodhisatto hi tadā campānāgabhavane nibbattitvā campeyyo nāma nāgarājā ahosi,
atk-s0512a0:946_2: So tattha nāgarajjaṃ kārento devarājabhogasampattisadisaissariyasampattiṃ anubhavanto pāramipūraṇassa anokāsabhāvato “kiṃ me imāya tiracchānayoniyā,
atk-s0512a0:946_3: uposathavāsaṃ vasitvā ito muccitvā sammadeva pāramiyo pūressāmī”ti tato paṭṭhāya attano pāsādeyeva uposathakammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0512a0:946_5: So “idha me sīlassa antarāyo bhavissatī”ti pāsādato nikkhamitvā uyyāne nisīdati.
atk-s0512a0:946_9: ito nāgabhavanato nikkhamitvā manussalokaṃ gantvā uposathavāsaṃ vasissāmī”ti.
atk-s0512a0:946_10: So tato paṭṭhāya uposathadivasesu nāgabhavanā nikkhamitvā ekassa paccantagāmassa avidūre maggasamīpe
atk-s0512a0:946_12: kīḷāsappaṃ vā kātukāmā kīḷāsappaṃ karontū”ti sarīraṃ dānamukhe vissajjetvā bhoge ābhujitvā nipanno uposathavāsaṃ vasati cātuddasiyaṃ pañcadasiyañca,
atk-s0512a0:946_14: Tassevaṃ uposathaṃ karontassa dīgho addhā vītivatto.
atk-s0512a0:947_0: Atha bodhisatto sumanāya nāma attano aggamahesiyā “deva,
atk-s0512a0:947_2: so ca sāsaṅko sappaṭibhayo”ti vutto maṅgalapokkharaṇitīre ṭhatvā “sace maṃ, bhadde,
atk-s0512a0:947_8: udakaṃ lohitavaṇṇaṃ bhavissatī”ti tīṇi nimittāni tassā ācikkhitvā cātuddasīuposathaṃ adhiṭṭhāya nāgabhavanā
atk-s0512a0:947_9: nikkhamitvā tattha gantvā vammikamatthake nipajji sarīrasobhāya vammikaṃ sobhayamāno.
atk-s0512a0:948_0: Tadā eko bārāṇasimāṇavo takkasilaṃ gantvā alampāyanamantaṃ uggaṇhitvā tena maggena attano gāmaṃ gacchanto
atk-s0512a0:948_1: mahāsattaṃ disvā “kiṃ me tucchahatthena gāmaṃ gantuṃ,
atk-s0512a0:948_2: imaṃ nāgaṃ gahetvā gāmanigamarājadhānīsu kīḷāpento dhanaṃ uppādetvāva gamissāmī”ti cintetvā dibbosadhāni
atk-s0512a0:948_3: gahetvā dibbamantaṃ parivattetvā tassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0512a0:948_4: Dibbamantaṃ sutakālato paṭṭhāya mahāsattassa kaṇṇesu tattasalākāpavesanakālo viya ahosi,
atk-s0512a0:948_6: So “ko nu kho eso”ti bhogantarato sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā olokento ahituṇḍikaṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0512a0:948_12: So akkhīni nimmīletvā sīsaṃ bhogantare ṭhapesi.
atk-s0512a0:948_13: Ahituṇḍikabrāhmaṇo osadhaṃ khāditvā mantaṃ parivattetvā kheḷaṃ mahāsattassa sarīre osiñci.
atk-s0512a0:948_14: Osadhānañca mantassa ca ānubhāvena kheḷena phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāne phoṭānaṃ uṭṭhānakālo viya ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:949_0: Atha so naṅguṭṭhe gahetvā ākaḍḍhitvā dīghaso nipajjāpetvā ajapadena daṇḍena uppīḷetvā dubbalaṃ katvā sīsaṃ daḷhaṃ gahetvā nippīḷesi.
atk-s0512a0:949_2: Athassa mukhe kheḷaṃ osiñcitvā osadhamantabalena dante bhindi.
atk-s0512a0:949_4: Mahāsatto attano sīlabhedabhayena evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ adhivāsento akkhīni ummīletvā olokanamattampi nākāsi.
atk-s0512a0:949_5: Sopi “nāgarājānaṃ dubbalaṃ karissāmī”ti naṅguṭṭhato paṭṭhāya aṭṭhīni saṃcuṇṇayamāno viya sakalasarīraṃ madditvā paṭṭakaveṭhanaṃ nāma veṭhesi,
atk-s0512a0:950_0: Athassa dubbalabhāvaṃ ñatvā vallīhi peḷaṃ karitvā tattha naṃ pakkhipitvā paccantagāmaṃ netvā mahājanassa majjhe kīḷāpesi.
atk-s0512a0:950_1: Nīlādīsu vaṇṇesu vaṭṭacaturassādīsu saṇṭhānesu aṇuṃthūlādīsu pamāṇesu yaṃ yaṃ brāhmaṇo icchati,
atk-s0512a0:950_5: Ekadivasameva kahāpaṇasahassañceva sahassagghanike ca parikkhāre labhi.
atk-s0512a0:950_7: Taṃ pana dhanaṃ labhitvā “paccantagāmeyeva tāva me ettakaṃ dhanaṃ laddhaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:950_8: rājarājamahāmattānaṃ dassite kīva bahuṃ dhanaṃ labhissāmī”ti sakaṭañca sukhayānakañca gahetvā sakaṭe
atk-s0512a0:950_9: parikkhāre ṭhapetvā sukhayānake nisinno “mahantena parivārena mahāsattaṃ gāmanigamarājadhānīsu kīḷāpento
atk-s0512a0:950_10: bārāṇasiyaṃ uggasenarañño santike kīḷāpetvā vissajjessāmī”ti agamāsi.
atk-s0512a0:950_12: Nāgarājā “punappunaṃ maṃ nissāya māressatī”ti na khādati.
atk-s0512a0:951_1: Brāhmaṇo māsamattena bārāṇasiṃ patvā dvāragāmake taṃ kīḷāpento bahudhanaṃ labhi.
atk-s0512a0:951_2: Rājāpi naṃ pakkosāpetvā “amhākampi kīḷāpehī”ti āha. “Sādhu, deva,
atk-s0512a0:951_5: mahājano sannipatitvā passatū”ti bheriṃ carāpetvā punadivase rājaṅgaṇaṃ alaṅkārāpetvā brāhmaṇaṃ pakkosāpesi.
atk-s0512a0:951_6: So ratanapeḷāya mahāsattaṃ netvā vicittatthare peḷaṃ ṭhapetvā nisīdi.
atk-s0512a0:951_7: Rājāpi pāsādā oruyha mahājanaparivuto rājāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0512a0:952_0: Tattha tadāpīti yadāhaṃ campeyyako nāgarājā homi, tadāpi.
atk-s0512a0:952_4: Rājadvāramhi kīḷatīti bārāṇasiyaṃ uggasenarañño gehadvāre kīḷāpeti.
atk-s0512a0:953_1: Yaṃ yaṃ so vaṇṇaṃ cintayīti so ahituṇḍikabrāhmaṇo “yaṃ yaṃ nīlādivaṇṇaṃ hotū”ti cintesi.
atk-s0512a0:953_6: tena vāsaddena vuttāvasiṭṭhaṃ odātādivaṇṇavisesañceva vaṭṭādisaṇṭhānavisesañca aṇuṃthūlādipamāṇavisesañca saṅgaṇhāti.
atk-s0512a0:953_7: Tassa cittānuvattantoti tassa ahituṇḍikassa cittaṃ anuvattanto.
atk-s0512a0:953_8: Cintitasannibhoti tena cintitacintitākārena pekkhajanassa upaṭṭhahāmīti dasseti.
atk-s0512a0:954_1: Na kevalañca tena cintitākāradassanaṃ eva mayhaṃ ānubhāvo.
atk-s0512a0:954_3: udakampi thalaṃ kareti thalaṃ mahāpathaviṃ gahetvā udakaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:954_4: udakampi gahetvā pathaviṃ kātuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ evaṃ mahānubhāvo ca.
atk-s0512a0:954_5: Yadihaṃ tassa kuppeyyanti tassa ahituṇḍikassa ahaṃ yadi kujjheyyaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:954_6: Khaṇena chārikaṃ kareti kodhuppādakkhaṇe eva bhasmaṃ kareyyaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:955_1: Evaṃ bhagavā tadā attano uppajjanakānatthapaṭibāhane samatthataṃ dassetvā idāni yena adhippāyena taṃ paṭibāhanaṃ na kataṃ,
atk-s0512a0:956_3: handassa me ānubhāvaṃ dassessāmī”ti kujjhitvā olokanamattenāpi yadi cittavasī abhavissaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:956_6: Tathā ca sati sīlena parihīnassa khaṇḍitasīlassa yvāyaṃ mayā dīpaṅkaradasabalassa pādamūlato paṭṭhāya abhipatthito,
atk-s0512a0:957_1: Kāmaṃ bhijjatuyaṃ kāyoti ayaṃ cātumahābhūtiko odanakummāsūpacayo aniccucchādanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhaṃsanadhammo kāyo kiñcāpi bhijjatu vinassatu,
atk-s0512a0:957_2: idheva imasmiṃ eva ṭhāne mahāvāte khittabhusamuṭṭhi viya vippakirīyatu,
atk-s0512a0:957_4: vikirante bhusaṃ viyāti sīlaṃ pana uttamatthasiddhiyā hetubhūtaṃ imasmiṃ kaḷevare bhusamuṭṭhi viya vippakirantepi neva bhindeyyaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:957_5: kāyajīvitesu nirapekkho hutvā sīlapāramiṃyeva pūremīti cintetvā taṃ tādisaṃ dukkhaṃ tadā adhivāsesinti dasseti.
atk-s0512a0:958_0: Atha mahāsattassa pana ahituṇḍikahatthagatassa māso paripūri,
atk-s0512a0:958_3: ko nu kho pavattī”ti pokkharaṇiṃ olokentī lohitavaṇṇaṃ udakaṃ disvā “ahituṇḍikena gahito bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0512a0:958_4: ñatvā nāgabhavanā nikkhamitvā vammikasantikaṃ gantvā mahāsattassa gahitaṭṭhānaṃ kilamitaṭṭhānañca disvā
atk-s0512a0:958_5: roditvā kanditvā paccantagāmaṃ gantvā pucchitvā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā bārāṇasiṃ gantvā rājadvāre ākāse rodamānā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0512a0:958_6: Mahāsatto naccantova ākāsaṃ ullokento taṃ disvā lajjito peḷaṃ pavisitvā nipajji.
atk-s0512a0:959_0: Rājā tassa peḷaṃ paviṭṭhakāle “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti ito cito ca olokento taṃ ākāse ṭhitaṃ disvā “kā
atk-s0512a0:959_1: nu tva”nti pucchitvā tassā nāgakaññābhāvaṃ sutvā “nissaṃsayaṃ kho nāgarājā imaṃ disvā lajjito peḷaṃ paviṭṭho,
atk-s0512a0:959_3: na ahituṇḍikassā”ti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā “evaṃ mahānubhāvo ayaṃ nāgarājā,
atk-s0512a0:959_4: kathaṃ nāma imassa hatthaṃ gato”ti pucchitvā “ayaṃ dhammacārī sīlavā nāgarājā,
atk-s0512a0:959_5: cātuddasīpannarasīsu uposathaṃ upavasanto attano sarīraṃ dānamukhe niyyātetvā mahāmaggasamīpe vammikamatthake nipajjati,
atk-s0512a0:959_9: ayaṃ mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo sakalapathaviṃ parivattetuṃ samattho,
atk-s0512a0:959_10: kevalaṃ ‘sīlaṃ me bhijjissatī’ti evarūpaṃ vippakāraṃ dukkhañca anubhotī”ti ca sutvā saṃvegappatto tāvadeva
atk-s0512a0:959_11: tassa ahituṇḍikassa brāhmaṇassa bahuṃ dhanaṃ mahantañca yasaṃ issariyañca datvā – “handa, bho,
atk-s0512a0:960_0: Mahāsatto nāgavaṇṇaṃ antaradhāpetvā māṇavakavaṇṇena devakumāro viya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0512a0:960_1: Sumanāpi ākāsato otaritvā tassa santike aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0512a0:963_0: Añjaliṃ te paggaṇhāmi, passeyyaṃ me nivesana”nti.
atk-s0512a0:964_1: Mahāsatto taṃ saparisaṃ gahetvā nāgabhavanaṃ netvā attano issariyasampattiṃ dassetvā katipāhaṃ tattha vasāpetvā bheriṃ carāpesi –
atk-s0512a0:964_3: Rañño ca anekehi sakaṭasatehi dhanaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0512a0:964_7: dhammikā rakkhāvaraṇagutti sabbattha saṃvidahitabbā”ti dasahi rājadhammakathāhi ovaditvā vissajjesi.
atk-s0512a0:964_8: Rājā mahantena yasena nāgabhavanā nikkhamitvā bārāṇasimeva gato.
atk-s0512a0:964_9: Tato paṭṭhāya kira jambudīpatale hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:964_10: Mahāsatto sīlāni rakkhitvā anvaddhamāsaṃ uposathakammaṃ katvā sapariso saggapuraṃ pūresi.
atk-s0512a0:966_1: Idha bodhisattassa acchariyānubhāvā heṭṭhā vuttanayā evāti.
atk-s0512a0:969_1: Catutthe cūḷabodhīti mahābodhiparibbājakattabhāvaṃ upādāya idha “cūḷabodhī”ti samaññā āropitā,
atk-s0512a0:969_2: na pana imasmiṃ eva jātake attano jeṭṭhabhātikādino mahābodhissa sambhavatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:969_5: Bhavaṃ disvāna bhayatoti kāmādibhavaṃ bhāyitabbabhāvena passitvā.
atk-s0512a0:969_12: paccuppanne āhārapariyeṭṭhimūlakaṃ dukkhanti imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ saṃvegavatthūnaṃ paccavekkhaṇena sabbampi
atk-s0512a0:969_13: kāmādibhedaṃ bhavaṃ saṃsārabhayato upaṭṭhahamānaṃ disvā nibbānaṃ tassa upāyabhūtā samathavipassanā tadupāyabhūtā
atk-s0512a0:969_14: ca pabbajjāti idaṃ tividhampi nekkhammaṃ anussavādisiddhena ñāṇacakkhunā tappaṭipakkhato disvā tāpasapabbajjūpagamanena
atk-s0512a0:971_3: Tato eva ñātīsu taṇhābandhanassa chinnattā chinnabandhu.
atk-s0512a0:971_4: Evaṃ gihibandhanābhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni pabbajitānampi kesañci yaṃ hoti bandhanaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:971_5: tassāpi abhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “anapekkhā kule gaṇe”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:972_4: appasaddeti migapakkhīnaṃ uṭṭhāpanato tesaṃ vassitasaddenāpi virahitattā appasadde.
atk-s0512a0:972_5: Rājuyyāne vasāmubhoti bārāṇasirañño uyyāne mayaṃ ubho janā tadā vasāma.
atk-s0512a0:973_1: atīte imasmiṃ eva bhaddakappe bodhisatto brahmalokato cavitvā aññatarasmiṃ kāsigāme ekassa mahāvibhavassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0512a0:973_3: Vayappattakāle panassa takkasilaṃ gantvā sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā paccāgatassa anicchamānakasseva mātāpitaro samajātikaṃ kulakumārikaṃ ānesuṃ.
atk-s0512a0:973_5: Tesaṃ anicchamānānaṃ eva aññamaññaṃ āvāhavivāhaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:973_6: Ubhinnampi pana nesaṃ kilesamudācāro na bhūtapubbo,
atk-s0512a0:974_0: Aparabhāge mahāsatto mātāpitūsu kālaṃkatesu tesaṃ sarīrakiccaṃ katvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “bhadde,
atk-s0512a0:974_1: tvaṃ imaṃ asītikoṭidhanaṃ gahetvā sukhena jīvāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0512a0:974_9: Te ubhopi sabbaṃ vibhavaṃ pariccajitvā mahādānaṃ datvā nikkhamitvā araññaṃ pavisitvā pabbajitvā uñchācariyāya
atk-s0512a0:974_10: phalāphalehi yāpentā pabbajjāsukheneva dasa saṃvaccharāni vasitvā loṇambilasevanatthāya janapadacārikaṃ
atk-s0512a0:974_11: carantā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ patvā rājuyyāne vasiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:975_2: Uyyānassa ekapasse pabbajjāsukhena vītināmentānaṃ tesaṃ samīpaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā paramapāsādikaṃ uttamarūpadharaṃ
atk-s0512a0:975_3: paribbājikaṃ olokento kilesavasena paṭibaddhacitto hutvā bodhisattaṃ “ayaṃ te paribbājikā kiṃ hotī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0512a0:975_6: api ca kho pana gihikāle pādaparicārikā ahosī”ti vutte rājā “ayaṃ kiretassa na kiñci hoti,
atk-s0512a0:975_7: api ca kho panassa gihikāle pādaparicārikā ahosi,
atk-s0512a0:975_9: tenevassa imissā paṭipattiṃ jānissāmī”ti andhabālo tattha attano paṭibaddhacittaṃ nivāretuṃ asakkonto
atk-s0512a0:975_10: aññataraṃ purisaṃ āṇāpesi “imaṃ paribbājikaṃ rājanivesanaṃ nehī”ti.
atk-s0512a0:976_0: So tassa paṭissuṇitvā “adhammo loke vattatī”tiādīni vatvā paridevamānaṃ eva taṃ ādāya pāyāsi.
atk-s0512a0:976_1: Bodhisatto tassā paridevanasaddaṃ sutvā ekavāraṃ oloketvā puna na olokesi.
atk-s0512a0:976_3: tesu cittaṃ padosetvā mayhaṃ sīlassa antarāyo bhavissatī”ti sīlapāramiṃyeva āvajjento nisīdi.
atk-s0512a0:977_0: Tattha tuyhesā kā kassa bhariyāti tuyhaṃ tava esā kā,
atk-s0512a0:977_2: udāhu bhaginī vā samānā kassa aññassa bhariyā.
atk-s0512a0:978_1: Na mayhaṃ bhariyā esāti kāmañcesā mayhaṃ gihikāle bhariyā ahosi,
atk-s0512a0:978_2: pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya na mayhaṃ bhariyā esā,
atk-s0512a0:978_5: ahampi paribbājako ayampi paribbājikāti samānadhammā paribbājakasāsanena ekasāsanī,
atk-s0512a0:979_1: Tissā sārattagadhitoti kāmarāgena sāratto hutvā paṭibaddho.
atk-s0512a0:979_2: Gāhāpetvāna ceṭaketi ceṭakehi gaṇhāpetvā ceṭake vā attano rājapurise āṇāpetvā taṃ paribbājikaṃ gaṇhāpetvā.
atk-s0512a0:979_3: Nippīḷayanto balasāti taṃ anicchamānaṃ eva ākaḍḍhanaparikaḍḍhanādinā nippīḷayanto bādhento,
atk-s0512a0:979_4: tathāpi agacchantiṃ balasā balakkārena rājapurisehi gaṇhāpetvā attano antepuraṃ pavesesi.
atk-s0512a0:980_1: Odapattakiyāti udakapattaṃ āmasitvā gahitabhariyā odapattikā nāma,
atk-s0512a0:980_10: Kopo me upapajjathāti ayaṃ te gihikāle bhariyā brāhmaṇī sīlavatī,
atk-s0512a0:980_12: sā tuyhaṃ purato balakkārena ākaḍḍhitvā nīyati.
atk-s0512a0:980_14: kiṃ te purisabhāva”nti purisamānena ussāhito cirakālasayito vammikabilato kenaci purisena ghaṭṭito “susū”ti
atk-s0512a0:980_15: phaṇaṃ karonto āsiviso viya me cittato kopo sahasā vuṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0512a0:981_4: Tattheva kopaṃ niggaṇhinti tasmiṃ eva āsane yathānisinnova taṃ kopaṃ nivāresiṃ.
atk-s0512a0:981_5: Nādāsiṃ vaḍḍhitūparīti tato ekavāruppattito upari uddhaṃ vaḍḍhituṃ na adāsiṃ.
atk-s0512a0:981_11: tayidaṃ gunnaṃ khuramattodake osīdantassa mahāsamuddassa paratīraṃ gaṇhitukāmatā viya hotī”ti attānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:981_12: paribhāsitvā paṭisaṅkhānabalena tasmiṃ eva khaṇe kopaṃ niggahetvā puna uppajjanavasenassa vaḍḍhituṃ na adāsinti.
atk-s0512a0:982_1: taṃ paribbājikaṃ brāhmaṇiṃ so rājā vā añño vā koci tiṇhāyapi nisitāya sattiyā koṭṭeyya,
atk-s0512a0:982_3: evaṃ santepi sīlaṃ attano sīlapāramiṃ neva bhindeyyaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0512a0:983_1: Na me sā brāhmaṇī dessāti sā brāhmaṇī jātiyā gottena kulappadesena ācārasampattiyā ciraparicayena pabbajjādiguṇasampattiyā
atk-s0512a0:983_2: cāti sabbappakārena na me dessā na appiyā,
atk-s0512a0:983_4: Napi me balaṃ na vijjatīti mayhampi balaṃ na na vijjati,
atk-s0512a0:983_7: icchamāno sahasā vuṭṭhahitvā taṃ ākaḍḍhante purise nippothetvā taṃ gahetvā yathicchitaṭṭhānaṃ gantuṃ samatthoti dasseti.
atk-s0512a0:983_8: Sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayhanti tato paribbājikato sataguṇena sahassaguṇena satasahassaguṇena sabbaññutaññāṇameva mayhaṃ piyaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:983_9: Tasmā sīlānurakkhissanti tena kāraṇena sīlameva anurakkhissaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:984_0: Atha so rājā uyyāne papañcaṃ akatvāva sīghataraṃ gantvā taṃ paribbājikaṃ pakkosāpetvā mahantena yasena nimantesi.
atk-s0512a0:984_1: Sā yasassa aguṇaṃ pabbajjāya guṇaṃ attano bodhisattassa ca mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya saṃvegena pabbajitabhāvañca kathesi.
atk-s0512a0:984_2: Rājā kenaci pariyāyena tassā manaṃ alabhanto cintesi –
atk-s0512a0:984_4: sopi paribbājako imāya ākaḍḍhitvā nīyamānāya na kiñci vippakāraṃ dassesi,
atk-s0512a0:984_8: yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ paribbājikaṃ gahetvā uyyānaṃ gantvā imaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:984_10: Evaṃ pana cintetvā “paribbājikaṃ uyyānaṃ ānethā”ti purise āṇāpetvā sayaṃ paṭhamataraṃ gantvā bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi –
atk-s0512a0:984_12: kiṃ mayā tāya paribbājikāya nīyamānāya kopo te uppajjitthā”ti.
atk-s0512a0:985_0: “Uppajji me na muccittha, na me muccittha jīvato;
atk-s0512a0:987_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā “kiṃ nu kho esa kopameva sandhāya vadati,
atk-s0512a0:987_1: udāhu aññaṃ kiñci sippādika”nti cintetvā puna pucchi –
atk-s0512a0:988_0: “Kiṃ te uppajji no mucci, kiṃ te no mucci jīvato;
atk-s0512a0:989_0: Rajaṃva vipulā vuṭṭhi, katamaṃ taṃ nivārayī”ti. ;
atk-s0512a0:990_2: Na muccitthāti kāyavacīvikāruppādanavasena pana na muccittha,
atk-s0512a0:990_3: na naṃ bahi pavattituṃ vissajjesinti attho.
atk-s0512a0:990_4: Rajaṃva vipulā vuṭṭhīti yathā nāma gimhānaṃ pacchime māse uppannaṃ rajaṃ vipulā akālavuṭṭhidhārā ṭhānaso nivāreti,
atk-s0512a0:991_0: Athassa mahāpuriso nānappakārena kodhe ādīnavaṃ pakāsento –
atk-s0512a0:992_0: “Yamhi jāte na passati, ajāte sādhu passati;
atk-s0512a0:993_0: So me uppajji no mucci, kodho dummedhagocaro.
atk-s0512a0:995_0: So me uppajji no mucci, kodho dummedhagocaro.
atk-s0512a0:997_0: So me uppajji no mucci, kodho dummedhagocaro.
atk-s0512a0:999_0: Sa bhīmaseno balavā pamaddī, kodho mahārājā na me amuccatha.
atk-s0512a0:1001_0: Tameva kaṭṭhaṃ ḍahati, yasmā so jāyate gini.
atk-s0512a0:1003_0: Sārambhā jāyate kodho, sapi teneva ḍayhati.
atk-s0512a0:1009_0: Tattha na passatīti attatthampi na passati,
atk-s0512a0:1009_2: Sādhu passatīti attatthaṃ paratthaṃ ubhayatthañca sammadeva passati.
atk-s0512a0:1009_4: nippañño vā gocaro āhāro indhanaṃ etassāti dummedhagocaro.
atk-s0512a0:1009_8: Sabhīmasenoti so bhīmāya bhayajananiyā mahatiyā kilesasenāya samannāgato.
atk-s0512a0:1009_10: Na me amuccathāti mama santikā mokkhaṃ na labhi,
atk-s0512a0:1009_13: Khīraṃ viya vā muhuttaṃ dadhibhāvena cittena patiṭṭhahitthātipi attho.
atk-s0512a0:1010_5: Sārambhā jāyateti karaṇuttariyakaraṇalakkhaṇā sārambhā araṇimanthanato viya pāvako kodho jāyate.
atk-s0512a0:1010_6: Sapi tenevāti sopi bālo teneva kodhena kaṭṭhaṃ viya agginā ḍayhati.
atk-s0512a0:1010_8: Tassāti tassa adhivāsanakhantiyā samannāgatassa puggalassa sukkapakkhe cando viya laddho,
atk-s0512a0:1011_0: Rājā mahāsattassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā mahāpurisaṃ paribbājikampi rājagehato āgataṃ khamāpetvā “tumhe pabbajjāsukhaṃ anubhavantā idheva uyyāne vasatha,
atk-s0512a0:1011_1: ahaṃ vo dhammikaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṃ karissāmī”ti vatvā vanditvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0512a0:1011_4: Bodhisatto himavantaṃ pavisitvā jhānābhiññāyo nibbattetvā āyupariyosāne brahmalokaparāyano ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:1012_0: Tadā paribbājikā rāhulamātā ahosi, rājā ānandatthero, bodhiparibbājako lokanātho.
atk-s0512a0:1013_1: Tathā mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ mahantañca ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ pahāya mahābhinikkhamanasadisaṃ gehato nikkhamanaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1013_2: tathā nikkhamitvā pabbajitassa bahujanasammatassa sato paramappicchatāya kulesu ca gaṇesu ca alaggatā,
atk-s0512a0:1013_5: tathārūpāya sīlavatiyā kalyāṇadhammāya paribbājikāya ananuññātā attano purato balakkārena parāmasiyamānāya sīlapāramiṃ āvajjetvā vikārānāpatti,
atk-s0512a0:1013_6: katāparādhe ca tasmiṃ rājini upagate hitacittataṃ mettacittataṃ upaṭṭhapetvā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikehi
atk-s0512a0:1013_7: samanusāsananti evamādayo idha mahāpurisassa guṇānubhāvā vibhāvetabbā.
atk-s0512a0:1016_1: Pañcame mahiṃso pavanacārakoti mahāvanacārī vanamahiṃso yadā homīti yojanā.
atk-s0512a0:1016_5: Hatthikalabhappamāṇo kira tadā bodhisattassa kāyo hoti.
atk-s0512a0:1016_6: Bhīmadassanoti mahāsarīratāya vanamahiṃsajātitāya ca sīlaṃ ajānantānaṃ bhayaṃ jananato bhayānakadassano.
atk-s0512a0:1017_3: Hotettha ṭhānanti ettha mahāvane yo koci padeso vanamahiṃsānaṃ tiṭṭhanaṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0512a0:1018_2: Ṭhānaṃ addasa bhaddakanti evaṃ vicaranto tasmiṃ mahāraññe bhaddakaṃ mayhaṃ phāsukaṃ rukkhamūlaṭṭhānaṃ addakkhiṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1018_4: tiṭṭhāmi ca sayāmi ca gocaraṃ gahetvā divā taṃ rukkhamūlaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ṭhānasayanehi vītināmemīti dasseti.
atk-s0512a0:1019_1: Tadā kira bodhisatto himavantappadese mahiṃsayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā vayappatto thāmasampanno mahāsarīro
atk-s0512a0:1019_2: hatthikalabhappamāṇo pabbatapādapabbhāragiriduggavanaghaṭādīsu vicaranto ekaṃ phāsukaṃ mahārukkhamūlaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1019_3: disvā gocaraṃ gahetvā divā tattha vasati.
atk-s0512a0:1019_4: Atheko lolamakkaṭo rukkhā otaritvā mahāsattassa piṭṭhiṃ abhiruhitvā uccārapassāvaṃ katvā siṅgesu gaṇhitvā olambanto naṅguṭṭhe gahetvā dolāyanto kīḷi.
atk-s0512a0:1019_5: Bodhisatto khantimettānuddayasampadāya taṃ tassa anācāraṃ na manasākāsi.
atk-s0512a0:1020_0: Tattha kapi māgantvāti kapi āgantvā, ma-
atk-s0512a0:1020_3: Anariyoti anaye iriyanena aye ca na iriyanena anariyo,
atk-s0512a0:1021_1: Sakimpi divasanti ekadivasampi dūseti maṃ sabbakālampi.
atk-s0512a0:1021_4: atha kho sabbakālampi maṃ passāvādīhi dūseti.
atk-s0512a0:1021_6: tadā tadā mayhameva upari karotīti dasseti.
atk-s0512a0:1021_8: tena siṅgesu olambanādinā muttādiasucimakkhaṇena tassa ca apaharaṇatthaṃ anekavāraṃ siṅgakoṭīhi vālaggena
atk-s0512a0:1021_9: ca anekavāraṃ kaddamapaṃsumissakaṃ udakaṃ siñcitvā dhovanena ca nippīḷito homīti attho.
atk-s0512a0:1022_3: kasmā imassa duṭṭhamakkaṭassa avamānaṃ sahasī”ti imamatthaṃ pakāsento nāsehetaṃ chavaṃ pāpaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1022_4: siṅgehi ca khurehi cāti idaṃ vacanaṃ maṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0512a0:1023_1: Evaṃ vutte tadā yakkheti tadā tasmiṃ kāle tasmiṃ yakkhe evaṃ vutte sati.
atk-s0512a0:1023_2: Ahaṃ taṃ idamabravinti ahaṃ taṃ yakkhaṃ idaṃ idāni vakkhamānaṃ abraviṃ abhāsiṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1023_3: Kuṇapenāti kilesāsucipaggharaṇena sucijātikānaṃ sādhūnaṃ paramajigucchanīyatāya atiduggandhavāyanena ca kuṇapasadisatāya kuṇapena.
atk-s0512a0:1023_5: Anariyenāti anariyānaṃ asādhūnaṃ māgavikanesādādīnaṃ hīnapurisānaṃ dhammattā anariyena,
atk-s0512a0:1023_8: ayuttaṃ tayā vuttaṃ maṃ pāpe niyojentiyāti dasseti.
atk-s0512a0:1024_6: Yena hi adhammacaraṇena so bālamakkaṭo nihīno nāma jāto,
atk-s0512a0:1024_7: sace panāhaṃ tatopi balavataraṃ pāpadhammaṃ careyyaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1024_9: aṭṭhānañcetaṃ yadihaṃ idhalokaparalokaṃ taduttari ca jānitvā ṭhito ekanteneva parahitāya paṭipanno evarūpaṃ pāpadhammaṃ careyyanti.
atk-s0512a0:1024_11: sīlañca me pabhijjeyyāti ahañceva kho pana evarūpaṃ pāpaṃ kareyyaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1024_13: Viññū ca garaheyyu manti paṇḍitā ca devamanussā maṃ garaheyyuṃ “passatha, bho,
atk-s0512a0:1024_14: ayaṃ bodhisatto bodhipariyesanaṃ caramāno evarūpaṃ pāpaṃ akāsī”ti.
atk-s0512a0:1025_3: Evaṃ viññūhi hīḷitā garahitā jīvitāpi parisuddhena parisuddhasīlena hutvā mataṃ vā maraṇameva varaṃ uttamaṃ seyyo.
atk-s0512a0:1025_5: kāhāmi paraheṭhananti evaṃ jānanto ca ahaṃ mayhaṃ jīvitanimittampi parasattavihiṃsanaṃ kiṃ kāhāmi kiṃ karissāmi,
atk-s0512a0:1026_0: Ayaṃ pana aññepi maṃ viya maññamāno evaṃ anācāraṃ karissati,
atk-s0512a0:1026_3: sā etassa aññehi māraṇā mayhaṃ dukkhato ca pāṇātipātato ca mutti bhavissatīti āha.
atk-s0512a0:1029_0: Teva tassa vadhissanti, sā me mutti bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0512a0:1030_0: Tattha mamevāyanti maṃ viya ayaṃ. Aññepīti aññesampi. Sesaṃ vuttatthameva.
atk-s0512a0:1031_1: Hīnamajjhimaukkaṭṭheti hīne ca majjhime ca ukkaṭṭhe ca nimittabhūte.
atk-s0512a0:1031_2: Sahanto avamānitanti vibhāgaṃ akatvā tehi pavattitaṃ avamānaṃ paribhavaṃ sahanto khamanto.
atk-s0512a0:1031_3: Evaṃ labhati sappaññoti evaṃ hīnādīsu vibhāgaṃ akatvā khantimettānuddayaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā tadaparādhaṃ sahanto
atk-s0512a0:1031_4: sīlādipāramiyo brūhetvā manasā yathāpatthitaṃ yathicchitaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ labhati paṭivijjhati,
atk-s0512a0:1032_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto attano ajjhāsayaṃ pakāsento devatāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0512a0:1032_2: Añño caṇḍamahiṃso nivāsaphāsutāya taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0512a0:1032_3: Duṭṭhamakkaṭo “so eva aya”nti saññāya tassa piṭṭhiṃ abhiruhitvā tatheva anācāraṃ akāsi.
atk-s0512a0:1032_4: Atha naṃ so vidhunanto bhūmiyaṃ pātetvā siṅgena hadaye vijjhitvā pādehi madditvā sañcuṇṇesi.
atk-s0512a0:1034_0: Tassa idhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva yathārahaṃ sesapāramiyo niddhāretabbā.
atk-s0512a0:1034_4: cariyāsu viya idha mahāsattassa guṇānubhāvā veditabbā.
atk-s0512a0:1037_1: Chaṭṭhe sutattakanakasannibhoti yathā suṭṭhu apagatasabbakāḷako hoti,
atk-s0512a0:1037_3: Migarājā ruru nāmāti jātisiddhena nāmena ruru nāma migarājā,
atk-s0512a0:1037_8: visuddhasīle vā sammā āhitacittoti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0512a0:1038_1: Tassa sarīracchavi suṭṭhu tāpetvā majjitakañcanapaṭṭavaṇṇo ahosi,
atk-s0512a0:1038_6: So janasaṃsaggaṃ pahāya vivekavāsaṃ vasitukāmo parivāraṃ chaḍḍetvā ekakova gaṅgānivattane ramaṇīye sālamissake supupphitapavane vasati.
atk-s0512a0:1042_0: Tattha ramme padeseti muttātalasadisavālukācuṇṇapaṇḍarehi bhūmibhāgehi siniddhaharitatiṇasañcaritehi
atk-s0512a0:1042_1: vanatthalehi cittattharaṇehi viya nānāvaṇṇavicittehi silātalehi maṇikkhandhanimmalasalilehi jalāsayehi
atk-s0512a0:1042_2: ca samannāgatattā yebhuyyena ca indagopakavaṇṇāya rattāya sukhasamphassāya tiṇajātiyā sañchannattā ramme
atk-s0512a0:1042_5: yebhuyyena ambasālavanasaṇḍamaṇḍitehi vanagahanehi upasobhitattā tattha paviṭṭhassa janassa ratijananaṭṭhena ramaṇīye.
atk-s0512a0:1045_2: Manorameti yathāvuttaguṇasampattiyā visesato pavivekakāmānaṃ mano rametīti manorame.
atk-s0512a0:1046_1: Atha uparigaṅgāyāti ettha athāti adhikāre nipāto,
atk-s0512a0:1046_2: tena mayi tattha tathā vasante idaṃ adhikārantaraṃ uppannanti dīpeti.
atk-s0512a0:1046_4: Dhanikehi paripīḷitoti iṇaṃ gahetvā taṃ dātuṃ asakkonto iṇāyikehi codiyamāno.
atk-s0512a0:1047_0: Eko kira bārāṇasiseṭṭhi attano puttaṃ “ayaṃ sippaṃ uggaṇhanto kilamissatī”ti kiñci sippaṃ na uggaṇhāpesi.
atk-s0512a0:1047_2: Taṃ vayappattaṃ patirūpena dārena saṃyojetvā dhanaṃ niyyātetvā mātāpitaro kālamakaṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1047_3: So tesaṃ accayena itthidhuttasurādhuttādiparivuto nānābyasanamukhehi sabbaṃ dhanaṃ viddhaṃsetvā tattha
atk-s0512a0:1047_4: tattha iṇaṃ ādāya tampi dātuṃ asakkonto dhanikehi codiyamāno “kiṃ mayhaṃ jīvitena,
atk-s0512a0:1047_6: maraṇaṃ me seyyo”ti cintetvā iṇāyike āha –
atk-s0512a0:1047_8: gaṅgātīre me nihitaṃ kulasantakaṃ dhanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0512a0:1047_12: ettha dhana”nti nidhiṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhanto viya “evaṃ me iṇamokkho bhavissatī”ti palāyitvā gaṅgāyaṃ pati.
atk-s0512a0:1048_0: Tattha jīvāmi vā marāmi vāti imasmiṃ gaṅgāsote patito jīvāmi vā marāmi vā,
atk-s0512a0:1048_1: jīvitaṃ vā me ettha hotu maraṇaṃ vā,
atk-s0512a0:1049_1: Majjhe gaṅgāya gacchatīti so puriso rattindivaṃ gaṅgāya vuyhamāno jīvitapemassa vijjamānattā maraṇaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1049_2: appatto maraṇabhayatajjito hutvā karuṇaṃ ravaṃ ravanto gaṅgāya majjhe mahodakena gacchati.
atk-s0512a0:1050_1: Atha mahāpuriso aḍḍharattasamaye tassa taṃ karuṇaṃ paridevantassa paridevitasaddaṃ sutvā “manussasaddo sūyati,
atk-s0512a0:1050_3: jīvitamassa dassāmī”ti cintetvā sayanagumbā vuṭṭhāya nadītīraṃ gantvā “ambho purisa, mā bhāyi,
atk-s0512a0:1050_4: jīvitaṃ te dassāmī”ti vatvā assāsetvā sotaṃ chindanto gantvā taṃ piṭṭhiyaṃ āropetvā tīraṃ pāpetvā attano
atk-s0512a0:1050_5: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ netvā parissamaṃ vinodetvā phalāphalāni datvā dvīhatīhaccayena taṃ āha –
atk-s0512a0:1050_8: tvaṃ ‘asukaṭṭhāne nāma kañcanamigo vasatī’ti mā kassaci ārocehī”ti.
atk-s0512a0:1050_11: Mahāsatto taṃ attano piṭṭhiṃ āropetvā bārāṇasimagge otāretvā nivatti.
atk-s0512a0:1051_0: Tattha kosi tvaṃ naroti tvaṃ ko manusso asi, kuto idha vuyhamāno āgatosīti attho.
atk-s0512a0:1052_0: 53. Attano karaṇanti attano kiriyaṃ. Dhanikehi bhītoti iṇāyikehi ubbiggo. Tasitoti utrasto.
atk-s0512a0:1053_2: cajitvā mama jīvitanti kāruññaṃ katvā mahākaruṇāya samussāhito mama jīvitaṃ tassa purisassa pariccajitvā.
atk-s0512a0:1053_3: Pavisitvā nīhariṃ tassāti nadiṃ pavisitvā sotaṃ chindanto ujukameva gantvā mama piṭṭhiṃ āropetvā tato taṃ nīhariṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1054_1: Assatthakālamaññāyāti parissamaṃ apanetvā phalāphalāni datvā dvīhatīhaccayena kilamathassa vigatakālaṃ jānitvā.
atk-s0512a0:1054_2: Ekaṃ taṃ varaṃ yācāmīti ahaṃ taṃ ekaṃ varaṃ yācāmi,
atk-s0512a0:1054_5: mā maṃ kassaci pāvadāti “asukaṭṭhāne suvaṇṇamigo vasatī”ti kassaci rañño vā rājamahāmattassa vā maṃ mā pāvada.
atk-s0512a0:1055_0: Atha tasmiṃ purise bārāṇasiṃ paviṭṭhadivaseyeva so rājā “ahaṃ, deva,
atk-s0512a0:1055_1: suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ migaṃ mayhaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ supinena addasaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1055_4: tasmā kañcanamigassa dhammaṃ sotukāmā labhissāmi ce jīvissāmi,
atk-s0512a0:1055_5: no ce me jīvitaṃ natthī”ti aggamahesiyā vutto taṃ assāsetvā “sace manussaloke atthi,
atk-s0512a0:1055_6: labhissasī”ti vatvā brāhmaṇe pakkosāpetvā “suvaṇṇamigā nāma hontī”ti pucchitvā “āma, deva,
atk-s0512a0:1055_7: hontī”ti sutvā sahassatthavikaṃ suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭake ṭhapetvā taṃ hatthikkhandhaṃ āropetvā nagare bheriṃ carāpesi –
atk-s0512a0:1058_1: Atha so seṭṭhiputto taṃ gāthaṃ sutvā rājapurisānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “rañño evarūpaṃ migaṃ ācikkhissāmi,
atk-s0512a0:1058_3: Rājapurisā taṃ rañño santikaṃ netvā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1058_9: Rājā tameva purisaṃ maggadesakaṃ katvā mahantena parivārena taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā tena mittadubbhinā purisena
atk-s0512a0:1058_10: dassitaṃ padesaṃ āvudhahatthe purise samantatova parivāretvā “ukkuṭṭhiṃ karothā”ti vatvā sayaṃ katipayehi
atk-s0512a0:1058_14: addhā tamhā me purisā bhayena uppannena bhavitabba”nti ñatvā uṭṭhāya sakalaparisaṃ oloketvā “rañño ṭhitaṭṭhāneyeva
atk-s0512a0:1058_16: Rājā taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “nāgabalo avattharanto āgaccheyyā”ti saraṃ sannayhitvā “imaṃ migaṃ santāsetvā sace palāyati,
atk-s0512a0:1058_17: vijjhitvā dubbalaṃ katvā gaṇhissāmī”ti bodhisattābhimukho ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:1060_0: Ko nu te idamakkhāsi, ettheso tiṭṭhate migo”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:1061_1: Rājā tassa madhurakathāya bajjhitvā saraṃ paṭisaṃharitvā gāravena aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0512a0:1061_3: Mahājanopi sabbāvudhāni apanetvā āgantvā rājānaṃ parivāresi.
atk-s0512a0:1065_1: yo mittadubbhī pāpapuriso jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā tathā mayā pāṇasaṃsayato mocito bārāṇasinagaraṃ gantvā
atk-s0512a0:1065_3: ācikkhitvā so rañño gāhāpetuṃ maggadesako hutvā rājānaṃ gahetvā mama santikamupāgamīti.
atk-s0512a0:1066_0: Mahāsatto suvaṇṇakiṅkiṇikaṃ cālento viya madhurassarena rājānaṃ puna pucchi –
atk-s0512a0:1066_3: Tasmiṃ khaṇe so pāpapuriso thokaṃ paṭikkamitvā sotapathe aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0512a0:1066_4: Rājā “iminā me tvaṃ dassito”ti taṃ purisaṃ niddisi.
atk-s0512a0:1068_0: Kaṭṭhaṃ niplavitaṃ seyyo, na tvevekacciyo naro”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:1070_0: “Kiṃ nu ruru garahasi migānaṃ, kiṃ pakkhīnaṃ kiṃ pana mānusānaṃ;
atk-s0512a0:1071_0: Bhayañhi maṃ vindatinapparūpaṃ, sutvāna taṃ mānusiṃ bhāsamāna”nti. –
atk-s0512a0:1074_0: Tatonidānaṃ bhayamāgataṃ mama, dukkho have rāja asabbhi saṅgamo”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:1076_1: ekacciyoti ekacco mittadubbhī pāpapuriso udake patantopi uttārito natveva seyyo.
atk-s0512a0:1076_8: Bhayañhi maṃ vindatinapparūpanti mahantaṃ bhayaṃ maṃ paṭilabhati,
atk-s0512a0:1077_5: eso mayā gaṅgāya vuyhamāno aḍḍharattasamaye karuṇaṃ paridevanto tato uttārito,
atk-s0512a0:1078_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā tassa kujjhitvā “evaṃ bahūpakārassa nāma guṇaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0512a0:1078_2: vijjhitvā naṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpessāmī”ti saraṃ sannayhi.
atk-s0512a0:1081_0: Rājā sutvāna vacanaṃ, usuṃ tassa pakappayi;
atk-s0512a0:1083_0: Tattha yāvatā karaṇanti yaṃ tassa mayā kataṃ upakārakaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1084_0: Tato mahāsatto “esa bālo maṃ nissāya mā nassī”ti cintetvā “mahārāja,
atk-s0512a0:1084_1: vadho nāmesa bālassa vā paṇḍitassa vā na sādhūhi pasaṃsito,
atk-s0512a0:1088_0: Tattha nimmininti taṃ mittadubbhiṃ pāpapuggalaṃ anurakkhanto mama attano attabhāvena taṃ parivattesiṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1088_1: attānaṃ rañño niyyātetvā rājahatthato pattaṃ tassa maraṇaṃ nivāresinti attho.
atk-s0512a0:1089_4: tadā maṃ nissāya taṃ mittadubbhiṃ purisaṃ tasmiṃ raññe jīvitā voropetukāme ahaṃ attānaṃ rañño pariccajanto mama sīlameva anurakkhiṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1089_6: Yaṃ panāhameva attano jīvitanirapekkhaṃ sīlavā āsiṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1090_0: Atha rājā bodhisattena attano jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā tassa purisassa maraṇe nivārente tuṭṭhamānaso “gaccha, bho,
atk-s0512a0:1090_1: migarājassa anuggahena mama hatthato maraṇā mutto”ti vatvā yathāpaṭiññāya tañcassa dhanaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0512a0:1090_2: Mahāsattassa yathāruciyāva anujānitvā taṃ nagaraṃ netvā nagarañca bodhisattañca alaṅkārāpetvā deviyā dhammaṃ desāpesi.
atk-s0512a0:1090_3: Mahāsatto deviṃ ādiṃ katvā rañño ca rājaparisāya ca madhurāya manussabhāsāya dhammaṃ desetvā rājānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1090_4: dasahi rājadhammehi ovaditvā mahājanaṃ anusāsitvā araññaṃ pavisitvā migagaṇaparivuto vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0512a0:1090_5: Rājāpi mahāsattassa ovāde ṭhatvā sabbasattānaṃ abhayaṃ datvā dānādīni puññāni katvā sugatiparāyano ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:1091_0: Tadā seṭṭhiputto devadatto ahosi, rājā ānando, rurumigarājā lokanātho.
atk-s0512a0:1092_0: Tassa idhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva yathārahaṃ sesapāramiyo niddhāretabbā.
atk-s0512a0:1092_1: Tathā idhāpi pavivekārāmatāya janasaṃsaggaṃ anicchato yūthaṃ pahāya ekakavihāro,
atk-s0512a0:1092_2: aḍḍharattasamaye nadiyā vuyhamānassa karuṇaṃ paridevantassa purisassa aṭṭassaraṃ sutvā sayitaṭṭhānato
atk-s0512a0:1092_3: vuṭṭhāya nadītīraṃ gantvā mahāgaṅgāya mahati udakoghe vattamāne attano jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā otaritvā
atk-s0512a0:1092_4: sotaṃ pacchinditvā taṃ purisaṃ attano piṭṭhiyaṃ āropetvā tīraṃ pāpetvā samassāsetvā phalāphalādīni datvā
atk-s0512a0:1092_6: puna taṃ attano piṭṭhiṃ āropetvā araññato nīharitvā mahāmagge otāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1092_7: saraṃ sannayhitvā vijjhissāmīti abhimukhe ṭhitassa rañño nibbhayena hutvā paṭimukhameva gantvā paṭhamataraṃ
atk-s0512a0:1092_9: mittadubbhī pāpapurisaṃ hantukāmaṃ rājānaṃ dhammakathaṃ katvā punapi attano jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā maraṇato pamocanaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1092_11: raññā attano vare dīyamāne tena sabbasattānaṃ abhayadāpanaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1092_12: rājānañca deviñca pamukhaṃ katvā mahājanassa dhammaṃ desetvā dānādīsu puññesu tesaṃ patiṭṭhāpanaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1092_13: laddhābhayānaṃ migānaṃ ovādaṃ datvā manussānaṃ sassakhādanato nivāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1092_14: paṇṇasaññāya ca tassa yāvajjakālā thāvarakaraṇanti evamādayo mahāsattassa guṇānubhāvā vibhāvetabbāti.
atk-s0512a0:1095_3: Uggatāpanoti manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ tāpanato niggaṇhanato tapasaṅkhātaṃ uggatāpanaṃ etassāti uggatāpano,
atk-s0512a0:1095_5: Atha vā nānappakāre diṭṭhadhammikādibhede anatthe uggiraṇato bahi chaḍḍāpanato ghorabhīmabhayānakaṭṭhena
atk-s0512a0:1095_6: vā “uggā”ti laddhanāme kilese vīriyātapena santāpanato ugge tāpetīti uggatāpano.
atk-s0512a0:1095_7: Mātaṅgo nāma nāmenāti nāmena mātaṅgo nāma.
atk-s0512a0:1095_8: Mātaṅgakule nibbattiyā jātiyā āgataṃ hissa etaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1096_0: Tadā hi bodhisatto caṇḍālayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā rūpena duddasiko bahinagare caṇḍālagāme vasati.
atk-s0512a0:1096_2: Athekadivasaṃ tasmiṃ nagare nakkhatte ghosite yebhuyyena nāgarā nakkhattaṃ kīḷanti.
atk-s0512a0:1096_3: Aññatarāpi brāhmaṇamahāsālakaññā soḷasapannarasavassuddesikā devakaññā viya rūpena dassanīyā pāsādikā
atk-s0512a0:1096_4: “attano vibhavānurūpaṃ nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmī”ti pahūtakhajjabhojjādīni sakaṭesu āropetvā sabbasetaṃ vaḷavārathamāruyha
atk-s0512a0:1096_7: sā kira dussaṇṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ “avamaṅgala”nti taṃ daṭṭhuṃ na icchati,
atk-s0512a0:1097_0: Tadā bodhisatto kālasseva uṭṭhāya paṭapilotikaṃ nivāsetvā jajjaritamukhabhāgaṃ veṇudaṇḍaṃ gahetvā bhājanahattho
atk-s0512a0:1097_1: nagaraṃ pavisati manusse disvā dūratova tesaṃ dūrīkaraṇatthaṃ tena veṇudaṇḍena saññaṃ karonto.
atk-s0512a0:1097_2: Atha diṭṭhamaṅgalikā “ussaratha ussarathā”ti ussāraṇaṃ karontehi attano purisehi nīyamānā nagaradvāramajjhe mātaṅgaṃ disvā “ko eso”ti āha. “Ayye,
atk-s0512a0:1097_3: mātaṅgacaṇḍālo”ti ca vutte “īdisaṃ disvā gatānaṃ kuto vuḍḍhī”ti yānaṃ nivattāpesi.
atk-s0512a0:1097_4: Manussā “yaṃ mayaṃ uyyānaṃ gantvā bahuṃ khajjabhojjādiṃ labheyyāma,

atk-s0512a0:1097_6: caṇḍāla”nti leḍḍūhi paharitvā visaññībhūtaṃ pātetvā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1098_0: So na cireneva satiṃ paṭilabhitvā vuṭṭhāya manusse pucchi – “kiṃ, ayyā,

atk-s0512a0:1098_5: rathikāya manussānaṃ ārocetvā “handāhaṃ imissā mānaṃ bhindissāmī”ti tassā nivesanadvāraṃ gantvā “ahaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1098_7: Diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya pitā “gharadvāre mātaṅgo nipanno”ti sutvā “tassa kākaṇikaṃ detha,
atk-s0512a0:1098_12: māsakaṃ pādaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ dve tīṇi yāva kahāpaṇasataṃ kahāpaṇasahassaṃ dethā”ti vuttepi na sampaṭicchati eva.
atk-s0512a0:1098_13: Evaṃ tesaṃ mantentānaṃ eva sūriyo atthaṅgato.
atk-s0512a0:1099_0: Atha diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya mātā pāsādā oruyha sāṇipākāraṃ parikkhipāpetvā tassa santikaṃ gantvā “tāta, mātaṅga,
atk-s0512a0:1099_2: dve sahassāni gaṇhāhi yāva satasahassaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vuttepi na sampaṭicchi,
atk-s0512a0:1099_4: Tassevaṃ cha divase nipajjitvā sattame divase sampatte samantā sāmantagharā paṭivisakagharā ca manussā uṭṭhahitvā “tumhe mātaṅgaṃ vā uṭṭhāpetha,
atk-s0512a0:1099_7: Tadā kira ayaṃ tasmiṃ dese desadhammo “yassa gharadvāre evaṃ nipajjitvā caṇḍālo marati,
atk-s0512a0:1099_8: tena gharena saddhiṃ sattasattagharavāsino caṇḍālā hontī”ti.
atk-s0512a0:1100_0: Tato diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya mātāpitaro diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ paṭapilotikaṃ nivāsāpetvā caṇḍālānucchavikaṃ parikkhāraṃ
atk-s0512a0:1100_1: datvā paridevamānaṃ eva tassa santikaṃ netvā “handa,
atk-s0512a0:1100_7: Mātaṅgo “mayaṃ antonagare vasituṃ na labhāma, ehi,
atk-s0512a0:1100_8: bahinagare caṇḍālagāmaṃ gamissāmā”ti taṃ apassāya attano gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0512a0:1101_0: Evaṃ pana gehaṃ gantvā jātisambhedavītikkamaṃ akatvāva katipāhaṃ gehe vasitvā balaṃ gahetvā cintesi –
atk-s0512a0:1101_1: “ahaṃ imaṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālakaññaṃ mayhaṃ caṇḍālagehe vāsāpesiṃ, handa,
atk-s0512a0:1101_3: So araññaṃ pavisitvā pabbajitvā sattāhabbhantareyeva aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañcābhiññāyo nibbattetvā iddhiyā
atk-s0512a0:1101_4: caṇḍālagāmadvāre otaritvā gehadvāre ṭhito diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ pakkosāpetvā “sāmi,
atk-s0512a0:1101_5: kissa maṃ anāthaṃ katvā pabbajitosī”ti paridevamānaṃ “tvaṃ, bhadde,
atk-s0512a0:1101_7: tava porāṇakayasato idāni mahantataraṃ yasaṃ karissāmi,
atk-s0512a0:1101_11: ito sattame divase puṇṇamāya candamaṇḍalaṃ bhinditvā āgamissatī’ti parisāsu vadeyyāsī”ti vatvā himavantameva gato.
atk-s0512a0:1102_0: Diṭṭhamaṅgalikāpi bārāṇasiyaṃ mahājanamajjhe tesu tesu ṭhānesu tathā kathesi.
atk-s0512a0:1102_1: Atha puṇṇamadivase bodhisatto candamaṇḍalassa gaganamajjhe ṭhitakāle brahmattabhāvaṃ māpetvā candamaṇḍalaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1102_2: bhinditvā dvādasayojanikaṃ bārāṇasiṃ sakalaṃ kāsiraṭṭhañca ekobhāsaṃ katvā ākāsato otaritvā bārāṇasiyā
atk-s0512a0:1102_3: upari tikkhattuṃ paribbhamitvā mahājanena gandhamālādīhi pūjiyamāno caṇḍālagāmābhimukho ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:1102_4: Brahmabhattā sannipatitvā taṃ caṇḍālagāmakaṃ gantvā diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya gehaṃ suddhavatthagandhamālādīhi devavimānaṃ viya alaṅkariṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1102_6: Mahāsatto tattha gantvā diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ aṅguṭṭhena nābhiyaṃ parāmasitvā “bhadde,
atk-s0512a0:1102_10: tava sīsadhovanaudakaṃ sakalajambudīpe rājūnaṃ abhisekodakaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0512a0:1102_15: tava pādapiṭṭhe sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā vandantā sahassaṃ dassanti,
atk-s0512a0:1102_17: cakkhupathe ṭhatvā vandantā ekekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ datvā vandissanti,
atk-s0512a0:1102_18: appamattā hohī”ti taṃ ovaditvā gehā nikkhamma mahājanassa passantasseva candamaṇḍalaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0512a0:1103_0: Brahmabhattā sannipatitvā diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ mahantena sakkārena nagaraṃ pavesetvā mahantena sirisobhaggena tattha vasāpesuṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1103_4: Soḷasasahassā brāhmaṇā diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya puttena saha nibaddhaṃ bhuñjanti,
atk-s0512a0:1103_8: handassa dakkhiṇeyye jānāpessāmī”ti bhikkhāya caranto tassā gehaṃ gantvā tena saddhiṃ sallapitvā agamāsi.
atk-s0512a0:1105_0: Saṅkāracoḷaṃ paṭimuñca kaṇṭhe, ko re tuvaṃ hosi adakkhiṇeyyo”ti. ;
atk-s0512a0:1106_0: Tena vuttaṃ anācāraṃ asahamānā devatā tassa tesañca soḷasasahassānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ mukhaṃ viparivattesuṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1106_1: Taṃ disvā diṭṭhamaṅgalikā mahāsattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0512a0:1106_2: Bodhisatto “tassa anācāraṃ asahantehi yakkhehi so vippakāro kato,
atk-s0512a0:1106_3: api ca kho pana imaṃ ucchiṭṭhapiṇḍakaṃ tesaṃ mukhe āsiñcitvā taṃ vippakāraṃ vūpasamehī”ti āha.
atk-s0512a0:1106_6: imasmiṃ loke dakkhiṇeyyā nāma mātaṅgapaṇḍitasadisā bhavanti,
atk-s0512a0:1106_8: mantasajjhāyanamattena vā mānatthaddhā”ti vatvā ye tadā sīlādiguṇavisesayuttā jhānasamāpattilābhino ceva paccekabuddhā ca,
atk-s0512a0:1107_0: Tadā vettavatīnagare jātimanto nāma eko brāhmaṇo pabbajitvāpi jātiṃ nissāya mahantaṃ mānamakāsi.
atk-s0512a0:1107_1: Mahāsatto “tassa mānaṃ bhindissāmī”ti taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā tassāsanne uparisote vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0512a0:1110_0: Ahaṃ vasāmi upari, heṭṭhā vasati brāhmaṇo”ti.
atk-s0512a0:1111_0: Atha mahāsatto ekadivasaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā “idaṃ jātimantassa jaṭāsu laggatū”ti adhiṭṭhāya nadiyaṃ pātesi.
atk-s0512a0:1111_1: Taṃ tassa udakaṃ ācamentassa jaṭāsu laggi,
atk-s0512a0:1111_2: so taṃ disvā “nassa vasalā”ti vatvā “kutoyaṃ kāḷakaṇṇī āgato,
atk-s0512a0:1111_3: upadhāressāmi na”nti uddhaṃsotaṃ gacchanto mahāsattaṃ disvā “kiṃjātikosī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0512a0:1111_5: “Tayā nadiyaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ pātita”nti? “Āma, mayā”ti. “Nassa, vasala, caṇḍāla,
atk-s0512a0:1111_8: heṭṭhāsote vasā”ti vatvā heṭṭhāsote vasantenapi pātite dantakaṭṭhe paṭisotaṃ āgantvā jaṭāsu laggante “nassa, vasala,
atk-s0512a0:1111_10: sattame divase sattadhā te muddhā phalissatī”ti āha.
atk-s0512a0:1115_0: Tattha vicaranto anukūlamhīti ucchiṭṭhadantakaṭṭhe attano jaṭāsu lagge tassa āgamanagavesanavasena gaṅgāya tīre anuvicaranto.
atk-s0512a0:1115_1: Uddhaṃ me assamaddasāti attano vasanaṭṭhānato uparisote mama assamaṃ paṇṇasālaṃ addakkhi.
atk-s0512a0:1115_2: Tattha maṃ paribhāsetvāti mama assamaṃ āgantvā jātiṃ sutvā tatova paṭikkamitvā savanūpacāre ṭhatvā “nassa,
atk-s0512a0:1115_4: kāḷakaṇṇi mā idha vasī”tiādīni vatvā bhayena santajjetvā.
atk-s0512a0:1115_6: ettova sīghaṃ palāyassū”ti vatvā “sace na pakkamissati,
atk-s0512a0:1115_7: ito te sattame divase sattadhā muddhā phalatū”ti me abhisapaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0512a0:1116_0: Kiṃ pana tassa abhisapena muddhā phalatīti?
atk-s0512a0:1116_3: evamayaṃ maraṇabhayatajjito sudūraṃ pakkamissatīti saññāya santāsanatthaṃ tathā āha.
atk-s0512a0:1117_1: Yadihaṃ tassa pakuppeyyanti tassa mānatthaddhassa kūṭajaṭilassa ahaṃ yadi kujjheyyaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1117_2: Yadi sīlaṃ na gopayeti sīlaṃ yadi na rakkheyyaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1117_3: idaṃ sīlaṃ nāma jīvitanirapekkhaṃ sammadeva rakkhitabbanti yadi na cinteyyanti attho.
atk-s0512a0:1117_5: kareyyaṃ chārikaṃ viyāti sacāhaṃ tadā tassa appatīto abhavissaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1117_6: Mama cittācāraṃ ñatvā mayi abhippasannā devatā khaṇeneva taṃ bhasmamuṭṭhiṃ viya viddhaṃseyyunti adhippāyo.
atk-s0512a0:1117_7: Satthā pana tadā attano appatītabhāve sati devatāhi sādhetabbaṃ tassa anatthaṃ attanā kattabbaṃ viya katvā desesi “kareyyaṃ chārikaṃ viyā”ti.
atk-s0512a0:1118_1: “bodhisattova taṃ jaṭilaṃ icchamāno iddhiyā chārikaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0512a0:1118_2: evañhi sati imissā pāḷiyā attho ujukameva nīto hotī”ti.
atk-s0512a0:1118_14: tattha tattha sammāpayogappaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhīti dasavidhā.
atk-s0512a0:1118_19: yathā hi paraṃ paharitukāmena udakabharite ghaṭe khitte paropi paharīyati,
atk-s0512a0:1118_21: evameva bhāvanāmayāya iddhiyā ekavāraṃ parūpaghātakammaṃ hoti,
atk-s0512a0:1119_0: Atha so “bhāvanāmayāya iddhiyā neva ekavāraṃ na dvevāraṃ parūpaghātakammaṃ hotī”ti vatvā pucchitabbo “kiṃ bhāvanāmayā iddhi kusalā akusalā abyākatā,
atk-s0512a0:1119_1: sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā,
atk-s0512a0:1119_4: Jānanto “bhāvanāmayā iddhi kusalā abyākatā vā adukkhamasukhavedaniyā avitakkaavicārā rūpāvacarā cā”ti vakkhati.
atk-s0512a0:1119_5: So vattabbo “pāṇātipātacetanā kusalādīsu kataraṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ bhajatī”ti?
atk-s0512a0:1119_6: Jānanto vakkhati “pāṇātipātacetanā akusalāva dukkhavedanāva savitakkasavicārāva kāmāvacarāvā”ti.
atk-s0512a0:1119_7: Evaṃ sante “tava pañho neva kusalattikena sameti,
atk-s0512a0:1119_8: na vedanāttikena na vitakkattikena na bhūmantarenā”ti pāḷiyā virodhaṃ dassetvā saññāpetabbo.
atk-s0512a0:1119_11: idhekacco samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā iddhimā cetovasippatto aññissā kucchigataṃ gabbhaṃ pāpakena manasānupekkhitā
atk-s0512a0:1119_12: hoti ‘aho vata yaṃ taṃ kucchigataṃ gabbhaṃ na sotthinā abhinikkhameyyā’ti. Evampi,
atk-s0512a0:1119_14: kulumpassa upaghāto hotī”ti saṅgītiṃ anāruḷhaṃ kulumpasuttaṃ udāhareyya.
atk-s0512a0:1119_16: Iddhimā cetovasippattoti hi ettha na bhāvanāmayā iddhi adhippetā,
atk-s0512a0:1119_18: Sā hi ettha labbhamānā labbhatīti bhāvanāmayāya iddhiyā parūpaghāto na sambhavatiyevā”ti saññāpetabbo.
atk-s0512a0:1120_0: Tathā pana tena abhisapito mahāsatto “sacāhaṃ etassa kujjhissāmi,
atk-s0512a0:1120_3: sā cassa rakkhā bhavissatī”ti sattame divase sūriyuggamanaṃ vāresi.
atk-s0512a0:1120_4: Manussā sūriyassa anuggamanena ubbāḷhā jātimantatāpasaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “bhante,
atk-s0512a0:1120_5: tumhe sūriyassa uggantuṃ na dethā”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1120_10: tumhe sūriyassa uggantuṃ na dethā”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1120_14: tasmiṃ āgantvā khamāpanatthaṃ mama pādesu patite sūriyaṃ vissajjessāmī”ti.
atk-s0512a0:1120_15: Te gantvā taṃ ākaḍḍhantā ānetvā mahāsattassa pādamūle nipajjāpetvā khamāpetvā “sūriyaṃ vissajjetha,
atk-s0512a0:1120_21: Mahāsatto “mattikāpiṇḍaṃ āharathā”ti āharāpetvā “imaṃ tāpasassa sīse ṭhapetvā tāpasaṃ otāretvā udake ṭhapetha,
atk-s0512a0:1120_23: tadā tāpaso udake nimujjatū”ti vatvā sūriyaṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0512a0:1122_0: “Yaṃ so tadā maṃ abhisapi, kupito duṭṭhamānaso;
atk-s0512a0:1123_0: Tasseva matthake nipati, yogena taṃ pamocayi”nti.
atk-s0512a0:1124_0: Tattha yaṃ so tadā maṃ abhisapīti so jātimantajaṭilo yaṃ muddhaphālanaṃ sandhāya tadā maṃ abhisapi,
atk-s0512a0:1124_2: Tasseva matthake nipatīti taṃ mayhaṃ upari tena icchitaṃ tasseva pana upari nipati nipatanabhāvena aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0512a0:1124_3: Evañhetaṃ hoti yathā taṃ appaduṭṭhassa padussato.
atk-s0512a0:1124_7: Yogena taṃ pamocayinti taṃ tassa bhāsitaṃ matthakaphālanaṃ upāyena tato pamocesiṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1125_0: Yañhi tena pāramitāparibhāvanasamiddhāhi nānāsamāpattivihāraparipūritāhi sīladiṭṭhisampadāhi susaṅkhatasantāne
atk-s0512a0:1125_1: mahākaruṇādhivāse mahāsatte ariyūpavādakammaṃ abhisapasaṅkhātaṃ pharusavacanaṃ payuttaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1125_2: taṃ mahāsattassa khettavisesabhāvato tassa ca ajjhāsayapharusatāya diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ hutvā sace so mahāsattaṃ na khamāpesi,
atk-s0512a0:1125_4: khamāpite pana mahāsatte payogasampattipaṭibāhitattā avipākadhammataṃ āpajji ahosikammabhāvato.
atk-s0512a0:1125_6: Tattha yaṃ sattame divase bodhisattena sūriyuggamananivāraṇaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1125_8: Tena hi ubbāḷhā manussā bodhisattassa santike tāpasaṃ ānetvā khamāpesuṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1125_9: Sopi ca mahāsattassa guṇe jānitvā tasmiṃ cittaṃ pasādesīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1125_13: aññathā hi ime pabbajitāpi samānā cittassa vase vattanti,
atk-s0512a0:1125_14: na pana cittaṃ attano vase vattāpentīti mahāsattampi tena sadisaṃ katvā gaṇheyyuṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1126_1: Idāni yadatthaṃ tadā tasmiṃ tāpase cittaṃ adūsetvā suparisuddhaṃ sīlameva rakkhitaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1128_1: Tathā nihīnajātikassa sato yathādhippāyaṃ diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya mānaniggaho,
atk-s0512a0:1128_2: pabbajitvā “diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya avassayo bhavissāmī”ti uppannacitto araññaṃ gantvā pabbajitvā sattadivasabbhantareyeva
atk-s0512a0:1128_7: tassa ca ajānantasseva bhāvino jīvitantarāyassa apanayanaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1131_3: Dhammo nāma mahāyakkhoti nāmena dhammo nāma mahānubhāvo devaputto.
atk-s0512a0:1131_4: Sabbalokānukampakoti vibhāgaṃ akatvā mahākaruṇāya sabbalokaṃ anuggaṇhanako.
atk-s0512a0:1132_0: Mahāsatto hi tadā kāmāvacaradevaloke dhammo nāma devaputto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0512a0:1132_1: So dibbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito dibbarathamabhiruyha accharāgaṇaparivuto manussesu sāyamāsaṃ bhuñjitvā attano
atk-s0512a0:1132_2: attano gharadvāresu sukhakathāya nisinnesu puṇṇamuposathadivase gāmanigamarājadhānīsu ākāse ṭhatvā “pāṇātipātādīhi
atk-s0512a0:1132_4: matteyyā petteyyā sāmaññā brahmaññā kule jeṭṭhāpacāyino bhavatha,
atk-s0512a0:1132_5: saggaparāyanā hutvā mahantaṃ yasaṃ anubhavissathā”ti manusse dasakusalakammapathe samādapento jambudīpaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karoti.
atk-s0512a0:1136_0: Tattha samittoti dhammikehi dhammavādīhi sahāyehi sasahāyo.
atk-s0512a0:1137_0: Tena ca samayena adhammo nāmeko devaputto kāmāvacaradevaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0512a0:1137_2: adinnaṃ ādiyathā”tiādinā nayena satte akusalakammapathe samādapento mahatiyā parisāya parivuto jambudīpaṃ vāmaṃ karoti.
atk-s0512a0:1141_3: Dīpento dasa pāpaketi sabbaloke gocaraṃ nāma sattānaṃ upabhogaparibhogāya jātaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1141_4: Tasmā satte vadhitvā yaṃkiñci katvā ca attā pīṇetabbo,
atk-s0512a0:1141_5: indriyāni santappetabbānītiādinā nayena pāṇātipātādike dasa lāmakadhamme kattabbe katvā pakāsento.
atk-s0512a0:1141_6: Sopetthāti sopi adhammo devaputto imasmiṃ jambudīpe.
atk-s0512a0:1142_2: te dhammaṃ devaputtaṃ tathā āgacchantameva disvā āsanā vuṭṭhāya gandhamālādīhi pūjentā yāva cakkhupathasamatikkamanā tāva abhitthavanti,
atk-s0512a0:1142_4: tassa vacanaṃ sutvā appamattā sakkaccaṃ puññāni karonti.
atk-s0512a0:1142_8: Evaṃ te tadā aññamaññassa ujuvipaccanīkavādā ceva ujuvipaccanīkakiriyā ca hutvā loke vicaranti.
atk-s0512a0:1143_0: Evaṃ pana gacchante kāle athekadivasaṃ tesaṃ rathā ākāse sammukhā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1143_3: mayaṃ adhammassā”ti vatvā maggā okkamitvā dvidhā jātā.
atk-s0512a0:1143_4: Dhammassa pana adhammassa ca rathā abhimukhā hutvā īsāya īsaṃ āhacca aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1143_6: tava rathaṃ okkamāpetvā mayhaṃ maggaṃ dehī”ti aññamaññaṃ maggadāpanatthaṃ vivādaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1143_7: Parisā ca nesaṃ āvudhāni abhiharitvā yuddhasajjā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1148_0: Tattha dhure dhuranti ekassa rathīsāya itarassa rathīsaṃ ghaṭṭayantā.
atk-s0512a0:1148_2: Puna ubhoti vacanaṃ ubhopi mayaṃ aññamaññassa paccanīkā hutvā loke vicarantā ekadivasaṃ paṭimukhaṃ āgacchantā
atk-s0512a0:1148_3: dvīsu parisāsu ubhosu passesu maggato okkantāsu saha rathena mayaṃ ubho eva samāgatāti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1148_5: Kalyāṇapāpakassa cāti kalyāṇassa ca pāpakassa ca.
atk-s0512a0:1149_0: Aññamaññassa hi parisāya ca yujjhitukāmatā jātā.
atk-s0512a0:1149_5: tava rathaṃ okkamāpetvā mayhaṃ maggaṃ dehī”ti.
atk-s0512a0:1151_0: Maggāraho devamanussapūjito, dhammo ahaṃ dehi adhamma maggaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1153_0: Sa kissa hetumhi tavajja dajjaṃ, maggaṃ ahaṃ dhamma adinnapubbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1154_0: “Dhammo have pāturahosi pubbe, pacchā adhammo udapādi loke;
atk-s0512a0:1155_0: Jeṭṭho ca seṭṭho ca sanantano ca, uyyāhi jeṭṭhassa kaniṭṭha maggā.
atk-s0512a0:1156_0: “Na yācanāya napi pātirūpā, na arahatā tehaṃ dadeyya maggaṃ;
atk-s0512a0:1157_0: Yuddhañca no hotu ubhinnamajja, yuddhamhi yo jessati tassa maggo.
atk-s0512a0:1159_0: Guṇehi sabbehi upetarūpo, dhammo adhamma tvaṃ kathaṃ vijessasi.
atk-s0512a0:1160_0: “Lohena ve haññati jātarūpaṃ, na jātarūpena hananti lohaṃ;
atk-s0512a0:1161_0: Sace adhammo hañchati dhammamajja, ayo suvaṇṇaṃ viya dassaneyyaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1162_0: “Sace tuvaṃ yuddhabalo adhamma, na tuyhaṃ vuḍḍhā ca garū ca atthi;
atk-s0512a0:1163_0: Maggañca te dammi piyāppiyena, vācā duruttānipi te khamāmī”ti. ;
atk-s0512a0:1165_0: Tattha yasokaroti dhamme niyojanavasena devamanussānaṃ yasadāyako.
atk-s0512a0:1165_3: Sa kissa hetumhi tavajja dajjanti somhi ahaṃ adhammo adhammayānarathaṃ abhiruḷho abhīto balavā,
atk-s0512a0:1165_7: Pāturahosīti paṭhamakappikakāle imasmiṃ loke dasakusalakammapathadhammo pubbe pāturahosi,
atk-s0512a0:1165_9: Jeṭṭho cāti pure nibbattabhāvena ahaṃ jeṭṭho ca seṭṭho ca porāṇako ca,
atk-s0512a0:1166_0: Napi pātirūpāti ahañhi bhoto neva yācanāya na paṭirūpavacanena na maggārahatāya maggaṃ dadeyyaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1166_1: Anuvisaṭoti ahaṃ catasso disā catasso anudisāti sabbā disā attano guṇena patthaṭo paññāto.
atk-s0512a0:1166_4: Yuddhabalo adhammāti sace tuvaṃ yuddhabalo asi adhamma.
atk-s0512a0:1166_5: Vuḍḍhā ca garū cāti yadi tuyhaṃ ime vuḍḍhā ime garū paṇḍitāti etaṃ natthi.
atk-s0512a0:1166_7: appiyenapi dadanto piyena viya te maggaṃ dadāmīti attho.
atk-s0512a0:1167_2: “sacāhaṃ imaṃ pāpapuggalaṃ sabbalokassa ahitāya paṭipannaṃ evaṃ mayā vilomaggāhaṃ gahetvā ṭhitaṃ accharaṃ paharitvā ‘anācāra mā idha tiṭṭha,
atk-s0512a0:1167_4: so taṅkhaṇaññeva mama dhammatejena bhusamuṭṭhi viya vikireyya,
atk-s0512a0:1167_6: svāhaṃ sabbalokaṃ anukampanto ‘lokatthacariyaṃ matthakaṃ pāpessāmī’ti paṭipajjāmi,
atk-s0512a0:1167_7: ayaṃ kho pana pāpo āyatiṃ mahādukkhabhāgī,
atk-s0512a0:1167_10: evaṃ me sīlaṃ suvisuddhaṃ akhaṇḍitaṃ bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0512a0:1167_11: Evaṃ pana cintetvā bodhisatte “sace tuvaṃ yuddhabalo”ti gāthaṃ vatvā thokaṃ maggato okkantamatte eva
atk-s0512a0:1167_12: adhammo rathe ṭhātuṃ asakkonto avaṃsiro pathaviyaṃ patitvā pathaviyā vivare dinne gantvā avīcimhi eva nibbatti.
atk-s0512a0:1168_0: Tattha yadihaṃ tassa kuppeyyanti tassa adhammassa yadi ahaṃ kujjheyyaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1168_1: Yadi bhinde tapoguṇanti tenevassa kujjhanena mayhaṃ tapoguṇaṃ sīlasaṃvaraṃ yadi vināseyyaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1169_3: Nibbāpetvānāti paṭikacceva khantimettānuddayassa upaṭṭhāpitattā tasmiṃ adhamme uppajjanakakodhassa anuppādaneneva
atk-s0512a0:1169_5: Saha janenokkamitvāti mayhaṃ parijanena saddhiṃ maggā okkamitvā tassa pāpassa adhammassa ahaṃ maggaṃ adāsiṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1170_1: Saha pathato okkanteti vuttanayena cittassa vūpasamaṃ katvā “maggaṃ te dammī”ti ca vatvā thokaṃ maggato saha okkamanena.
atk-s0512a0:1170_4: Jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “maggañca te dammī”ti gāthāya kathitakkhaṇeyevāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1171_0: Evaṃ tasmiṃ bhūmiyaṃ patite catunahutādhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalā sakalaṃ varāvaraṃ dhārentīpi mahāpathavī
atk-s0512a0:1171_1: “nāhamimaṃ pāpapurisaṃ dhāremī”ti kathentī viya tena ṭhitaṭṭhāne dvidhā bhijji.
atk-s0512a0:1171_2: Mahāsatto pana tasmiṃ nipatitvā avīcimhi nibbatte rathadhure yathāṭhitova saparijano mahatā devānubhāvena
atk-s0512a0:1172_0: “Khantībalo yuddhabalaṃ vijetvā, hantvā adhammaṃ nihanitva bhūmyā;
atk-s0512a0:1173_0: Pāyāsi vitto abhiruyha sandanaṃ, maggeneva atibalo saccanikkamo”ti. ;
atk-s0512a0:1175_0: Idhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva sesapāramiyo yathārahaṃ niddhāretabbā.
atk-s0512a0:1175_1: Tathā idhāpi dibbehi āyuvaṇṇayasasukhaādhipateyyehi dibbeheva uḷārehi kāmaguṇehi samappitassa samaṅgībhūtassa
atk-s0512a0:1175_2: anekasahassasaṅkhāhi accharāhi sabbakālaṃ paricāriyamānassa mahati pamādaṭṭhāne ṭhitassa sato īsakampi
atk-s0512a0:1175_3: pamādaṃ anāpajjitvā “lokatthacariyaṃ matthakaṃ pāpessāmī”ti māse māse puṇṇamiyaṃ dhammaṃ dīpento saparijano
atk-s0512a0:1175_4: manussapathe vicaritvā mahākaruṇāya sabbasatte adhammato vivecetvā dhamme niyojanaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1175_5: adhammena samāgatopi tena kataṃ anācāraṃ agaṇetvā tattha cittaṃ akopetvā khantimettānuddayameva paccupaṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0512a0:1175_6: akhaṇḍaṃ suvisuddhañca katvā attano sīlassa rakkhaṇanti evamādayo mahāsattassa guṇānubhāvā vibhāvetabbāti.
atk-s0512a0:1178_4: “Nagaravare”ti vatvā puna “puruttame”ti vacanaṃ tasmiṃ kāle jambudīpe sabbanagarānaṃ tassa nagarassa agganagarabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1178_5: Jayaddiso nāmāti raññā attano paccatthike jite jāto,
atk-s0512a0:1178_6: attano vā paccāmittabhūtaṃ yakkhinīsaṅkhātaṃ jayaddisaṃ jitoti evaṃladdhanāmo.
atk-s0512a0:1179_11: Anurakkhaparijano sadāti saddhādiguṇavisesayogato catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi sammadeva saṅgahaṇato ca sabbakālaṃ sambhattaparivārajano.
atk-s0512a0:1180_2: porisādaṃ upāgamīti mayhaṃ pitā jayaddisarājā migavaṃ caranto araññamajjhaṃ gantvā porisādaṃ manussakhādakaṃ yakkhiniputtaṃ upagañchi,
atk-s0512a0:1181_0: Jayaddisarājā kira ekadivasaṃ “migavaṃ gamissāmī”ti tadanurūpena mahatā parivārena kapilanagarato nikkhami.
atk-s0512a0:1181_1: Taṃ nikkhantamattameva takkasilāvāsī nando nāma brāhmaṇo catasso satārahā gāthā nāma kathetuṃ ādāya upasaṅkamitvā attano āgamanakāraṇaṃ rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0512a0:1181_2: Rājā “nivattitvā suṇissāmī”ti tassa vasanagehaṃ paribbayañca dāpetvā araññaṃ paviṭṭho “yassa passena migo palāyati,
atk-s0512a0:1181_3: tasseva so gīvā”ti vatvā mige pariyesanto vicarati.
atk-s0512a0:1181_4: Atheko pasadamigo mahājanassa padasaddena āsayato nikkhamitvā rañño abhimukho gantvā palāyi.
atk-s0512a0:1181_6: Rājā taṃ anubandhitvā tiyojanamatthake taṃ parikkhīṇajavaṃ ṭhitaṃ vijjhitvā pātesi.
atk-s0512a0:1181_7: Patitaṃ khaggena dvidhā katvā anatthikopi “maṃsena migaṃ gahetuṃ nāsakkhī”ti vacanamocanatthaṃ kāje katvā
atk-s0512a0:1181_8: āgacchanto ekassa nigrodhassa mūle dabbatiṇesu nisīditvā thokaṃ vissamitvā gantuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0512a0:1182_0: Tena ca samayena tasseva rañño jeṭṭhabhātā jātadivase eva ekāya yakkhiniyā khādituṃ gahito ārakkhamanussehi
atk-s0512a0:1182_1: anubaddhāya tāya niddhamanamaggena gacchantiyā ure ṭhapito mātusaññāya mukhena thanaggahaṇena puttasinehaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1182_2: uppādetvā saṃvaḍḍhiyamāno tadāhāropayogitāya manussamaṃsaṃ khādanto anukkamena vuddhippatto attānaṃ antaradhāpanatthaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1182_3: yakkhiniyā dinnaosadhamūlānubhāvena antarahito hutvā manussamaṃsaṃ khāditvā jīvanto tāya yakkhiniyā matāya
atk-s0512a0:1182_4: taṃ osadhamūlaṃ attano pamādena nāsetvā dissamānarūpova manussamaṃsaṃ khādanto naggo ubbiggavirūpadassano
atk-s0512a0:1182_5: rājapurisehi passitvā anubaddho palāyitvā araññaṃ pavisitvā tassa nigrodhassa mūle vāsaṃ kappento rājānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1183_0: Tattha so me pitumaggahesīti so porisādo mama pitaraṃ jayaddisarājānaṃ attano nisinnarukkhasamīpamāgataṃ “mama bhakkho tvaṃ āgatosi,
atk-s0512a0:1183_2: calantampi ahaṃ taṃ khādissāmī”ti hatthe aggahesi.
atk-s0512a0:1185_0: Migavaṃ gahetvā muñcassūti ettha migavanti migavavasena laddhattā taṃ migamaṃsaṃ “migava”nti āha,
atk-s0512a0:1185_1: imaṃ migamaṃsaṃ gahetvā maṃ muñcassūti attho.
atk-s0512a0:1185_2: So hi rājā naṃ yakkhiniputtaṃ disvā bhīto ūrukkhambhaṃ patvā khāṇuko viya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0512a0:1185_3: So vegena gantvā taṃ hatthe gahetvā “bhakkhosi me āgatosī”ti āha.
atk-s0512a0:1185_4: Atha naṃ rājā satiṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā “sace āhāratthiko,
atk-s0512a0:1185_8: Taṃ sutvā porisādo “kimidaṃ mayhameva santakaṃ datvā mayā vohāraṃ karosi,
atk-s0512a0:1185_9: nanu imaṃ maṃsañca tvañca mama hatthagatakālato paṭṭhāya mayhameva santakaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1185_10: tasmā taṃ paṭhamaṃ khāditvā pacchā maṃsaṃ khādissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0512a0:1186_1: mayā ca migavaṃ āgacchantena tassa brāhmaṇassa ‘āgantvā te dhanaṃ dassāmī’ti paṭiññā katā.
atk-s0512a0:1186_3: saccaṃ anurakkhanto gehaṃ gantvā taṃ paṭiññaṃ mocetvā puna imassa yakkhassa bhattatthaṃ āgaccheyya”nti cintetvā tassa tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0512a0:1186_4: Taṃ sutvā porisādo “sace tvaṃ saccaṃ anurakkhanto gantukāmosi,
atk-s0512a0:1186_5: gantvā tassa brāhmaṇassa dātabbaṃ dhanaṃ datvā saccaṃ anurakkhanto sīghaṃ puna āgaccheyyāsī”ti vatvā rājānaṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0512a0:1186_7: ahaṃ pātova āgamissāmī”ti vatvā magganimittāni sallakkhento attano balakāyaṃ upagantvā tena parivuto
atk-s0512a0:1186_8: nagaraṃ pavisitvā nandabrāhmaṇaṃ pakkosāpetvā mahārahe āsane nisīdāpetvā tā gāthā sutvā cattāri sahassāni
atk-s0512a0:1186_9: datvā yānaṃ āropetvā “imaṃ takkasilameva nethā”ti manusse datvā brāhmaṇaṃ uyyojetvā dutiyadivase porisādassa
atk-s0512a0:1186_10: santikaṃ gantukāmo puttaṃ rajje patiṭṭhapetuṃ anusāsaniñca dento tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0512a0:1189_0: Brāhmaṇassa dhanaṃ datvā, pitā āmantayī mamaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1191_0: “Rajjaṃ putta paṭipajja, mā pamajji puraṃ idaṃ;
atk-s0512a0:1192_0: Kataṃ me porisādena, mama āgamanaṃ punā”ti.
atk-s0512a0:1193_0: Tattha āgamanaṃ punāti puna āgamanaṃ paṭiññātassa porisādassa saṅgaraṃ katvā.
atk-s0512a0:1193_1: Brāhmaṇassa dhanaṃ datvāti takkasilato āgatassa nandanāmassa brāhmaṇassa tā gāthā sutvā catusahassaparimāṇaṃ dhanaṃ datvā.
atk-s0512a0:1193_2: Pitā āmantayī mamanti mama pitā jayaddisarājā maṃ āmantesi.
atk-s0512a0:1194_5: evaṃ tvampi chattaṃ ussāpetvā rajjaṃ kārehi.
atk-s0512a0:1194_6: Tvaṃ idaṃ puraṃ rakkhanto rajjañca kārento mā pamādamāpajji,
atk-s0512a0:1194_7: asukasmiṃ ṭhāne nigrodharukkhamūle porisādena yakkhena katametaṃ mayā saṅgaraṃ mama puna tassa santikaṃ āgamanaṃ uddissa,
atk-s0512a0:1194_8: kevalaṃ tassa brāhmaṇassa dhanadānatthaṃ idhāgato saccaṃ anurakkhanto,
atk-s0512a0:1195_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “mā kho tvaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0512a0:1195_7: tasmā ahameva tattha gamissāmī”ti nānappakārena vārentaṃ rājānaṃ saññāpetvā mātāpitaro vanditvā pitu
atk-s0512a0:1195_8: atthāya attānaṃ pariccajitvā sotthibhāvāya pitari sāsitavādaṃ payuñjamāne mātubhaginibhariyāsu ca saccakiriyaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1195_9: karontīsu āvudhaṃ gahetvā nagarato nikkhamitvā assupuṇṇamukhaṃ mahājanaṃ anubandhantaṃ āpucchitvā pitarā
atk-s0512a0:1195_12: ko jānāti kiṃ bhavissatī”ti rukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā rañño āgamanaṃ olokento nisinno kumāraṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “pitaraṃ nivattetvā putto āgato bhavissati,
atk-s0512a0:1195_13: natthi me bhaya”nti otaritvā tassa piṭṭhiṃ dassetvāva nisīdi.
atk-s0512a0:1199_1: Sasatthahatthūpagatanti sasatthahatthaṃ upagataṃ āvudhapāṇiṃ maṃ attano santikaṃ upagataṃ disvā.
atk-s0512a0:1199_2: Kadāci so tasissatīti so yakkho api taseyya.
atk-s0512a0:1199_3: Tena bhijjissati sīlanti tena tassa tāsuppādanena mayhaṃ sīlaṃ vinassati saṃkilissati.
atk-s0512a0:1199_4: Paritāsaṃ kate mayīti mayi tassa paritāsaṃ kate sati.
atk-s0512a0:1200_2: tassa dessaṃ na byāharinti yathā ca sīlabhedabhayena nihitasattho tassa santikaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0512a0:1200_3: evaṃ mayhaṃ sīlakhaṇḍabhayā eva tassa porisādassa dessaṃ aniṭṭhampi na byāhariṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1200_4: kevalaṃ pana mettacittena hitavādī idaṃ idāni vakkhamānaṃ vacanaṃ abhāsiṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1201_10: Puna yakkhiniputto mukhākāreneva “taṃ tassa puttoti ahaṃ jānāmi,
atk-s0512a0:1201_11: dukkaraṃ pana tayā kataṃ evaṃ āgacchantenā”ti āha.
atk-s0512a0:1201_14: mātāpituhetu hi evarūpaṃ puññaṃ katvā ekanteneva sagge pamodati,
atk-s0512a0:1201_15: ahañca ‘amaraṇadhammo nāma koci satto natthī’ti jānāmi,
atk-s0512a0:1201_16: attanā ca kiñci kataṃ pāpaṃ nāma na sarāmi,
atk-s0512a0:1205_0: Taṃ sutvā yakkhiniputto “na sakkā imassa maṃsaṃ khādituṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1205_1: upāyena imaṃ palāpessāmī”ti cintetvā “tena hi araññaṃ pavisitvā sāradārūni āharitvā niddhūme aṅgāre karohi,
atk-s0512a0:1205_2: tattha te maṃsaṃ pacitvā khādissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0512a0:1205_4: So taṃ olokento “ayaṃ purisasīho maraṇatopi bhayaṃ natthi,
atk-s0512a0:1205_5: evaṃ nibbhayo nāma na mayā diṭṭhapubbo”ti lomahaṃsajāto kumāraṃ olokesi.
atk-s0512a0:1205_14: svāhaṃ tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattopi sakkassa devarañño attānaṃ pariggaṇhituṃ na adāsi”nti imamatthaṃ dassento –
atk-s0512a0:1206_0: “Idañhi so brāhmaṇaṃ maññamāno, saso avāsesi sake sarīre;
atk-s0512a0:1207_0: Teneva so candimā devaputto, sasatthuto kāmaduhajja yakkhā”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:1209_0: Tattha saso avāsesi sake sarīreti attano sarīrahetu imaṃ sarīraṃ khāditvā idha vasāti evaṃ sake sarīre
atk-s0512a0:1209_1: attano sarīraṃ dento taṃ brāhmaṇarūpaṃ sakkaṃ tattha vāsesi.
atk-s0512a0:1210_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto cande sasalakkhaṇaṃ kappaṭṭhiyaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ sakkhiṃ katvā attano sakkenapi pariggaṇhituṃ asakkuṇeyyataṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0512a0:1211_0: “Cando yathā rāhumukhā pamutto, virocate pannaraseva bhāṇumā;
atk-s0512a0:1212_0: Evaṃ tuvaṃ porisādā pamutto, viroca kapile mahānubhāva;
atk-s0512a0:1213_0: Āmodayaṃ pitaraṃ mātarañca, sabbo ca te nandatu ñātipakkho”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:1214_1: Sopi taṃ nibbisevanaṃ katvā pañca sīlāni datvā “yakkho nu kho esa,
atk-s0512a0:1214_2: no”ti vīmaṃsanto “yakkhānaṃ akkhīni rattāni honti animisāni ca,
atk-s0512a0:1214_7: mayhaṃ kira pitu tayo bhātaro yakkhiniyā gahitā,
atk-s0512a0:1214_10: Iminā tena bhavitabba”nti nayaggāhena anumānena sabbaññutaññāṇena viya aviparītato niṭṭhaṃ gantvā “mayhaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1214_11: pitu ācikkhitvā rajje patiṭṭhāpessāmī”ti cintetvā “na tvaṃ yakkho,
atk-s0512a0:1214_13: ehi mayā saddhiṃ gantvā kulasantakaṃ rajjaṃ paṭipajjāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0512a0:1214_16: Itarena “nāhaṃ manusso”ti vutte tena saddhātabbassa dibbacakkhukatāpasassa santikaṃ nesi.
atk-s0512a0:1214_17: Tāpasena “kiṃ karontā pitā puttā araññe vicarathā”ti pitubhāve kathite porisādo saddahitvā “gaccha, tāta, tvaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1218_0: Tattha sīlavataṃ hetūti sīlavantānaṃ mama pitūnaṃ hetu.
atk-s0512a0:1219_0: Atha mahāsatto attano mahāpitaraṃ pabbajitaṃ vanditvā nagarassa samīpaṃ gantvā “kumāro kira āgato”ti
atk-s0512a0:1219_1: sutvā haṭṭhatuṭṭhena raññā nāgarehi negamajānapadehi ca paccuggato rājānaṃ vanditvā sabbaṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0512a0:1219_2: Taṃ sutvā rājā taṅkhaṇaññeva bheriṃ carāpetvā mahantena parivārena tassa santikaṃ gantvā “ehi, bhātika,
atk-s0512a0:1219_7: Rājā tassa assamassa avidūre gāmaṃ nivesetvā bhikkhaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0512a0:1221_0: Tassa idhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva yathārahaṃ sesapāramiyo niddhāretabbā.
atk-s0512a0:1221_1: Tathā pitarā nivāriyamāno attano jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā pitu jīvitarakkhaṇatthaṃ “porisādassa santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti nicchayo,
atk-s0512a0:1221_3: “attano sīlakhaṇḍanaṃ mā hotū”ti tena piyavācāya samudācāro,
atk-s0512a0:1221_5: pitu atthe mayhaṃ sarīraṃ saphalaṃ karissāmīti haṭṭhatuṭṭhabhāvo,
atk-s0512a0:1221_6: sakkenāpi pariggaṇhituṃ asakkuṇeyyassa sasajātiyampi pariccāgatthaṃ attano jīvitanirapekkhabhāvassa jānanaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1221_9: ñātamatte ca taṃ kulasantake rajje patiṭṭhāpetukāmatā,
atk-s0512a0:1224_4: upari dveti catasso dāṭhā āvudhā etassāti dāṭhāvudho.
atk-s0512a0:1224_7: Mahānubhāvānampi urena gamanato “uragā”ti laddhanāmānaṃ nāgānaṃ adhipatibhāvato uragādhibhū.
atk-s0512a0:1225_1: Dvinnaṃ maggānaṃ vinivijjhitvā sandhibhāvena gataṭṭhānasaṅkhāte catuppathe.
atk-s0512a0:1225_4: Idāni vakkhamānānaṃ catunnaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena caturo aṅge.
atk-s0512a0:1225_7: Yadāhaṃ saṅkhapālo nāma yathāvuttarūpo nāgarājā homi,
atk-s0512a0:1225_8: tadā heṭṭhā vuttappakāre ṭhāne vāsaṃ uposathavāsavasena nivāsaṃ akappayiṃ kappesiṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1226_0: Mahāsatto hi dānasīlādipuññapasuto hutvā bodhipariyesanavasena aparāparaṃ devamanussagatīsu saṃsaranto
atk-s0512a0:1226_1: kadāci devabhogasadisasampattike nāgabhavane nibbattitvā saṅkhapālo nāma nāgarājā ahosi mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo.
atk-s0512a0:1226_2: So gacchante kāle tāya sampattiyā vippaṭisārī hutvā manussayoniṃ patthento uposathavāsaṃ vasi.
atk-s0512a0:1226_3: Athassa nāgabhavane vasantassa uposathavāso na sampajjati,
atk-s0512a0:1226_5: tena so nāgabhavanā nikkhamitvā kaṇhavaṇṇāya nadiyā avidūre mahāmaggassa ca ekapadikamaggassa ca antare
atk-s0512a0:1226_6: ekaṃ vammikaṃ parikkhipitvā uposathaṃ adhiṭṭhāya cātuddasapannarasesu samādinnasīlo “mama cammādīni atthikā
atk-s0512a0:1227_1: Yaṃ panettha chaviyā cammenātiādikaṃ “caturo aṅge adhiṭṭhāyā”ti vuttaṃ caturaṅgādhiṭṭhānadassanaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1227_3: Evaṃ uposathavāsaṃ vasantassa mahāsattassa dīgho addhā vītivatto.
atk-s0512a0:1228_0: Athekadivasaṃ tasmiṃ tathā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā nipanne soḷasa bhojaputtā “maṃsaṃ āharissāmā”ti āvudhahatthā
atk-s0512a0:1228_1: araññe carantā kiñci alabhitvā nikkhamantā taṃ vammikamatthake nipannaṃ disvā “mayaṃ ajja godhāpotakampi
atk-s0512a0:1228_3: imaṃ nāgarājānaṃ vadhitvā khādissāmā”ti cintetvā “mahā kho panesa gayhamāno palāyeyyāti yathānipannakaṃyeva
atk-s0512a0:1228_4: naṃ bhogesu sūlehi vijjhitvā dubbalaṃ katvā gaṇhissāmā”ti sūlāni ādāya upasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1228_5: Bodhisattassāpi sarīraṃ mahantaṃ ekadoṇikanāvappamāṇaṃ vaṭṭetvā ṭhapitasumanapupphadāmaṃ viya jiñjukaphalasadisehi
atk-s0512a0:1228_6: akkhīhi jayasumanapupphasadisena ca sīsena samannāgataṃ ativiya sobhati.
atk-s0512a0:1228_7: So tesaṃ soḷasannaṃ janānaṃ padasaddena bhogantarato sīsaṃ nīharitvā rattakkhīni ummīletvā te sūlahatthe
atk-s0512a0:1228_8: āgacchante disvā “ajja mayhaṃ manoratho matthakaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti attānaṃ dānamukhe niyyātetvā “ime mama
atk-s0512a0:1228_9: sarīraṃ sattīhi koṭṭetvā chiddāvachiddaṃ karonte na olokessāmī”ti attano sīlakhaṇḍabhayena daḷhaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1228_10: adhiṭṭhahitvā sīsaṃ bhogantare eva pavesetvā nipajji.
atk-s0512a0:1229_0: Atha naṃ te upagantvā naṅguṭṭhe gahetvā ākaḍḍhantā bhūmiyaṃ pātetvā tikhiṇasūlehi aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vijjhitvā
atk-s0512a0:1229_1: sakaṇṭakā kāḷavettayaṭṭhiyo pahāramukhehi pavesetvā aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu kājehi ādāya mahāmaggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1229_2: Mahāsatto sūlehi vijjhanato paṭṭhāya ekaṭṭhānepi akkhīni ummīletvā te na olokesi.
atk-s0512a0:1229_3: Tassa aṭṭhahi kājehi ādāya nīyamānassa sīsaṃ olambitvā bhūmiṃ paharati.
atk-s0512a0:1229_4: Atha naṃ “sīsamassa olambatī”ti mahāmagge nipajjāpetvā sukhumena sūlena nāsāpuṭe vijjhitvā rajjukaṃ pavesetvā
atk-s0512a0:1229_5: sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā kājakoṭiyaṃ laggetvā punapi ukkhipitvā maggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1236_7: Nāsāya vinivijjhitvāti rajjukaṃ pavesetuṃ sukhumena sūlena nāsāpuṭe vijjhitvā.
atk-s0512a0:1236_8: Naṅguṭṭhe piṭṭhikaṇṭaketi naṅguṭṭhappadese tattha tattha piṭṭhikaṇṭakasamīpe ca vinivijjhitvāti sambandho.
atk-s0512a0:1236_9: Kāje āropayitvānāti aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vinivijjhitvā baddhesu aṭṭhasu vettalatāmaṇḍalesu ekekasmiṃ ovijjhitaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1236_10: ekekaṃ kājaṃ dve dve bhojaputtā attano attano khandhaṃ āropetvā.
atk-s0512a0:1237_2: Sakānanaṃ sapabbatanti saddhiṃ kānanehi pabbatehi cāti sakānanaṃ sapabbatañca.
atk-s0512a0:1237_3: Nāsāvātena jhāpayeti sacāhaṃ icchamāno icchanto kujjhitvā nāsāvātaṃ vissajjeyyaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1237_4: samuddapariyantaṃ sakānanaṃ sapabbataṃ imaṃ mahāpathaviṃ jhāpeyyaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1238_3: Bhojaputte na kuppāmīti dubbalabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ vettalatāpavesanatthañca sāradārūhi tacchetvā katehi
atk-s0512a0:1238_4: tikhiṇasūlehi aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vijjhantepi dubbalabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ tikhiṇāhi sattīhi tahiṃ tahiṃ koṭṭayantepi
atk-s0512a0:1238_6: Esā me sīlapāramīti evaṃ mahānubhāvassa tathā adhiṭṭhahantassa yā me mayhaṃ sīlakhaṇḍabhayena tesaṃ akujjhanā,
atk-s0512a0:1238_7: esā ekanteneva jīvitanirapekkhabhāvena pavattā mayhaṃ sīlapāramī,
atk-s0512a0:1239_0: Tathā pana bodhisatte tehi nīyamāne mithilanagaravāsī āḷāro nāma kuṭumbiko pañcasakaṭasatāni ādāya sukhayānake
atk-s0512a0:1239_1: nisīditvā gacchanto te bhojaputte mahāsattaṃ harante disvā kāruññaṃ uppādetvā te ludde pucchi –
atk-s0512a0:1239_4: Te “imassa nāgassa maṃsaṃ sāduñca muduñca thūlañca pacitvā khādissāmā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1239_5: Atha so tesaṃ soḷasavāhagoṇe pasataṃ pasataṃ suvaṇṇamāsake sabbesaṃ nivāsanapārupanāni bhariyānampi tesaṃ vatthābharaṇāni datvā “sammā,
atk-s0512a0:1239_8: imaṃ kilamantehi bahuṃ tumhehi apuññaṃ pasutaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1239_13: tasmā imaṃ nāgaṃ vissajjessāmā”ti vissajjetvā mahāsattaṃ bhūmiyaṃ nipajjāpetvā attano kakkhaḷatāya tā
atk-s0512a0:1239_14: kaṇṭakācitā āvutā kāḷavettalatā koṭiyaṃ gahetvā ākaḍḍhituṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1240_0: Atha so nāgarājānaṃ kilamantaṃ disvā akilamentova asinā latā chinditvā dārakānaṃ kaṇṇavedhato paṭiharaṇaniyāmena adukkhāpento saṇikaṃ nīhari.
atk-s0512a0:1240_1: Tasmiṃ kāle te bhojaputtā yaṃ bandhanaṃ tassa natthuto pavesetvā paṭimukkaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1240_3: Mahāsatto muhuttaṃ pācīnābhimukho gantvā assupuṇṇehi nettehi āḷāraṃ olokesi.
atk-s0512a0:1240_6: Āḷāro mahāsattassa añjaliṃ paggayha “gaccheva kho tvaṃ, mahānāga,
atk-s0512a0:1240_7: mā taṃ luddā puna gahesu”nti vadanto thokaṃ taṃ nāgaṃ anugantvā nivatti.
atk-s0512a0:1241_0: Bodhisatto nāgabhavanaṃ gantvā tattha papañcaṃ akatvā mahantena parivārena nikkhamitvā āḷāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0512a0:1241_1: nāgabhavanassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā taṃ tattha netvā tīhi kaññāsatehi saddhiṃ mahantamassa yasaṃ datvā dibbehi
atk-s0512a0:1241_3: Āḷāro nāgabhavane ekavassaṃ vasitvā dibbe kāme paribhuñjitvā “icchāmahaṃ, samma,
atk-s0512a0:1241_4: pabbajitu”nti nāgarājassa kathetvā pabbajitaparikkhāre gahetvā tato nikkhamitvā himavantappadesaṃ gantvā
