atk-s0512a0:1635_2: viyūhitvā añjanarukkhasāraghaṭikavaṇṇamahāsarīro sudhotalohitakamaṇisadisāni akkhīni ummīletvā ākāsaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1636_0: Tattha yato sarāmi attānanti yato paṭṭhāya ahaṃ attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ attānaṃ sarāmi anussarāmi.
atk-s0512a0:1636_1: Yato pattosmi viññutanti yato paṭṭhāya tāsu tāsu itikattabbatāsu viññutaṃ vijānanabhāvaṃ pattosmi,
atk-s0512a0:1636_2: uddhaṃ ārohanavasena ito yāva mayhaṃ kāyavacīkammānaṃ anussaraṇasamatthatā viññutappatti eva,
atk-s0512a0:1636_3: etthantare samānajātikānaṃ khādanaṭṭhāne nibbattopi taṇḍulakaṇappamāṇampi macchaṃ mayā na khāditapubbaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1636_4: aññampi kañci pāṇaṃ sañcicca hiṃsitaṃ bādhitaṃ nābhijānāmi,
atk-s0512a0:1637_1: Etena saccavajjenāti “yadetaṃ mayā kassaci pāṇassa ahiṃsanaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1637_4: ñātisaṅghaṃ me dukkhā pamocetū”ti vatvā puna attano paricārikaceṭakaṃ āṇāpento viya pajjunnaṃ devarājānaṃ ālapanto “abhitthanayā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0512a0:1638_0: Tattha abhitthanaya pajjunnāti pajjunno vuccati megho,
atk-s0512a0:1638_1: ayaṃ pana meghavasena laddhanāmaṃ vassavalāhakadevarājānaṃ ālapati.
atk-s0512a0:1638_3: devo nāma anabhitthanayanto vijjulatā anicchārento pavassantopi na sobhati,
atk-s0512a0:1638_4: tasmā tvaṃ abhitthanayanto vijjulatā nicchārento vassāpehīti.
atk-s0512a0:1638_5: Nidhiṃ kākassa nāsayāti kākā kalalaṃ pavisitvā ṭhite macche tuṇḍena koṭṭetvā nīharitvā khādanti,
atk-s0512a0:1638_7: Taṃ kākasaṅghassa nidhiṃ devaṃ vassāpento udakena paṭicchādetvā nāsehi.
atk-s0512a0:1638_8: Kākaṃ sokāya randhehīti kākasaṅgho imasmiṃ mahāsare udakena puṇṇe macche alabhamāno socissati,
atk-s0512a0:1638_9: taṃ kākagaṇaṃ tvaṃ imaṃ kaddamaṃ pūrento sokāya randhehi,
atk-s0512a0:1638_13: Macche sokā pamocayāti mama ñātake sabbeva macche imamhā maraṇasokā pamocehi.
atk-s0512a0:1638_17: mañca mama ñātake cāti sabbeva maraṇasokā pamocehi.
atk-s0512a0:1638_18: Macchānañhi anudakabhāvena paccatthikānaṃ ghāsabhāvaṃ gacchāmāti mahāmaraṇasoko,
atk-s0512a0:1638_19: mahāsattassa pana tesaṃ anayabyasanaṃ paṭicca karuṇāyato karuṇāpatirūpamukhena sokasambhavo veditabbo.
atk-s0512a0:1639_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto attano paricārikaceṭakaṃ āṇāpento viya pajjunnaṃ ālapitvā sakale kosalaraṭṭhe mahāvassaṃ vassāpesi.
atk-s0512a0:1639_1: Mahāsattassa hi sīlatejena saccakiriyāya samakālameva sakkassa paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0512a0:1639_2: So “kiṃ nu kho”ti āvajjento taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā vassavalāhakadevarājānaṃ pakkosāpetvā “tāta,
atk-s0512a0:1639_3: mahāpuriso maccharājā ñātīnaṃ maraṇasokena vassāpanaṃ icchati,
atk-s0512a0:1639_4: sakalaṃ kosalaraṭṭhaṃ ekameghaṃ katvā vassāpehī”ti āha.
atk-s0512a0:1640_0: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā ekaṃ valāhakaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā meghagītaṃ gāyanto pācīnalokadhātuabhimukho pakkhandi.
atk-s0512a0:1640_1: Pācīnadisābhāge khalamaṇḍalamattaṃ ekaṃ meghamaṇḍalaṃ uṭṭhāya satapaṭalaṃ sahassapaṭalaṃ hutvā abhitthanayantaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1640_2: vijjulatā nicchārentaṃ adhomukhaṭhapitaudakakumbhākārena vissandamānaṃ sakalaṃ kosalaraṭṭhaṃ mahoghena
atk-s0512a0:1640_4: Devo acchinnadhāraṃ vassanto muhutteneva taṃ mahāsaraṃ pūresi.
atk-s0512a0:1640_8: manussāpi vividhasassāni sampādentā catuppadādayopīti sabbepi vassūpajīvino kāyikacetasikadukkhato mucciṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1644_0: Tattha khaṇena abhivassathāti adandhāyitvā saccakiriyakhaṇeneva abhivassi.
atk-s0512a0:1645_1: Katvā vīriyamuttamanti deve avassante kiṃ kātabbanti kosajjaṃ anāpajjitvā ñātatthacariyāsampādanamukhena
atk-s0512a0:1645_2: mahato sattanikāyassa hitasukhanipphādanaṃ uttamaṃ vīriyaṃ katvā.
atk-s0512a0:1645_3: Saccatejabalassito mama saccānubhāvabalasannissito hutvā tadā mahāmeghaṃ vassāpesiṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1645_6: esā me saccapāramī”ti mahāmaccharājakāle attano saccapāramiyā anaññasādhāraṇabhāvaṃ dassesi dhammarājā.
atk-s0512a0:1646_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto mahākaruṇāya samussāhitahadayo sakalaraṭṭhe mahāvassaṃ vassāpanavasena mahājanaṃ maraṇadukkhato
atk-s0512a0:1647_0: Tadā pajjunno ānandatthero ahosi, macchagaṇā buddhaparisā, maccharājā lokanātho.
atk-s0512a0:1648_1: Tathā attano samānajātikānaṃ khādanaṭṭhāne macchayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā taṇḍulakaṇamattampi macchaṃ ādiṃ katvā kassacipi pāṇino akhādanaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1648_4: udake parikkhīṇe kalalagahane nimujjanavasena attanā anubhavamānaṃ dukkhaṃ vīrabhāvena agaṇetvā ñātisaṅghasseva
atk-s0512a0:1648_5: taṃ dukkhaṃ attano hadaye katvā asahantassa sabbabhāvena karuṇāyanā,
atk-s0512a0:1648_6: tathā ca paṭipattīti evamādayo guṇānubhāvā vibhāvetabbāti.
atk-s0512a0:1651_2: Bodhisatto hi tadā dīpāyano nāma attano sahāyaṃ maṇḍabyatāpasaṃ sūle uttāsitaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa sīlaguṇena
atk-s0512a0:1651_3: taṃ avijahanto tiyāmarattiṃ sūlaṃ nissāya ṭhito tassa sarīrato paggharitvā patitapatitehi lohitabindūhi
atk-s0512a0:1651_7: Anabhirato cariṃ ahanti pantasenāsanesu ceva adhikusaladhammesu ca anabhirativāsaṃ vasanto ahaṃ brahmacariyaṃ acariṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1651_8: Pabbajitvā sattāhameva hi tadā mahāsatto abhirato brahmacariyaṃ cari.
atk-s0512a0:1652_0: Kasmā pana mahāpuriso anekasatasahassesu attabhāvesu nekkhammajjhāsayo brahmacariyavāsaṃ abhiramitvā idha taṃ nābhirami?
atk-s0512a0:1652_2: Kasmā ca puna na agāraṃ ajjhāvasīti?
atk-s0512a0:1652_3: Paṭhamaṃ nekkhammajjhāsayena kāmesu dosaṃ disvā pabbaji.
atk-s0512a0:1652_5: So taṃ vinodetumasakkontopi kammañca phalañca saddahitvā tāva mahantaṃ vibhavaṃ pahāya agārasmā nikkhamanto yaṃ pajahi,
atk-s0512a0:1652_7: “eḷamūgo capalo vatāyaṃ kaṇhadīpāyano”ti imaṃ apavādaṃ jigucchanto attano hirottappabhedabhayena.
atk-s0512a0:1652_8: Api ca pabbajjāpuññaṃ nāmetaṃ viññūhi buddhādīhi pasatthaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1652_10: tasmāpi sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena assumukho rodamānopi brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasi,
atk-s0512a0:1653_0: “Saddhāya nikkhamma puna nivatto, so eḷamūgo capalo vatāyaṃ;
atk-s0512a0:1654_0: Etassa vādassa jigucchamāno, akāmako carāmi brahmacariyaṃ;
atk-s0512a0:1655_0: Viññuppasatthañca satañca ṭhānaṃ, evampahaṃ puññakaro bhavāmī”ti. ;
atk-s0512a0:1656_1: Na koci etaṃ jānātīti etaṃ mama anabhiratimanaṃ brahmacariyavāse abhirativirahitacittaṃ koci manussabhūto na jānāti. Kasmā?
atk-s0512a0:1656_2: Ahañhi kassaci nācikkhiṃ mama mānase citte arati carati pavattatīti kassacipi na kathesiṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1656_3: tasmā na koci manussabhūto etaṃ jānātīti.
atk-s0512a0:1661_2: Sahāyoti gihikāle pabbajitakāle ca daḷhamittatāya piyasahāyo.
atk-s0512a0:1661_5: sūlamāropanaṃ labhīti katokāsena attano pubbakammena yutto sūlāropanaṃ labhi,
atk-s0512a0:1662_1: atīte vaṃsaraṭṭhe kosambiyaṃ kosambiko nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0512a0:1662_2: Tadā bodhisatto aññatarasmiṃ nigame asītikoṭivibhavassa brāhmaṇamahāsālassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0512a0:1662_4: Tādisasseva brāhmaṇamahāsālassa putto brāhmaṇakumāro tassa piyasahāyo ahosi,
atk-s0512a0:1662_6: Te ubhopi aparabhāge mātāpitūnaṃ accayena kāmesu dosaṃ disvā mahādānaṃ pavattetvā kāme pahāya ñātimittaparijanassa
atk-s0512a0:1662_7: rodantassa paridevantassa nikkhamitvā himavantappadese assamaṃ katvā pabbajitvā uñchācariyāya vanamūlaphalāhārena
atk-s0512a0:1663_0: Te loṇambilasevanatthāya janapadacārikaṃ carantā kāsiraṭṭhaṃ sampāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1663_1: Tatrekasmiṃ nigame dīpāyanassa gihisahāyo maṇḍabyo nāma paṭivasati.
atk-s0512a0:1663_3: So te disvā attamano paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0512a0:1663_4: Te tattha tīṇi cattāri vassāni vasitvā taṃ āpucchitvā cārikaṃ carantā bārāṇasisamīpe atimuttakasusāne vasiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1663_5: Tattha dīpāyano yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā puna tasmiṃ nigame maṇḍabyassa attano sahāyassa santikaṃ gato.
atk-s0512a0:1664_0: Athekadivasaṃ eko coro antonagare corikaṃ katvā dhanasāraṃ ādāya nikkhanto paṭibuddhehi gehasāmikehi
atk-s0512a0:1664_1: nagarārakkhakamanussehi ca anubaddho niddhamanena nikkhamitvā vegena susānaṃ pavisitvā tāpasassa paṇṇasāladvāre
atk-s0512a0:1664_4: corikaṃ katvā divā tāpasavesena carasī”ti tajjetvā pothetvā taṃ ādāya rañño dassayiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1664_12: Tāpaso “kiṃ nu kho me pubbakamma”nti cintesi.

atk-s0512a0:1669_19: Dīpāyano pana tassa vaṇaṃ phāsukaṃ karitvā attano gihisahāyamaṇḍabyena kāritaṃ paṇṇasālameva gato.
atk-s0512a0:1673_0: Tattha āpucchitvānāti mayhaṃ sahāyaṃ maṇḍabyatāpasaṃ āpucchitvā.

atk-s0512a0:1674_4: Athassa putto yaññadattakumāro nāma caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ geṇḍukena kīḷi.

atk-s0512a0:1675_2: Athassa mātāpitaro sappena daṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā kumāraṃ ukkhipitvā tāpasassa pādamūle nipajjāpetvā “bhante,

atk-s0512a0:1675_8: Tāpaso “sādhu saccakiriyaṃ karissāmī”ti vatvā yaññadattassa sīse hatthaṃ ṭhapetvā saccakiriyaṃ akāsi.

atk-s0512a0:1730_0: Tato have dūrataraṃ vadanti, satañca dhammo asatañca rājā”ti. ;
atk-s0512a0:1731_0: Tā sutvā mahāsatto “saphalaṃ me āgamana”nti tuṭṭhacitto “imā gāthā neva sāvakabhāsitā,
atk-s0512a0:1731_5: Kiṃ nu kho aggha”nti cintento “imaṃ sakalampi cakkavāḷaṃ yāva brahmalokā sattaratanapuṇṇaṃ katvā dinnepi neva anucchavikaṃ kataṃ nāma hoti,

atk-s0512a0:1734_1: vanditvā “ahaṃ brāhmaṇena ābhataṃ saddhammaratanaṃ pūjetvā tassa ca sakkārasammānaṃ katvā āgamissāmīti

atk-s0512a0:1735_0: Mahāsatto “paṭiññāya saccāpanaṃ nāma sādhūnaṃ sappurisānaṃ āciṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1735_2: tasmā gamissāmiyevā”ti mātāpitaro vanditvā sesajanaṃ anusāsetvā assumukhena nānappakāraṃ paridevantena
atk-s0512a0:1735_3: itthāgārādinā janena anugato nagarā nikkhamma taṃ janaṃ nivattetuṃ magge daṇḍakena tiriyaṃ lekhaṃ katvā
atk-s0512a0:1735_4: “imaṃ mama lekhaṃ mā atikkamiṃsū”ti vatvā agamāsi.
atk-s0512a0:1735_5: Mahājano tejavato mahāsattassa āṇaṃ atikkamituṃ asakkonto mahāsaddena kanditvā roditvā nivatti.
atk-s0512a0:1736_0: Tattha kiṃ tvaṃ icchasi nisajjanti tvaṃ attano nagaraṃ gantuṃ mama hatthato nissajjanaṃ kiṃ icchasi,
atk-s0512a0:1736_1: tvaṃ “mayā takkasilādīsu ciraparicito saccavādī cā”ti vadasi,
atk-s0512a0:1736_4: Yadi me tvaṃ punehisīti sace puna tvaṃ ekaṃseneva mama santikaṃ āgamissasi.
atk-s0512a0:1737_1: Paṇhe āgamanaṃ mamāti pageva mama āgamanaṃ tassa porisādassa paṭissuṇitvā pātova āgamissāmīti paṭissavaṃ katvā.
atk-s0512a0:1737_2: Rajjaṃ niyyātayiṃ tadāti tadā porisādassa santikaṃ gantukāmo “idaṃ vo rajjaṃ paṭipajjathā”ti mātāpitūnaṃ tiyojanasatikaṃ rajjaṃ niyyātesiṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1738_2: Anussaritvā sataṃ dhammanti yasmā pana paṭiññāya saccāpanaṃ nāma sataṃ sādhūnaṃ mahābodhisattānaṃ paveṇī kulavaṃso,
atk-s0512a0:1738_3: tasmā taṃ saccapāramitādhammaṃ pubbakaṃ porāṇaṃ jinehi buddhādīhi sevitaṃ anussaritvā saccaṃ anurakkhanto
atk-s0512a0:1738_4: tassa brāhmaṇassa dhanaṃ datvā attano jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā porisādaṃ upāgamiṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1739_1: Natthi me saṃsayo tatthāti tasmiṃ porisādassa santikaṃ gamane “ayaṃ maṃ kiṃ nu kho ghātessati,
atk-s0512a0:1739_3: “Caṇḍo sāhasiko mayā saddhiṃ ekasatakhattiye devatāya balikammakaraṇasajjo ekanteneva ghātessatī”ti jānanto
atk-s0512a0:1739_4: eva kevalaṃ saccavācaṃ anurakkhanto attano jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā taṃ upāgamiṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1740_0: Upāgate pana mahāsatte vikasitapuṇḍarīkapadumasassirikamassa mukhaṃ disvā “ayaṃ vigatamaraṇabhayo hutvā āgato,
atk-s0512a0:1740_1: kissa nu kho esa ānubhāvo”ti cintento “tassa maññe dhammassa sutattā ayaṃ evaṃ tejavā nibbhayo ca jāto,
atk-s0512a0:1740_2: ahampi taṃ sutvā tejavā nibbhayo ca bhavissāmī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā porisādo mahāsattaṃ āha –

atk-s0512a0:1741_0: Taṃ sutvā bodhisatto “ayaṃ porisādo pāpadhammo, imaṃ thokaṃ niggahetvā lajjāpetvā kathessāmī”ti –
atk-s0512a0:1743_0: Natthi saccaṃ kuto dhammo, kiṃ sutena karissasī”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:1746_0: Api gāthā suṇitvāna, dhamme me ramate mano”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:1747_2: sādhukaṃ suṇohi manasikarohī”ti vatvā nandabrāhmaṇena kathitaniyāmeneva gāthānaṃ sakkaccaṃ thutiṃ katvā

atk-s0512a0:1756_1: Tassa tena sukathitattā ceva attano ca puññānubhāvena gāthā suṇantasseva sakalasarīraṃ pañcavaṇṇāya pītiyā paripūri.
atk-s0512a0:1756_4: ekekāya gāthāya ekekaṃ varaṃ dassāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0512a0:1756_5: Atha naṃ mahāsatto “tvaṃ attanopi hitāni ajānanto parassa kiṃ nāma varaṃ dassasī”ti apasādetvā puna tena
atk-s0512a0:1756_6: “varaṃ gaṇhathā”ti yācito sabbapaṭhamaṃ “ahaṃ cirakālaṃ taṃ arogaṃ passeyya”nti varaṃ yāci.
atk-s0512a0:1756_7: So “ayaṃ idāni me vadhitvā maṃsaṃ khāditukāmassa mahānatthakarassa mayhameva jīvitamicchatī”ti tuṭṭhamānaso
atk-s0512a0:1756_9: Mahāsatto hi upāyakusalatāya tassa ciraṃ jīvitukāmatāpadesena attano jīvitaṃ yāci.
atk-s0512a0:1756_10: Atha “parosataṃ khattiyānaṃ jīvitaṃ dehī”ti dutiyaṃ varaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1756_11: tesaṃ sake raṭṭhe paṭipādanaṃ tatiyaṃ varaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1756_13: So tīṇi varāni datvā catutthaṃ varaṃ adātukāmo “aññaṃ varaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vatvāpi mahāsattena nippīḷiyamāno tampi adāsiyeva.
atk-s0512a0:1757_0: Atha bodhisatto porisādaṃ nibbisevanaṃ katvā teneva rājāno mocāpetvā bhūmiyaṃ nipajjāpetvā dārakānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1757_1: kaṇṇato suttavaṭṭi viya saṇikaṃ rajjuyo nīharitvā porisādena ekaṃ tacaṃ āharāpetvā pāsāṇena ghaṃsitvā
atk-s0512a0:1757_4: Dvīhatīhaṃ tattheva vasitvā te aroge kāretvā tehi saddhiṃ abhijjanakasabhāvaṃ mittasanthavaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0512a0:1757_5: tehi saddhiṃ taṃ bārāṇasiṃ netvā rajje patiṭṭhāpetvā “appamattā hothā”ti te rājāno attano attano nagaraṃ
atk-s0512a0:1757_6: pesetvā indapatthanagarato āgatāya attano caturaṅginiyā senāya parivuto attano nagaraṃ gato tuṭṭhapamuditena
atk-s0512a0:1757_7: nāgarajanena samparivāriyamāno antepuraṃ pavisitvā mātāpitaro vanditvā mahātalaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0512a0:1758_0: Atha mahāsatto cha dānasālāyo kāretvā devasikaṃ mahādānāni pavattento sīlāni paripūrento uposathaṃ upavasanto pāramiyo anubrūhesi.
atk-s0512a0:1758_1: Tepi rājāno mahāsattassa ovāde ṭhatvā dānādīni puññāni katvā āyupariyosāne saggapuraṃ pūrayiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1764_1: Terasame sāmo yadā vane āsinti himavantasmiṃ migasammatāya nāma nadiyā tīre mahati araññe sāmo nāma tāpasakumāro yadā ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:1764_2: Sakkena abhinimmitoti sakkassa devānamindassa upadesasampattiyā jātattā sakkena nibbattito janito.
atk-s0512a0:1764_4: atīte bārāṇasito avidūre nadiyā tīre eko nesādagāmo ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:1764_7: Tassā eva nadiyā paratīrepi eko nesādagāmo ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:1764_12: Te ubhopi kilesasamuddaṃ anotaritvā brahmāno viya ekato vasiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1765_6: Dvepi janā himavantaṃ pavisitvā yasmiṃ ṭhāne migasammatā nāma nadī himavantato otaritvā gaṅgaṃ pattā,
atk-s0512a0:1765_7: taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā gaṅgaṃ pahāya migasammatābhimukhā abhiruhiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1765_9: Sakko taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā vissakammunā tasmiṃ ṭhāne assamaṃ māpesi.
atk-s0512a0:1765_10: Te tattha gantvā pabbajitvā sakkadattiye assame kāmāvacaramettaṃ bhāvetvā paṭivasiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1766_0: So ekadivasaṃ “tesaṃ cakkhū parihāyissantī”ti ñatvā upasaṅkamitvā “bhante,
atk-s0512a0:1766_4: tasmā pārikāya utunikāle nābhiṃ hatthena parāmaseyyātha,
atk-s0512a0:1766_7: Dukūlapaṇḍito taṃ kāraṇaṃ pārikāya ācikkhitvā tassā utunikāle nābhiṃ parāmasi.
atk-s0512a0:1766_8: Tadā bodhisatto devalokā cavitvā tassā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0512a0:1766_11: Taṃ aparabhāge vaḍḍhitvā soḷasavassuddesikampi mātāpitaro rakkhantā assame nisīdāpetvā sayameva vanamūlaphalāphalatthāya gacchanti.
atk-s0512a0:1767_0: Athekadivasaṃ vane phalāphalaṃ ādāya nivattitvā assamapadato avidūre meghe uṭṭhite rukkhamūlaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0512a0:1767_1: vammikamatthake ṭhitānaṃ sarīrato sedagandhamissake udake tasmiṃ vammikabile ṭhitassa āsivisassa nāsāpuṭaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1767_5: kā nu kho tesaṃ pavattī”ti paṭimaggaṃ gantvā saddamakāsi.
atk-s0512a0:1767_6: Te tassa saddaṃ sañjānitvā paṭisaddaṃ katvā puttasinehena “tāta sāma,
atk-s0512a0:1767_8: mā āgamī”ti vatvā saddānusārena sayameva samāgamiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1767_9: So “kena vo kāraṇena cakkhūni vinaṭṭhānī”ti pucchitvā “tāta,
atk-s0512a0:1767_12: atha na passāmā”ti vuttamatte eva aññāsi “tattha āsivisena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1768_1: ahaṃ vo paṭijaggissāmī”ti mātāpitaro assamaṃ netvā tesaṃ rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānādisañcaraṇaṭṭhāne rajjuke bandhi.
atk-s0512a0:1768_2: Tato paṭṭhāya te assame ṭhapetvā vanamūlaphalāphalāni āharati,
atk-s0512a0:1768_7: Tehi mukhe vikkhālite sayaṃ paribhuñjitvā mātāpitaro vanditvā tesaṃ avidūreyeva acchati –
atk-s0512a0:1768_13: Evaṃ so divase divase phalāphalatthāya araññaṃ gacchantopi āgacchantopi migagaṇaparivuto eva ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:1768_15: mettānubhāvena panassa vasanaṭṭhāne aññamaññaṃ tiracchānagatā muducittataṃ paṭilabhiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1768_16: Iti so sabbattha mettānubhāvena abhīrū anutrāsī brahmā viya avero vihāsi.
atk-s0512a0:1769_4: Atha vā mettā ayati pavattati etenāti mettāyo,
atk-s0512a0:1769_6: Taṃ mettāyaṃ upanāmayiṃ sattesu anodhiso upanesiṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1769_12: tattha sīhabyagghehi saddhiṃ ahaṃ sattesu mettaṃ upanāmesiṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1769_13: Sīhabyagghāpi hi tadā mamānubhāvena sattesu mettacittataṃ paṭilabhiṃsu,
atk-s0512a0:1770_2: Parivāretvāti etehi attānaṃ parivāritaṃ katvā tasmiṃ araññe vasiṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1771_1: Idāni tadā attano mettābhāvanāya laddhaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ matthakappattiñcassa dassetuṃ “na maṃ koci uttasatī”ti osānagāthamāha.
atk-s0512a0:1771_3: sasabiḷārādiko bhīrukajātikopi koci satto maṃ na uttasati na ubbijjeti.
atk-s0512a0:1771_4: Ahampi kassaci sīhabyagghāditiracchānato yakkhādiamanussato luddalohitapāṇimanussatoti kutocipi na bhāyāmi. Kasmā?
atk-s0512a0:1771_5: Yasmā mettābalenupatthaddho cirakālaṃ bhāvitāya mettāpāramitāyānubhāvena upatthambhito tasmiṃ pavane mahāaraññe tadā ramāmi abhiramāmīti.
atk-s0512a0:1772_0: Evaṃ pana mahāsatto sabbasatte mettāyanto mātāpitaro ca sādhukaṃ paṭijagganto ekadivasaṃ araññato madhuraphalāphalaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1772_1: āharitvā assame ṭhapetvā mātāpitaro vanditvā “pānīyaṃ ādāya āgamissāmī”ti migagaṇaparivuto dve mige ekato
atk-s0512a0:1772_2: katvā tesaṃ piṭṭhiyaṃ pānīyaghaṭaṃ ṭhapetvā hatthena gahetvā nadītitthaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0512a0:1772_3: Tasmiṃ samaye bārāṇasiyaṃ pīḷiyakkho nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0512a0:1772_4: So migamaṃsalobhena mātaraṃ rajjaṃ paṭicchāpetvā sannaddhapañcāvudho himavantaṃ pavisitvā mige vadhitvā
atk-s0512a0:1772_5: maṃsaṃ khāditvā caranto migasammataṃ nadiṃ patvā anupubbena sāmassa pānīyagahaṇatitthaṃ patto.
atk-s0512a0:1772_6: Migapadavalañjaṃ disvā gacchanto taṃ tathā gacchantaṃ disvā “mayā ettakaṃ kālaṃ evaṃ vicaranto manusso na diṭṭhapubbo,
atk-s0512a0:1772_7: devo nu kho esa nāgo nu kho,
atk-s0512a0:1772_10: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ etaṃ vijjhitvā dubbalaṃ katvā puccheyya”nti cintetvā mahāsattaṃ nhatvā vākacīraṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0512a0:1772_11: ajinacammaṃ ekaṃsaṃ karitvā pānīyaghaṭaṃ pūretvā ukkhipitvā vāmaṃsakūṭe ṭhapanakāle “idāni taṃ vijjhituṃ
atk-s0512a0:1772_14: Tassa viddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā migagaṇo bhīto palāyi.
atk-s0512a0:1773_0: Sāmapaṇḍito pana viddhopi pānīyaghaṭaṃ yathā vā tathā vā anavasumbhetvā satiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā saṇikaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1773_1: otāretvā vālukaṃ byūhitvā ṭhapetvā disaṃ vavatthapetvā mātāpitūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānadisābhāgena sīsaṃ katvā
atk-s0512a0:1773_2: nipajjitvā mukhena lohitaṃ chaḍḍetvā “mama koci verī nāma natthi,
atk-s0512a0:1773_3: mamapi katthaci veraṃ nāma natthī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0512a0:1774_0: “Ko nu maṃ usunā vijjhi, pamattaṃ udahārakaṃ;
atk-s0512a0:1775_0: Khattiyo brāhmaṇo vesso, ko maṃ viddhā nilīyatī”ti. ;
atk-s0512a0:1776_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā “ayaṃ mayā vijjhitvā pathaviyaṃ pātitopi neva maṃ akkosati na paribhāsati,
atk-s0512a0:1776_1: mama hadayamaṃsaṃ sambāhanto viya piyavacanena samudācarati,
atk-s0512a0:1776_2: gamissāmissa santika”nti cintetvā upasaṅkamitvā attānaṃ attanā ca viddhabhāvaṃ āvikatvā “ko vā tvaṃ kassa vā putto”ti mahāsattaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0512a0:1777_0: So “sāmo nāmāhaṃ dukūlapaṇḍitassa nāma nesādaisino putto,
atk-s0512a0:1777_2: So paṭhamaṃ “migasaññāyā”ti musāvādaṃ vatvā “ahaṃ imaṃ niraparādhaṃ akāraṇena vijjhi”nti anusocitvā yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1777_3: āvikatvā tassa mātāpitūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pucchitvā tattha gantvā tesaṃ attānaṃ āvikatvā tehi katapaṭisanthāro
atk-s0512a0:1777_4: “sāmo mayā viddho”ti vatvā te paridevante sokasamāpanne “yaṃ sāmena kattabbaṃ paricārikakammaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1777_5: taṃ katvā ahaṃ vo upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti samassāsetvā sāmassa santikaṃ ānesi.
atk-s0512a0:1777_6: Te tattha gantvā nānappakāraṃ paridevitvā tassa ure hatthaṃ ṭhapetvā “puttassa me sarīre usumā vattateva,
atk-s0512a0:1777_7: visavegena visaññitaṃ āpanno bhavissatīti nibbisabhāvatthāya saccakiriyaṃ karissāmā”ti cintetvā –
atk-s0512a0:1778_0: “Yaṃ kiñcitthi kataṃ puññaṃ, mayhañceva pitucca te;
atk-s0512a0:1779_0: Sabbena tena kusalena, visaṃ sāmassa haññatū”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:1781_0: “Yaṃ kiñcitthi kataṃ puññaṃ, mayhañceva mātucca te;
atk-s0512a0:1782_0: Sabbena tena kusalena, visaṃ sāmassa haññatū”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:1785_0: Na me piyataro koci, añño sāmena vijjati;
atk-s0512a0:1787_0: Devatāya ca saccakiriyāya katāya mahāsatto khippaṃ vuṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0512a0:1787_1: Padumapattapalāse udakabindu viya vinivaṭṭetvā ābādho vigato.
atk-s0512a0:1787_7: tesaṃ catunnampi assameyeva avaṭṭhānanti sabbaṃ ekakkhaṇeyeva ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:1788_0: Atha mahāsatto raññā saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “dhammaṃ cara,
atk-s0512a0:1788_1: mahārājā”tiādinā dhammaṃ desetvā uttarimpi ovaditvā pañca sīlāni adāsi.
atk-s0512a0:1788_2: So tassa ovādaṃ sirasā paṭiggahetvā vanditvā bārāṇasiṃ gantvā dānādīni puññāni katvā saggaparāyano ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:1788_3: Bodhisattopi saddhiṃ mātāpitūhi abhiññāsamāpattiyo nibbattetvā āyupariyosāne brahmalokūpago ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:1790_1: Tathā visapītena sallena dakkhiṇapassena pavisitvā vāmapassato vinivijjhanavasena viddhopi kiñci kāyavikāraṃ
atk-s0512a0:1790_6: aroge jāte rañño kāruññaṃ mettañca upaṭṭhāpetvā dhammadesanā,
atk-s0512a0:1793_0: 114. Cuddasame ekarājāti vissutoti ekarājāti iminā anvatthanāmena jambudīpatale pākaṭo.
atk-s0512a0:1794_0: Mahāsatto hi tadā bārāṇasirañño putto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0512a0:1794_1: Vayappatto sabbasippanipphattiṃ patto hutvā pitu accayena rajjaṃ kārento kusalasīlācārasaddhāsutādianaññasādhāraṇaguṇavisesayogena
atk-s0512a0:1794_2: pāramiparibhāvanena ca jambudīpatale adutiyattā padhānabhāvena ca “ekarājā”ti pakāsanāmo ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:1794_4: paramaṃ uttamaṃ dasakusalakammapathasīlaṃ samādānavasena ca avītikkamanavasena ca adhiṭṭhahitvā anuṭṭhahitvā.
atk-s0512a0:1794_5: Pasāsāmi mahāmahinti tiyojanasatike kāsiraṭṭhe mahatiṃ mahiṃ anusāsāmi rajjaṃ kāremi.
atk-s0512a0:1795_1: Dasakusalakammapatheti pāṇātipātāveramaṇi yāva sammādiṭṭhīti etasmiṃ dasavidhe kusalakammapathe,
atk-s0512a0:1795_3: Catūhi saṅgahavatthūhīti dānaṃ piyavacanaṃ atthacariyā samānattatāti imehi catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi saṅgaṇhanakāraṇehi yadā ekarājāti vissuto homi,
atk-s0512a0:1796_1: Evanti dasakusalakammapathasīlaparipūraṇaṃ catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi mahājanasaṅgaṇhananti yathāvuttena iminā ākārena appamattassa.
atk-s0512a0:1796_2: Idhaloke parattha cāti imasmiṃ loke yaṃ appamajjanaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1796_4: paraloke yaṃ appamajjanaṃ tattha samparāyike atthe appamattassa me satoti attho.
atk-s0512a0:1796_6: Upagantvāti caturaṅginiṃ senaṃ sannayhitvā abbhuyyānavasena mama rajjaṃ upagantvā.
atk-s0512a0:1796_7: Acchindanto puraṃ mamāti mama bārāṇasinagaraṃ balakkārena gaṇhanto.
atk-s0512a0:1797_1: mahāsatto hi tadā nagarassa catūsu dvāresu catasso majjhe ekaṃ nivesanadvāre ekanti cha dānasālāyo kāretvā kapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ dānaṃ deti,
atk-s0512a0:1797_4: khantimettānuddayasampanno aṅke nisinnaṃ puttaṃ paritosayamāno viya sabbasatte paritosayamāno dhammena rajjaṃ kāreti.
atk-s0512a0:1797_5: Tasseko amacco antepuraṃ padussitvā aparabhāge pākaṭova jāto.
atk-s0512a0:1797_7: Rājā pariggaṇhanto taṃ attanā paccakkhato ñatvā taṃ amaccaṃ pakkosāpetvā “andhabāla,
atk-s0512a0:1797_9: na tvaṃ mama vijite vasituṃ arahasi,
atk-s0512a0:1797_10: attano dhanañca puttadārañca gahetvā aññattha yāhī”ti raṭṭhā pabbājesi.
atk-s0512a0:1798_0: So kosalajanapadaṃ gantvā dabbasenaṃ nāma kosalarājānaṃ upaṭṭhahanto anukkamena tassa vissāsiko hutvā ekadivasaṃ taṃ rājānaṃ āha – “deva,
atk-s0512a0:1798_4: Dabbaseno bārāṇasirañño mahānubhāvatāya tassa vacanaṃ asaddahanto manusse pesetvā kāsiraṭṭhe gāmaghātādīni
atk-s0512a0:1798_5: kāretvā tesaṃ corānaṃ bodhisattena dhanaṃ datvā vissajjitabhāvaṃ sutvā “ativiya dhammiko rājā”ti ñatvā
atk-s0512a0:1798_7: Atha bārāṇasirañño mahāyodhā “kosalarājā āgacchatī”ti sutvā “amhākaṃ rajjasīmaṃ anokkamantameva naṃ pothetvā gaṇhāmā”ti attano rañño vadiṃsu.
atk-s0512a0:1799_7: Dabbaseno bahinagare ṭhatvā “rajjaṃ vā detu yuddhaṃ vā”ti ekarājassa sāsanaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0512a0:1799_11: na mayaṃ kosalarañño nagaraṃ pavisituṃ dema,
atk-s0512a0:1799_13: Rājā purimanayeneva nivāretvā nagaradvārāni avāpurāpetvā mahātale pallaṅkamajjhe nisīdi.
atk-s0512a0:1799_14: Dabbaseno mahantena balavāhanena nagaraṃ pavisitvā ekampi paṭisattuṃ apassanto sabbarajjaṃ hatthagataṃ
atk-s0512a0:1799_15: katvā rājanivesanaṃ gantvā mahātalaṃ āruyha niraparādhaṃ bodhisattaṃ gaṇhāpetvā āvāṭe nikhaṇāpesi.
atk-s0512a0:1803_0: Sabbaṃ hatthagataṃ katvā, kāsuyā nikhaṇī mama”nti.
atk-s0512a0:1804_0: Tattha rājūpajīveti amaccapārisajjabrāhmaṇagahapatiādike rājānaṃ upanissāya jīvante.
atk-s0512a0:1804_6: rājūpajīve nigame ca aññañca sabbaṃ hatthagataṃ katvā.
atk-s0512a0:1804_7: Kāsuyā nikhaṇī mamanti sabalavāhanaṃ sakalaṃ mama rajjaṃ gahetvā mampi galappamāṇe āvāṭe nikhaṇāpesi.
atk-s0512a0:1805_0: “Anuttare kāmaguṇe samiddhe, bhutvāna pubbe vasi ekarājā;
atk-s0512a0:1806_0: So dāni dugge narakamhi khitto, nappajjahe vaṇṇabalaṃ purāṇa”nti. –
atk-s0512a0:1807_1: Jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “sikkāya pakkhipāpetvā uttarummāre heṭṭhāsīsakaṃ olambesī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1808_0: Mahāsatto corarājānaṃ ārabbha mettaṃ bhāvetvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā jhānābhiññāyo nibbattetvā kāsuto uggantvā ākāse pallaṅkena nisīdi.
atk-s0512a0:1812_0: Tattha amaccamaṇḍalanti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ rājakicce raññā amā saha vattantīti amaccā,
atk-s0512a0:1812_3: Itthāgāradāsidāsaparijanehi ceva vatthābharaṇādiupabhogūpakaraṇehi ca samiddhaṃ mama antepurañca acchinditvā
atk-s0512a0:1812_4: gahitakaṃ gaṇhantaṃ amittarājānaṃ yāya attano piyaputtaṃva passiṃ ahaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1812_5: tāya evaṃbhūtāya mettāya me samo sakalaloke natthi,
atk-s0512a0:1812_6: tasmā evaṃbhūtā esā me mettāpāramī paramatthapāramibhāvaṃ pattāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0512a0:1813_0: Evaṃ pana mahāsatte taṃ corarājānaṃ ārabbha mettaṃ pharitvā ākāse pallaṅkena nisinne tassa sarīre dāho uppajji.
atk-s0512a0:1813_4: “Tena hi vegena gantvā taṃ uddharathā”ti āha.
atk-s0512a0:1813_5: Purisā gantvā taṃ rājānaṃ ākāse pallaṅkena nisinnaṃ disvā āgantvā dabbasenassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1813_6: So vegena gantvā vanditvā khamāpetvā “tumhākaṃ rajjaṃ tumheva kāretha,
atk-s0512a0:1813_7: ahaṃ vo core paṭibāhessāmī”ti vatvā tassa duṭṭhāmaccassa rājāṇaṃ kāretvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0512a0:1813_8: Bodhisattopi rajjaṃ amaccānaṃ niyyātetvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā mahājanaṃ sīlādiguṇesu patiṭṭhāpetvā āyupariyosāne brahmalokaparāyano ahosi.
atk-s0512a0:1814_0: Tadā dabbaseno ānandatthero ahosi, ekarājā lokanātho.
atk-s0512a0:1815_0: Tassa divase divase chasu dānasālāsu chasatasahassavissajjanena paccatthikarañño sakalarajjapariccāgena ca dānapāramī,
atk-s0512a0:1815_8: paccatthikepi ekantena hitūpasaṃhāravasena mettājhānanibbattanena ca mettāpāramī,
atk-s0512a0:1815_9: duṭṭhāmaccena dabbasenena ca katāparādhe hitesīhi attano amaccādīhi nibbattite upakāre ca ajjhupekkhaṇena
atk-s0512a0:1815_10: rajjasukhappattakāle paccatthikaraññā narake khittakāle samānacittatāya ca upekkhāpāramī veditabbā.
atk-s0512a0:1816_0: “Panujja dukkhena sukhaṃ janinda, sukhena vā dukkhamasayhasāhi;
atk-s0512a0:1817_0: Ubhayattha santo abhinibbutattā, sukhe ca dukkhe ca bhavanti tulyā”ti. ;
atk-s0512a0:1818_1: tasmā tadatthadīpanatthaṃ sā eva pāḷi āruḷhā.
atk-s0512a0:1818_2: Tathā idha mahāsattassa sabbasattesu orasaputte viya samānukampatādayo guṇavisesā niddhāretabbāti.
atk-s0512a0:1823_0: Mahāsatto hi tadā mahati uḷārabhoge kule nibbattitvā vuddhimanvāya disāpāmokkhassa ācariyassa santike
atk-s0512a0:1823_1: garuvāsaṃ vasanto sabbasippānaṃ nipphattiṃ patvā kulagharaṃ āgantvā mātāpitūnaṃ accayena ñātakehi “kuṭumbaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1823_2: saṇṭhapehī”ti yāciyamānopi aniccatāmanasikāramukhena sabbabhavesu abhivaḍḍhamānasaṃvego kāye ca asubhasaññaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1823_3: paṭilabhitvā gharāvāsapalibodhādhibhūtaṃ kilesagahanaṃ anogāhetvāva cirakālasamparicitaṃ nekkhammajjhāsayaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1823_4: upabrūhayamāno mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya pabbajitukāmo hutvā puna cintesi –
atk-s0512a0:1824_0: So lābhasakkāraṃ jigucchanto pabbajjaṃ anupagantvā “pahomi cāhaṃ lābhālābhādīsu nibbikāro hotu”nti attānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1824_1: takkento “visesato paraparibhavasahanādipaṭipadaṃ pūrento upekkhāpāramiṃ matthakaṃ pāpessāmī”ti nivatthavattheneva
atk-s0512a0:1824_2: gehato nikkhamitvā paramasallekhavuttikopi abalabalo amandamando viya paresaṃ acittakarūpena hīḷitaparibhūto
atk-s0512a0:1824_6: So nivatthavatthe jiṇṇe pilotikakhaṇḍena tasmimpi jiṇṇe kenaci dinnaṃ aggaṇhanto hirikopīnapaṭicchādanamatteneva carati.
atk-s0512a0:1824_7: Evaṃ gacchante kāle ekaṃ nigamagāmaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0512a0:1825_0: Tattha gāmadārakā dhuttajātikā vedhaverā keci rājavallabhānaṃ puttanattudāsādayo ca uddhatā unnaḷā capalā
atk-s0512a0:1825_1: mukharā vikiṇṇavācā kālena kālaṃ kīḷābahulā vicaranti.
atk-s0512a0:1825_2: Duggate mahallake purise ca itthiyo ca gacchante disvā bhasmapuṭena piṭṭhiyaṃ ākiranti,
atk-s0512a0:1825_4: tena vippakārena parivattetvā olokente yathāvajjakīḷitaṃ dassetvā upahasanti.
atk-s0512a0:1825_5: Mahāpuriso tasmiṃ nigame te evaṃ vicarante dhuttadārake disvā “laddho vata dāni me upekkhāpāramiyā paripūraṇūpāyo”ti cintetvā tattha vihāsi.
atk-s0512a0:1825_6: Taṃ te dhuttadārakā passitvā vippakāraṃ kātuṃ ārabhanti.
atk-s0512a0:1826_0: Mahāsatto taṃ asahanto viya ca tehi bhāyanto viya ca uṭṭhahitvā gacchati.
atk-s0512a0:1826_2: So tehi anubandhiyamāno “ettha natthi koci paṭivattā”ti susānaṃ gantvā aṭṭhikaṃ sīsūpadhānaṃ katvā sayati.
atk-s0512a0:1826_3: Dhuttadārakāpi tattha gantvā oṭṭhubhanādikaṃ nānappakāraṃ vippakāraṃ katvā pakkamanti.
atk-s0512a0:1826_4: Evaṃ te divase divase karonti eva.
atk-s0512a0:1826_7: Te te paṭibāhitvā “ayaṃ mahānubhāvo tapassī mahāyogī”ti ca ñatvā uḷāraṃ sakkārasammānaṃ karonti.
atk-s0512a0:1826_8: Mahāsatto pana sabbattha ekasadisova hoti majjhattabhūto.
atk-s0512a0:1827_1: chavaṭṭhikaṃ upanidhāyāti āmakasusāne chaḍḍitakaḷevarato soṇasiṅgālādīhi tahiṃ tahiṃ vikkhittesu aṭṭhikesu
atk-s0512a0:1827_2: ekaṃ aṭṭhikaṃ sīsūpadhānaṃ katvā sucimhi ca asucimhi ca samānacittatāya tasmiṃ susāne seyyaṃ kappemi,
atk-s0512a0:1827_5: Rūpaṃ dassentinappakanti yathāvajjakīḷitāya oṭṭhubhanaupahasanaummihanādīhi kaṇṇasote salākappavesanādīhi
atk-s0512a0:1827_6: ca atikakkhaḷaṃ anappakaṃ nānappakāraṃ rūpaṃ vikāraṃ karonti.
atk-s0512a0:1828_2: Upāyanānūpanentīti “ayaṃ imesu paribhavavasena evarūpaṃ vippakāraṃ karontesu na kiñci vikāraṃ dasseti,
atk-s0512a0:1828_3: sammānane nu kho kīdiso”ti pariggaṇhantā vividhaṃ bahuṃ gandhamālaṃ bhojanaṃ aññāni ca upāyanāni paṇṇākārāni upanenti upaharanti.
atk-s0512a0:1828_4: Aparehi vā tehi anācāragāmadārakehi aññe viññū manussā “ayaṃ imesaṃ evaṃ vividhampi vippakāraṃ karontānaṃ na kuppati,
atk-s0512a0:1828_6: aho acchariyapuriso”ti haṭṭhā “bahu vatimehi etasmiṃ vippaṭipajjantehi apuññaṃ pasuta”nti saṃviggamānasāva
atk-s0512a0:1828_7: hutvā bahuṃ gandhamālaṃ vividhaṃ bhojanaṃ aññāni ca upāyanāni upanenti upaharanti.
atk-s0512a0:1829_1: Ye me dukkhaṃ upaharantīti ye gāmadārakā mayhaṃ sarīradukkhaṃ upaharanti upanenti.
atk-s0512a0:1829_4: Ye ca denti sukhaṃ mamāti ye ca viññū manussā mama mayhaṃ sukhaṃ denti,
atk-s0512a0:1829_6: Sabbesaṃ samako homīti katthacipi vikārānuppattiyā samānacittatāya vividhānampi tesaṃ janānaṃ samako ekasadiso homi bhavāmi.
atk-s0512a0:1829_7: Dayā kopo na vijjatīti yasmā mayhaṃ upakārake mettacittatāsaṅkhātā dayā,
atk-s0512a0:1830_1: Idāni bhagavā tadā upakārīsu apakārīsu ca sattesu samupacitañāṇasambhārassa attano samānacittatā vikārābhāvo yā ca lokadhammesu anupalittatā ahosi,
atk-s0512a0:1831_0: Tattha sukhadukkheti sukhe ca dukkhe ca.
atk-s0512a0:1831_1: Tulābhūtoti samakaṃ gahitatulā viya onatiunnatiapanatiṃ vajjetvā majjhattabhūto,
atk-s0512a0:1831_2: sukhadukkhaggahaṇeneva cettha taṃnimittabhāvato lābhālābhāpi gahitāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1831_6: Iti bhagavā tadā sabbasattesu sabbalokadhammesu ca anaññasādhāraṇaṃ attano majjhattabhāvaṃ kittetvā tena
atk-s0512a0:1831_7: tasmiṃ attabhāve attano upekkhāpāramiyā sikhāppattabhāvaṃ vibhāvento “esā me upekkhāpāramī”ti desanaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1832_0: Idhāpi mahāsattassa paṭhamaṃ dānapāramī nāma visesato sabbavibhavapariccāgo “ye keci imaṃ sarīraṃ gahetvā
atk-s0512a0:1832_1: yaṃkiñci attano icchitaṃ karontū”ti anapekkhabhāvena attano attabhāvapariccāgo ca dānapāramī,
atk-s0512a0:1832_3: kāmassādavimukhassa gehato nikkhantassa sato kāye asubhasaññānubrūhanā nekkhammapāramī,
atk-s0512a0:1832_4: sambodhisambhārānaṃ upakāradhammapariggahaṇe tappaṭipakkhappahāne ca kosallaṃ aviparītato dhammasabhāvacintanā ca paññāpāramī,
atk-s0512a0:1832_10: upekkhāpāramī panassa yathāvuttavaseneva veditabbāti dasa pāramiyo labbhanti.
atk-s0512a0:1832_11: Upekkhāpāramī cettha atisayavatīti katvā sāyeva desanaṃ āruḷhā.
atk-s0512a0:1832_12: Tathā idha mahāsattassa mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ mahantañca ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ pahāya mahābhinikkhamanasadisaṃ gehato nikkhamanaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1832_13: tathā nikkhamitvā lābhasakkāraṃ jigucchato paresaṃ sambhāvanaṃ pariharitukāmassa pabbajjāliṅgaṃ aggahetvā
atk-s0512a0:1832_20: bodhisambhārapaṭipakkhānaṃ kilesānaṃ tanubhāvena khīṇāsavānaṃ viya paresaṃ upakārāpakāresu nibbikārabhāvahetubhūtena
atk-s0512a0:1832_22: sabbapāramīnaṃ muddhabhūtāya upekkhāpāramiyā sikhāppattīti evamādayo guṇānubhāvā vibhāvetabbāti.
atk-s0512a0:1837_8: iti evaṃ iminā vidhānena mahantānaṃ dānapāramiādīnaṃ bodhisambhārānaṃ esanato mahesinā tadā bodhisattabhūtena
atk-s0512a0:1837_9: mayā vuṭṭhaṃ ciṇṇaṃ caritaṃ paṭipannaṃ āsi ahosīti attho.
atk-s0512a0:1837_10: Idāni pāramiparipūraṇavasena cirakālappavattitaṃ idha vuttaṃ avuttañca attano dukkarakiriyaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā yadatthaṃ sā pavattitā,
atk-s0512a0:1838_1: Bahubbidhaṃ dukkhanti akittipaṇḍitādikāle kārapaṇṇādiāhāratāya tañca yācakassa datvā āhārūpacchedādinā ca bahuvidhaṃ nānappakāraṃ dukkhaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1838_2: Tathā kururājādikāle sakkasampattisadisā sampattī ca bahubbidhā.
atk-s0512a0:1838_3: Bhavābhaveti khuddake ceva mahante ca bhave.
atk-s0512a0:1838_4: Bhavābhave vā vuddhihāniyo anubhavitvā bahuvidhehi dukkhehi avihaññamāno bahuvidhāhi ca sampattīhi anākaḍḍhiyamāno
atk-s0512a0:1838_5: pāramiparipūraṇapasuto eva hutvā tadanurūpaṃ paṭipattiṃ paṭipanno uttamaṃ anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ sabbaññutaṃ patto,
atk-s0512a0:1839_0: Idāni yāsaṃ pāramīnaṃ paripūraṇatthaṃ esā dukkaracariyā ciraṃ pavattitā,
atk-s0512a0:1839_1: tāsaṃ anavasesato paripuṇṇabhāvaṃ tena ca pattabbaphalassa attanā adhigatabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “datvā dātabbakaṃ dānaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1840_0: Tattha datvā dātabbakaṃ dānanti tadā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhituṃ aggayānapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannena

atk-s0512a0:1850_0: Cajato na hoti lagganaṃ, esā me nekkhammapāramī”ti. ;
atk-s0512a0:1851_0: Evaṃ nissaṅgatāya rajjaṃ chaḍḍetvā nikkhamantassa nekkhammapāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0512a0:1852_0: Paṇḍite paripucchitvāti kiṃ kusalaṃ kiṃ akusalaṃ kiṃ sāvajjaṃ kiṃ anavajjantiādinā kusalādidhammavibhāgaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1852_4: Tattha vidhurapaṇḍitakāle mahāgovindapaṇḍitakāle kudālapaṇḍitakāle arakapaṇḍitakāle bodhiparibbājakakāle
atk-s0512a0:1852_5: mahosadhapaṇḍitakāleti evamādīsu paññāpāramiyā pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0512a0:1854_0: Paññāya me samo natthi, esā me paññāpāramī”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:1855_0: Antobhastagataṃ sappaṃ dassentassa paññāpāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0512a0:1855_1: Vīriyaṃ katvāna uttamanti sammāsambodhiṃ pāpetuṃ samatthatāya uttamaṃ padhānaṃ vīriyanti vividhampi vīriyapāramiṃ katvā uppādetvā.
atk-s0512a0:1855_2: Tattha mahāsīlavarājakāle pañcāvudhakumārakāle mahāvānarindakāleti evamādīsu vīriyapāramiyā pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0512a0:1857_0: Cittassa aññathā natthi, esā me vīriyapāramī”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:1858_0: Evaṃ mahāsamuddaṃ tarantassa vīriyapāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0512a0:1859_0: Khantiyā pāramiṃ gantvāti adhivāsanakhantiādi khantiparamukkaṃsabhāvaṃ pāpento khantiyā pāramiṃ paramakoṭiṃ gantvā,
atk-s0512a0:1859_2: Tattha mahākapikāle mahiṃsarājakāle rurumigarājakāle dhammadevaputtakāleti evamādīsu khantipāramiyā pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0512a0:1861_0: Kāsirāje na kuppāmi, esā me khantipāramī”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:1862_0: Evaṃ acetanabhāvena viya mahādukkhaṃ anubhavantassa khantipāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0512a0:1863_0: Katvā daḷhamadhiṭṭhānanti kusalasamādānādhiṭṭhānaṃ tassa tassa pāramisamādānassa tadupakārakasamādānassa ca adhiṭṭhānaṃ daḷhataraṃ asithilaṃ katvā,

atk-s0512a0:1863_2: Tattha jotipālakāle sarabhaṅgakāle nemikāleti evamādīsu adhiṭṭhānapāramiyā pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0512a0:1864_0: “Mātāpitā na me dessā, attā me na ca dessiyo;
atk-s0512a0:1866_0: Evaṃ jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā vataṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa adhiṭṭhānapāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0512a0:1867_0: Saccavācānurakkhiyāti saccavācaṃ anurakkhitvā jīvitantarāyepi anariyavohāraṃ gūthaṃ viya jigucchanto pariharitvā sabbaso avisaṃvādibhāvaṃ rakkhitvā.
atk-s0512a0:1867_1: Tattha kapirājakāle saccatāpasakāle maccharājakāleti evamādīsu saccapāramiyā pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0512a0:1869_0: Mocesiṃ ekasataṃ khattiye, esā me saccapāramī”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:1870_0: Evaṃ jīvitaṃ cajitvā saccaṃ anurakkhantassa saccapāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.

atk-s0512a0:1871_1: Tattha cūḷadhammapālakāle mahāsīlavarājakāle sāmapaṇḍitakāleti evamādīsu mettāpāramiyā pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0512a0:1872_0: “Na maṃ koci uttasati, napihaṃ bhāyāmi kassaci;
atk-s0512a0:1874_0: Evaṃ jīvitampi anoloketvā mettāyantassa mettāpāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0512a0:1875_0: Sammānanāvamānaneti sakkaccaṃ pūjāsakkārādinā sammānane oṭṭhubhanādinā avamānane ca sabbattha lokadhamme

atk-s0512a0:1878_0: Evaṃ gāmadārakesu oṭṭhubhanādīhi ceva mālāgandhūpahārādīhi ca sukhadukkhaṃ uppādentesupi upekkhaṃ anativattantassa
atk-s0512a0:1881_0: Sammāsambodhiṃ adhigantuṃ imasmiṃ bhaddakappe attanā kataṃ dukkaracariyaṃ saṅkhepeneva vatvā puna –
atk-s0512a0:1890_0: Attanā sammadeva paripūritā dasa pāramiyo dasseti.
atk-s0512a0:1892_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā mahābodhiyānapaṭipattiyaṃ ussāhajātānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ bodhisambhāresu nānappakārakosallatthaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1894_2: Taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi anupahatā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā dānādayo guṇā pāramiyo.
atk-s0512a0:1895_10: Atha vā paraṃ sattaṃ attani mavati bandhati guṇavisesayogena,
atk-s0512a0:1895_11: paraṃ vā adhikataraṃ majjati sujjhati saṃkilesamalato,
atk-s0512a0:1895_12: paraṃ vā seṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ visesena mayati gacchati,
atk-s0512a0:1895_13: paraṃ vā lokaṃ pamāṇabhūtena ñāṇavisesena idhalokaṃ viya munāti paricchindati,
atk-s0512a0:1895_14: paraṃ vā ativiya sīlādiguṇagaṇaṃ attano santāne minoti pakkhipati,
atk-s0512a0:1895_15: paraṃ vā attabhūtato dhammakāyato aññaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ vā tadanatthakaraṃ kilesacoragaṇaṃ mināti hiṃsatīti paramo,
atk-s0512a0:1895_18: Pāre vā nibbāne majjati sujjhati satte ca sodheti,
atk-s0512a0:1895_19: tattha vā satte mavati bandhati yojeti,
atk-s0512a0:1895_20: taṃ vā mayati gacchati gameti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1895_23: kilesārayo vā sattānaṃ tattha mināti hiṃsatīti pāramī,
atk-s0512a0:1896_0: Katividhāti? Saṅkhepato dasavidhā. Tā pana pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato āgatāyeva. Yathāha –
atk-s0512a0:1899_16: idaṃ vatvā sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā –
atk-s0512a0:1902_2: So pana saṅgaho parato āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0512a0:1903_4: iti yathā ādimhi pavicitā samādinnā ca,
atk-s0512a0:1903_6: Tattha dānaṃ sīlassa bahūpakāraṃ sukarañcāti taṃ ādimhi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1903_7: Dānaṃ sīlapariggahitaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsanti dānānantaraṃ sīlaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1903_15: mettā upekkhāpariggahitā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsāti mettānantaramupekkhā vuttā.
atk-s0512a0:1903_16: Upekkhā pana karuṇāpariggahitā karuṇā ca upekkhāpariggahitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0512a0:1903_17: “Kathaṃ pana mahākāruṇikā bodhisattā sattesu upekkhakā hontī”ti?
atk-s0512a0:1903_19: na pana sabbattha sabbadā cā”ti keci.
atk-s0512a0:1904_1: pacurajanesupi pavattiyā sabbasattasādhāraṇattā appaphalattā sukarattā ca ādimhi dānaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1904_2: Sīlena dāyakapaṭiggāhakasuddhito parānuggahaṃ vatvā parapīḷānivattivacanato kiriyadhammaṃ vatvā akiriyadhammavacanato
atk-s0512a0:1904_3: bhogasampattihetuṃ vatvā bhavasampattihetuvacanato ca dānassa anantaraṃ sīlaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1904_4: Nekkhammena sīlasampattisiddhito kāyavacīsucaritaṃ vatvā manosucaritavacanato visuddhasīlassa sukheneva
atk-s0512a0:1904_5: jhānasamijjhanato kammāparādhappahānena payogasuddhiṃ vatvā kilesāparādhappahānena āsayasuddhivacanato
atk-s0512a0:1904_6: vītikkamappahānena cittassa pariyuṭṭhānappahānavacanato ca sīlassa anantaraṃ nekkhammaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1904_7: Paññāya nekkhammassa siddhiparisuddhito jhānābhāvena paññābhāvavacanato “samādhipadaṭṭhānā hi paññā,
atk-s0512a0:1904_9: Samathanimittaṃ vatvā upekkhānimittavacanato parahitajjhānena parahitakaraṇūpāyakosallavacanato ca nekkhammassa anantaraṃ paññā vuttā.
atk-s0512a0:1904_10: Vīriyārambhena paññākiccasiddhito sattasuññatādhammanijjhānakkhantiṃ vatvā sattahitāya ārambhassa acchariyatāvacanato
atk-s0512a0:1904_11: upekkhānimittaṃ vatvā paggahanimittavacanato nisammakāritaṃ vatvā uṭṭhānavacanato ca “nisammakārino hi
atk-s0512a0:1904_12: uṭṭhānaṃ phalavisesamāvahatī”ti paññāya anantaraṃ vīriyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1905_0: Vīriyena titikkhāsiddhito “vīriyavā hi āraddhavīriyattā sattasaṅkhārehi upanītaṃ dukkhaṃ abhibhuyya viharati”.
atk-s0512a0:1905_2: Paggahanimittaṃ vatvā samathanimittavacanato accārambhena uddhaccadosappahānavacanato “dhammanijjhānakkhantiyā hi uddhaccadoso pahīyati”.
atk-s0512a0:1905_3: Vīriyavato sātaccakaraṇavacanato “khantibahulo hi anuddhato sātaccakārī hoti”.
atk-s0512a0:1905_4: Appamādavato parahitakiriyārambhe paccupakārataṇhābhāvavacanato “yāthāvato dhammanijjhāne hi sati taṇhā na hoti”.
atk-s0512a0:1905_5: Parahitārambhe paramepi parakatadukkhasahanatāvacanato ca vīriyassa anantaraṃ khanti vuttā.
atk-s0512a0:1905_6: Saccena khantiyā cirādhiṭṭhānato apakārino apakārakhantiṃ vatvā tadupakārakaraṇe avisaṃvādavacanato khantiyā
atk-s0512a0:1905_7: apavādavācāvikampanena bhūtavāditāya avijahanavacanato sattasuññatādhammanijjhānakkhantiṃ vatvā tadupabrūhitañāṇasaccavacanato
atk-s0512a0:1906_1: Avisaṃvāditaṃ vatvā tattha acalabhāvavacanato “saccasandho hi dānādīsu paṭiññānurūpaṃ niccalova pavattati”.
atk-s0512a0:1906_2: Ñāṇasaccaṃ vatvā sambhāresu pavattiniṭṭhāpanavacanato “yathābhūtañāṇavā hi bodhisambhāre adhiṭṭhāti,
atk-s0512a0:1906_3: te ca niṭṭhāpeti paṭipakkhehi akampiyabhāvato”ti saccassa anantaraṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1906_4: Mettāya parahitakaraṇasamādānādhiṭṭhānasiddhito adhiṭṭhānaṃ vatvā hitūpasaṃhāravacanato “bodhisambhāre hi adhitiṭṭhamāno mettāvihārī hoti”.
atk-s0512a0:1906_5: Acalādhiṭṭhānassa samādānāvikopanena samādānasambhavato ca adhiṭṭhānassa anantaraṃ mettā vuttā.
atk-s0512a0:1906_6: Upekkhāya mettāvisuddhito sattesu hitūpasaṃhāraṃ vatvā tadaparādhesu udāsīnatāvacanato mettābhāvanaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1906_7: vatvā tannissandabhāvanāvacanato hitakāmasattepi upekkhakoti acchariyaguṇatāvacanato ca mettāya anantaraṃ
atk-s0512a0:1907_0: Kāni lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānānīti ettha avisesena tāva sabbāpi pāramiyo parānuggahalakkhaṇā,
atk-s0512a0:1908_0: Visesena pana yasmā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā attūpakaraṇapariccāgacetanā dānapāramitā,
atk-s0512a0:1908_1: karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitaṃ kāyavacīsucaritaṃ atthato akattabbaviratikattabbakaraṇacetanādayo ca sīlapāramitā.
atk-s0512a0:1908_8: karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahito lokassa hitasukhūpasaṃhāro atthato abyāpādo mettāpāramitā,
atk-s0512a0:1908_9: karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā anunayapaṭighaviddhaṃsanī iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu sattasaṅkhāresu samappavatti upekkhāpāramitā.
atk-s0512a0:1909_11: Kāmato ca bhavato ca nikkhamanalakkhaṇā nekkhammapāramī,
atk-s0512a0:1910_0: Ettha ca karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitatā dānādīnaṃ pariccāgādilakkhaṇassa visesanabhāvena vattabbā.
atk-s0512a0:1910_1: Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitāni hi dānādīni bodhisattasantāne pavattāni dānādipāramiyo nāma honti.
atk-s0512a0:1911_0: Ko paccayoti? Abhinīhāro tāva pāramīnaṃ paccayo. Yo hi ayaṃ –
atk-s0512a0:1915_0: Evaṃ vutto aṭṭhadhammasamodhānasampādito “tiṇṇo tāreyyaṃ mutto moceyyaṃ danto dameyyaṃ santo sameyyaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1915_1: assattho assāseyyaṃ parinibbuto parinibbāpeyyaṃ suddho sodheyyaṃ buddho bodheyya”ntiādinayappavatto abhinīhāro.
atk-s0512a0:1915_3: Tappavattiyā hi uddhaṃ pāramīnaṃ pavicayupaṭṭhānasamādānādhiṭṭhānanipphattiyo mahāpurisānaṃ sambhavanti.
atk-s0512a0:1916_1: Manussattabhāveyeva hi ṭhatvā buddhattaṃ patthentassa patthanā samijjhati,
atk-s0512a0:1917_0: Liṅgasampattīti manussattabhāve ṭhitassāpi purisasseva patthanā samijjhati,
atk-s0512a0:1917_1: na itthiyā na paṇḍakanapuṃsakaubhatobyañjanakānaṃ vā samijjhati.
atk-s0512a0:1917_8: yaṃ itthī arahaṃ assa sammāsambuddho”ti vitthāro.
atk-s0512a0:1917_9: Tasmā manussajātikassāpi itthiliṅge ṭhitassa paṇḍakādīnaṃ vā patthanā na samijjhati.
atk-s0512a0:1918_1: Manussapurisassāpi hi upanissayasampannasseva hetusampattiyā patthanā samijjhati,
atk-s0512a0:1919_1: Dharamānakabuddhasseva hi santike patthentassa patthanā samijjhati,
atk-s0512a0:1919_2: parinibbute pana bhagavati cetiyassa santike vā bodhimūle vā paṭimāya vā paccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ vā santike patthanā na samijjhati. Kasmā?
atk-s0512a0:1919_4: Buddhānaṃ eva pana santike patthanā samijjhati,
atk-s0512a0:1920_0: Pabbajjāti buddhassa bhagavato santike patthentassāpi kammakiriyavādīsu tāpasesu vā bhikkhūsu vā pabbajitasseva patthanā samijjhati,
atk-s0512a0:1920_3: Pabbajitā eva hi mahābodhisattā sammāsambodhiṃ adhigacchanti,
atk-s0512a0:1920_5: tasmā paṇidhānakāle ca pabbajjāliṅgaṃ eva hi yuttarūpaṃ kiñca guṇasampattiadhiṭṭhānabhāvato.
atk-s0512a0:1921_1: Pabbajitassāpi hi aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino pañcābhiññasseva patthanā samijjhati,
atk-s0512a0:1921_4: upanissayasampattiyā abhiññāsampattiyā ca samannāgatattā mahāpurisā katābhinīhārā sayameva pāramī pavicetuṃ samatthā honti.
atk-s0512a0:1922_1: Yathāvuttaguṇasampannopi hi yo attano jīvitampi buddhānaṃ pariccajitvā tasmiṃ kāle adhikaṃ upakāraṃ karoti,
atk-s0512a0:1923_1: Yassa hi yathāvuttadhammasamannāgatassa buddhakārakadhammānaṃ atthāya mahanto chando mahatī patthanā mahatī kattukāmatā atthi,
atk-s0512a0:1924_1: yo sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ ekodakībhūtaṃ attano bāhubaleneva uttaritvā pāraṃ gantuṃ samattho,
atk-s0512a0:1924_2: so buddhattaṃ pāpuṇātīti sutvā taṃ dukkarato adahanto “ahaṃ taṃ uttaritvā pāraṃ gamissāmī”ti chandajāto hoti,
atk-s0512a0:1924_4: Tathā yo sakalacakkavāḷaṃ vītaccikānaṃ vigatadhūmānaṃ aṅgārānaṃ pūraṃ pādehi akkamanto atikkamitvā parabhāgaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho…pe…
atk-s0512a0:1924_6: Tathā yo sakalacakkavāḷaṃ sattisūlehi sunisitaphalehi nirantaraṃ ākiṇṇaṃ pādehi akkamanto atikkamitvā…pe…
atk-s0512a0:1924_8: Tathā yo sakalacakkavāḷaṃ nirantaraṃ ghanaveḷugumbasañchannaṃ kaṇṭakalatāvanagahanaṃ vinivijjhitvā parabhāgaṃ gantuṃ samattho…pe…
atk-s0512a0:1924_10: Tathā yo “cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni satasahassañca kappe niraye paccitvā buddhattaṃ pattabba”nti sutvā taṃ
atk-s0512a0:1924_11: dukkarato adahanto “ahaṃ tattha paccitvā buddhattaṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti chandajāto hoti,
atk-s0512a0:1924_12: na tattha saṅkocaṃ āpajjatīti evamādinā nayena ettha chandassa mahantabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0512a0:1925_0: Evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato panāyaṃ abhinīhāro atthato tesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ aṅgānaṃ samodhānena tathāpavatto cittuppādoti veditabbo.
atk-s0512a0:1925_7: Acinteyyaṃ buddhabhūmiṃ aparimāṇaṃ sattalokahitañca ārabbha pavattiyā sabbabuddhakārakadhammamūlabhūto
atk-s0512a0:1926_0: Yassa ca uppattiyā saheva mahāpuriso mahābodhiyānapaṭipattiṃ otiṇṇo nāma hoti niyatabhāvasamadhigamanato
atk-s0512a0:1926_2: sabbabhāvena sammāsambodhiyaṃ samāsattamānasatā bodhisambhārasikkhāsamatthatā cassa santiṭṭhati.
atk-s0512a0:1926_3: Yathāvuttābhinīhārasamijjhanena hi mahāpurisā sabbaññutaññāṇādhigamanapubbaliṅgena sayambhuñāṇena sammadeva
atk-s0512a0:1926_5: Tathā katamahābhinīhāro hi sumedhapaṇḍito paṭipajji. Yathāha –
atk-s0512a0:1928_0: Uddhaṃ adho dasa disā, yāvatā dhammadhātuyā;
atk-s0512a0:1930_0: Vitthāro. Tassa ca abhinīhārassa cattāro paccayā cattāro hetū cattāri ca balāni veditabbāni.
atk-s0512a0:1931_1: Idha mahāpuriso passati tathāgataṃ mahatā buddhānubhāvena acchariyabbhutaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ karontaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1931_2: Tassa taṃ nissāya taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā mahābodhiyaṃ cittaṃ santiṭṭhati –
atk-s0512a0:1931_4: yassā suppaṭividdhattā bhagavā evaṃ acchariyabbhutadhammo acinteyyānubhāvo cā”ti.
atk-s0512a0:1931_5: So tameva mahānubhāvadassanaṃ nissāya taṃ paccayaṃ katvā sambodhiyaṃ adhimuccanto tattha cittaṃ ṭhapeti.
atk-s0512a0:1932_0: Na heva kho passati tathāgatassa yathāvuttaṃ mahānubhāvataṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1932_1: api ca kho suṇāti “ediso ca ediso ca bhagavā”ti.
atk-s0512a0:1932_2: So taṃ nissāya taṃ paccayaṃ katvā sambodhiyaṃ adhimuccanto tattha cittaṃ ṭhapeti.
atk-s0512a0:1933_0: Na heva kho passati tathāgatassa yathāvuttaṃ mahānubhāvataṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1933_2: api ca kho tathāgatassa dhammaṃ desentassa “dasabalasamannāgato,
atk-s0512a0:1933_5: So taṃ nissāya taṃ paccayaṃ katvā sambodhiyaṃ adhimuccanto tattha cittaṃ ṭhapeti.
atk-s0512a0:1934_0: Na heva kho passati tathāgatassa yathāvuttaṃ mahānubhāvataṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1934_3: api ca kho uḷārajjhāsayo kalyāṇādhimuttiko “ahametaṃ buddhavaṃsaṃ buddhatantiṃ buddhapaveṇiṃ buddhadhammataṃ
atk-s0512a0:1934_4: paripālessāmī”ti yāvadeva dhammaṃ eva sakkaronto garukaronto mānento pūjento dhammaṃ apacāyamāno taṃ
atk-s0512a0:1934_5: nissāya taṃ paccayaṃ katvā sambodhiyaṃ adhimuccanto tattha cittaṃ ṭhapeti.
atk-s0512a0:1935_1: Idha mahāpuriso pakatiyā upanissayasampannova hoti purimakesu buddhesu katādhikāro.
atk-s0512a0:1935_3: Puna caparaṃ mahāpuriso pakatiyā karuṇājjhāsayo hoti karuṇādhimutto sattānaṃ dukkhaṃ apanetukāmo api ca attano kāyajīvitaṃ pariccajitvā.
atk-s0512a0:1935_5: Puna caparaṃ mahāpuriso sakalatopi vaṭṭadukkhato sattahitāya ca dukkaracariyato sucirampi kālaṃ ghaṭento
atk-s0512a0:1935_6: vāyamanto anibbinno hoti anutrāsī yāva icchitatthanipphatti.
atk-s0512a0:1936_1: ekantenevassa yathā ajjhāsayo sambodhininno hoti sambodhipoṇo sambodhipabbhāro,
atk-s0512a0:1936_3: Yato cānena purimabuddhānaṃ santike sambodhiyā paṇidhānaṃ kataṃ hoti manasā vācāya ca “ahampi ediso sammāsambuddho
atk-s0512a0:1936_5: Evaṃ sampannūpanissayassa panassa imāni upanissayasampattiyā liṅgāni bhavanti yehi samannāgatassa sāvakabodhisattehi
atk-s0512a0:1936_6: ca paccekabodhisattehi ca mahāviseso mahantaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ paññāyati indriyato paṭipattito kosallato ca.
atk-s0512a0:1936_7: Idha upanissayasampanno mahāpuriso yathā visadindriyo hoti visadañāṇo,
atk-s0512a0:1936_11: Tathā hi so yathā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ paṭipajjati,
atk-s0512a0:1936_13: Tattha ca kosallaṃ āvahati ṭhānuppattikapaṭibhānena ṭhānāṭhānakusalatāya ca.
atk-s0512a0:1937_0: Tathā mahāpuriso pakatiyā dānajjhāsayo hoti dānābhirato,
atk-s0512a0:1937_6: mahantampi dānaṃ datvā na ca dānena santuṭṭho hoti,
atk-s0512a0:1937_8: paresañca ussāhaṃ janento dāne vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati,
atk-s0512a0:1937_10: aññe ca paresaṃ dente disvā attamano hoti,
atk-s0512a0:1937_11: bhayaṭṭhānesu ca paresaṃ abhayaṃ detīti evamādīni dānajjhāsayassa mahāpurisassa dānapāramiyā liṅgāni.
atk-s0512a0:1938_1: sattānaṃ aviheṭhanajātiko hoti sorato sukhasīlo asaṭho amāyāvī ujujātiko suvaco sovacassakaraṇīyehi dhammehi
atk-s0512a0:1938_4: attano hatthe nikkhittaṃ iṇaṃ vā gahetvā paraṃ na visaṃvādeti,
atk-s0512a0:1938_5: parasmiṃ vā attano santake byāmūḷhe vissarite vā taṃ saññāpetvā paṭipādeti yathā taṃ na parahatthagataṃ hoti,
atk-s0512a0:1938_9: saccavādī saccasandho bhinnānaṃ sandhātā sahitānaṃ anuppadātā,
atk-s0512a0:1938_10: piyavādī mihitapubbaṅgamo pubbabhāsī atthavādī dhammavādī anabhijjhālu abyāpannacitto aviparītadassano,
atk-s0512a0:1938_11: kammassakatañāṇena saccānulomikañāṇena kataññū katavedī vuddhāpacāyī suvisuddhājīvo dhammakāmo parepi
atk-s0512a0:1938_12: dhamme samādapetā sabbena sabbaṃ akiccato satte nivāretā kiccesu patiṭṭhapetā attanā ca tattha kicce
atk-s0512a0:1938_14: katvā vā pana sayaṃ akattabbaṃ sīghaññeva tato paṭivirato hotīti evamādīni sīlajjhāsayassa mahāpurisassa sīlapāramiyā liṅgāni.
atk-s0512a0:1939_2: na tassa pāpakā vitakkā cittaṃ anvāssavanti,
atk-s0512a0:1939_6: satimā ca hoti cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi saritā anussaritā,
atk-s0512a0:1939_8: nipako ca hoti tāsu tāsu itikattabbatāsu,
atk-s0512a0:1939_12: ajjhupekkhako ca hoti upekkhāṭhānīyesu dhammesūti evamādīni mahāpurisassa nekkhammajjhāsayādīnaṃ vasena nekkhammapāramiādīnaṃ liṅgāni veditabbāni.
atk-s0512a0:1940_0: Evametehi bodhisambhāraliṅgehi samannāgatassa mahāpurisassa yaṃ vuttaṃ “mahābhinīhārāya kalyāṇamittasannissayo hetū”ti.
atk-s0512a0:1940_2: idha kalyāṇamitto saddhāsampanno hoti sīlasampanno sutasampanno cāgasampanno vīriyasampanno satisampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno.
atk-s0512a0:1940_3: Tattha saddhāsampattiyā saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṃ kammaphalañca,
atk-s0512a0:1940_4: tena sammāsambodhiyā hetubhūtaṃ sattesu hitesitaṃ na pariccajati,
atk-s0512a0:1940_5: sīlasampattiyā sattānaṃ piyo hoti manāpo garu bhāvanīyo codako pāpagarahī vattā vacanakkhamo,
atk-s0512a0:1940_6: sutasampattiyā sattānaṃ hitasukhāvahaṃ gambhīraṃ dhammakathaṃ kattā hoti,
atk-s0512a0:1940_7: cāgasampattiyā appiccho hoti santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho,
atk-s0512a0:1940_12: so satiyā kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesamāno paññāya sattānaṃ hitāhitaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānitvā
atk-s0512a0:1940_13: samādhinā tattha ekaggacitto hutvā vīriyena ahitā satte nisedhetvā hite niyojeti. Tenāha –
atk-s0512a0:1942_0: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako”ti. –
atk-s0512a0:1943_0: Evaṃ guṇasamannāgatañca kalyāṇamittaṃ upanissāya mahāpuriso attano upanissayasampattiṃ sammadeva pariyodapeti.
atk-s0512a0:1943_1: Suvisuddhāsayapayogo ca hutvā catūhi balehi samannāgato na cireneva aṭṭhaṅge samodhānetvā mahābhinīhāraṃ
atk-s0512a0:1943_2: karonto bodhisattabhāve patiṭṭhahati anivattidhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano.
atk-s0512a0:1944_1: Ajjhattikabalaṃ yā sammāsambodhiyaṃ attasannissayā dhammagāravena abhiruci ekantaninnajjhāsayatā,
atk-s0512a0:1944_2: yāya mahāpuriso attādhipati lajjāpassayo abhinīhārasampanno ca hutvā pāramiyo pūretvā sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0512a0:1944_3: Bāhirabalaṃ yā sammāsambodhiyaṃ parasannissayā abhiruci ekantaninnajjhāsayatā,
atk-s0512a0:1944_4: yāya mahāpuriso lokādhipati mānāpassayo abhinīhārasampanno ca hutvā pāramiyo pūretvā sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0512a0:1944_5: Upanissayabalaṃ yā sammāsambodhiyaṃ upanissayasampattiyā abhiruci ekantaninnajjhāsayatā,
atk-s0512a0:1944_6: yāya mahāpuriso tikkhindriyo visadadhātuko satisannissayo abhinīhārasampanno ca hutvā pāramiyo pūretvā sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0512a0:1944_7: Payogabalaṃ yā sammāsambodhiyaṃ tajjā payogasampadā sakkaccakāritā sātaccakāritā,
atk-s0512a0:1944_8: yāya mahāpuriso visuddhapayogo nirantarakārī abhinīhārasampanno ca hutvā pāramiyo pūretvā sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0512a0:1945_0: Evamayaṃ catūhi paccayehi catūhi hetūhi catūhi ca balehi sampannasamudāgamo aṭṭhaṅgasamodhānasampādito abhinīhāro pāramīnaṃ paccayo mūlakāraṇabhāvato.
atk-s0512a0:1945_1: Yassa ca pavattiyā mahāpurise cattāro acchariyā abbhutā dhammā patiṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0512a0:1945_2: sabbasattanikāyaṃ attano orasaputtaṃ viya piyacittena pariggaṇhāti.
atk-s0512a0:1945_4: Sattānaṃ hitasukhāvaho cassa ajjhāsayo payogo ca hoti.
atk-s0512a0:1945_5: Attano ca buddhakārakadhammā uparūpari vaḍḍhanti paripaccanti ca.
atk-s0512a0:1945_6: Yato ca mahāpuriso uḷāratamena puññābhisandena kusalābhisandena pavattiyā paccayena sukhassāhārena samannāgato
atk-s0512a0:1945_7: sattānaṃ dakkhiṇeyyo uttamagāravaṭṭhānaṃ asadisaṃ puññakkhettañca hoti.
atk-s0512a0:1945_8: Evamanekaguṇo anekānisaṃso mahābhinīhāro pāramīnaṃ paccayoti veditabbo.
atk-s0512a0:1946_2: Tattha upāyakosallaṃ nāma dānādīnaṃ bodhisambhārabhāvassa nimittabhūtā paññā,
atk-s0512a0:1946_3: yāhi mahākaruṇūpāyakosallatāhi mahāpurisānaṃ attasukhanirapekkhatā nirantaraṃ parahitakaraṇapasutatā
atk-s0512a0:1946_19: karuṇānugatattā na ca na sabbesaṃ anuggahāya pavatto,
atk-s0512a0:1946_21: paññānugatattā na ca na sabbattha virattacitto,
atk-s0512a0:1946_32: balavesārajjanipphattīti sabbassāpi pāramitāphalassa visesena upāyabhāvato paññākaruṇā pāramīnaṃ paccayo.
atk-s0512a0:1946_33: Idañca dvayaṃ pāramīnaṃ viya paṇidhānassāpi paccayo.
atk-s0512a0:1947_0: Tathā ussāhaummaṅgaavatthānahitacariyā ca pāramīnaṃ paccayāti veditabbā,
atk-s0512a0:1948_1: Nekkhammajjhāsayā hi bodhisattā honti kāmesu gharāvāse ca dosadassāvino,
atk-s0512a0:1948_7: Tasmā ete bodhisattānaṃ cha ajjhāsayā dānādīnaṃ pāramīnaṃ paccayāti veditabbā.
atk-s0512a0:1948_8: Na hi lobhādīsu ādīnavadassanena alobhādīnaṃ adhikabhāvena ca vinā dānādipāramiyo sambhavanti,
atk-s0512a0:1949_0: Yathā cete evaṃ dānajjhāsayatādayopi bodhiyā carantānaṃ bodhisattānaṃ dānādipāramīnaṃ paccayo.
atk-s0512a0:1949_1: Dānajjhāsayatāya hi bodhisattā tappaṭipakkhe macchere dosadassāvino hutvā sammadeva dānapāramiṃ paripūrenti.
atk-s0512a0:1949_2: Sīlajjhāsayatāya dussīlye dosadassāvino hutvā sammadeva sīlapāramiṃ paripūrenti.
atk-s0512a0:1949_10: upekkhājjhāsayatāya lokadhammesu ādīnavadassāvino hutvā sammadeva nekkhammādipāramiyo paripūrenti.
atk-s0512a0:1950_0: Tathā apariccāgapariccāgādīsu yathākkamaṃ ādīnavānisaṃsapaccavekkhaṇā dānādipāramīnaṃ paccayo.
atk-s0512a0:1950_2: sattānaṃ khettādīnaṃ vatthukāmabhāvena bahupatthanīyabhāvato rājacorādisādhāraṇabhāvato vivādādhiṭṭhānato
atk-s0512a0:1950_3: sapattakaraṇato nissārato paṭilābhaparipālanesu paraviheṭhanahetuto vināsanimittañca sokādianekavihitabyasanāvahato
atk-s0512a0:1950_6: Tesaṃ pariccāgoyeva eko sotthibhāvoti pariccāge appamādo karaṇīyo.
atk-s0512a0:1951_0: Api ca yācako yācamāno attano guyhassa ācikkhanato “mayhaṃ vissāsiko”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1951_1: “pahāya gamanīyamattano santakaṃ gahetvā paralokaṃ yāhīti mayhaṃ upadesako”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1951_2: “āditte viya agāre maraṇagginā āditte loke tato mayhaṃ santakassa apavāhakasahāyo”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1951_3: “apavāhitassa cassa ajhāpananikkhepaṭṭhānabhūto”ti ca dānasaṅkhāte kalyāṇakammasmiṃ sahāyabhāvato sabbasampattīnaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1951_4: aggabhūtāya paramadullabhāya buddhabhūmiyā sampattihetubhāvato ca “paramo kalyāṇamitto”ti ca paccavekkhitabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1952_1: tasmā sā sambhāvanā avitathā kātabbā”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1952_4: “uḷārajjhāsayehi gavesitvāpi dātabbato sayamevāgato mama puññenā”ti ca “yācakassa dānāpadesena mayhamevāyamanuggaho”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1952_5: “ahaṃ viya ayaṃ sabbopi loko mayā anuggahetabbo”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1952_6: “asati yācake kathaṃ mayhaṃ dānapāramī pūreyyā”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1952_8: “maṃ ayācitvāva mama santakaṃ yācakā kadā sayameva gaṇheyyu”nti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1952_10: “kathaṃ vā te mayhaṃ piyā cassu manāpā”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1952_11: “kathaṃ vāhaṃ dadamāno datvāpi ca attamano cassaṃ pamudito pītisomanassajāto”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1952_12: “kathaṃ vā me yācakā bhaveyyuṃ uḷāro ca dānajjhāsayo”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1952_13: “kathaṃ vāhamayācito eva yācakānaṃ hadayamaññāya dadeyya”nti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1952_14: “sati dhane yācake ca apariccāgo mahatī mayhaṃ vañcanā”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1952_15: “kathaṃ vāhaṃ attano aṅgāni jīvitaṃ vāpi yācakānaṃ pariccajeyya”nti ca pariccāganinnatā upaṭṭhapetabbā.
atk-s0512a0:1952_17: yathā taṃ nirapekkhaṃ khepakaṃ kiṭako”ti ca atthe nirapekkhatāya cittaṃ uppādetabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1953_3: “ayaṃ maṃ yācamāno addhā iminā pariccāgena mitto hotī”ti somanassaṃ uppādetabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1953_7: ayaṃ maṃ yācamāno addhā iminā pariccāgena verī piyo mitto hotī”ti visesena somanassaṃ uppādetabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1953_8: Evaṃ piyapuggale viya majjhattaveripuggalesupi mettāpubbaṅgamaṃ karuṇaṃ upaṭṭhapetvāva dātabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1954_0: Sace panassa cirakālaparibhāvitattā lobhassa deyyadhammavisayā lobhadhammā uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1954_1: tena bodhisattapaṭiññena iti paṭisañcikkhitabbaṃ “nanu tayā sappurisasambodhāya abhinīhāraṃ karontena
atk-s0512a0:1954_2: sabbasattānaṃ upakāratthāya ayaṃ kāyo nissaṭṭho tappariccāgamayañca puññaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1954_3: tattha nāma te bāhirepi vatthusmiṃ abhisaṅgappavatti hatthisinānasadisī hoti,
atk-s0512a0:1954_4: tasmā tayā na katthaci saṅgo uppādetabbo.
atk-s0512a0:1954_5: Seyyathāpi nāma mahato bhesajjarukkhassa tiṭṭhato mūlaṃ mūlatthikā haranti,
atk-s0512a0:1954_6: papaṭikaṃ tacaṃ khandhaṃ viṭapaṃ sāraṃ sākhaṃ palāsaṃ pupphaṃ phalaṃ phalatthikā haranti,
atk-s0512a0:1954_7: na tassa rukkhassa ‘mayhaṃ santakaṃ ete harantī’ti vitakkasamudācāro hoti,
atk-s0512a0:1954_8: evameva sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpajjantena mayā mahādukkhe akataññuke niccāsucimhi kāye paresaṃ upakārāya
atk-s0512a0:1954_10: Ko vā ettha viseso ajjhattikabāhiresu mahābhūtesu ekantabhedanavikiraṇaviddhaṃsanadhammesu,
atk-s0512a0:1954_12: yadidaṃ etaṃ mama esohamasmi eso me attāti abhiniveso.
atk-s0512a0:1954_13: Tasmā bāhiresu viya ajjhattikesupi karacaraṇanayanādīsu maṃsādīsu ca anapekkhena hutvā ‘taṃ tadatthikā harantū’ti nissaṭṭhacittena bhavitabba”nti.
atk-s0512a0:1955_0: Evaṃ paṭisañcikkhato cassa sambodhāya pahitattassa kāyajīvitesu nirapekkhassa appakasireneva kāyavacīmanokammāni suvisuddhāni honti.
atk-s0512a0:1955_1: So suvisuddhakāyavacīmanokammanto visuddhājīvo ñāyapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhito apāyupāyakosallasamannāgamena bhiyyosomattāya
atk-s0512a0:1955_2: deyyadhammapariccāgena abhayadānasaddhammadānehi ca sabbasatte anuggaṇhituṃ samattho hotīti ayaṃ tāva
atk-s0512a0:1956_1: idañhi sīlaṃ nāma gaṅgodakādīhi visodhetuṃ asakkuṇeyyassa dosamalassa vikkhālanajalaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1956_5: khattiyamahāsālādīhi devatāhi ca vandanīyādibhāvāvahanato paramo vasīkaraṇamanto,
atk-s0512a0:1956_11: tassa tassa samijjhanūpāyabhāvato cintāmaṇikapparukkhādike ca atiseti.
atk-s0512a0:1957_6: bhikkhu ‘sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo ca assaṃ manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā’ti,
atk-s0512a0:1957_11: ānisaṃsā sīlavato sīlasampadāyā”tiādisuttānañca vasena sīlassa guṇā paccavekkhitabbā.
atk-s0512a0:1957_15: Sīlavato hi attano sīlasampadāhetu mahantaṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppajjati –
atk-s0512a0:1958_4: Tathā sīlavato yvāyaṃ “kataṃ vata mayā pāpaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1958_8: Sīlañca nāmetaṃ appamādādhiṭṭhānato bhogabyasanādiparihāramukhena mahato atthassa sādhanato maṅgalabhāvato ca paramaṃ sotthiṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1958_9: nihīnajaccopi sīlavā khattiyamahāsālādīnaṃ pūjanīyo hotīti kulasampattiṃ atiseti sīlasampadā,
atk-s0512a0:1958_11: Idha te assa dāso kammakaro”tiādivacanañcettha sādhakaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1958_12: Corādīhi asādhāraṇato paralokānugamanato mahapphalabhāvato samathādiguṇādhiṭṭhānato ca bāhiradhanaṃ atiseti sīlaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1958_13: Paramassa cittissariyassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato khattiyādīnaṃ issariyaṃ atiseti sīlaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1958_15: vassasatadīghappamāṇato jīvitato ekāhampi sīlavato jīvitassa visiṭṭhatāvacanato sati ca jīvite sikkhānikkhipanassa
atk-s0512a0:1958_17: Verīnampi manuññabhāvāvahanato jarārogavipattīhi anabhibhavanīyato ca rūpasampattiṃ atiseti sīlaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1958_18: Pāsādahammiyādiṭṭhānavisese rājayuvarājasenāpatiādiṭṭhānavisese ca atiseti sīlaṃ sukhavisesādhiṭṭhānabhāvato.
atk-s0512a0:1958_19: Sabhāvasiniddhe santikāvacarepi bandhujane mittajane ca atiseti ekantahitasampādanato paralokānugamanato
atk-s0512a0:1958_21: Tathā hatthiassarathapattibalakāyehi mantāgadasotthānappayogehi ca durārakkhaṃ attānaṃ ārakkhābhāvena
atk-s0512a0:1958_22: sīlameva visiṭṭhataraṃ attādhīnato aparādhīnato mahāvisayato ca.
atk-s0512a0:1958_25: Evamanekaguṇasamannāgataṃ sīlanti paccavekkhantassa aparipuṇṇā ceva sīlasampadā pāripūriṃ gacchati aparisuddhā ca pārisuddhiṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1959_0: Sace panassa dīgharattaṃ paricayena sīlapaṭipakkhā dhammā dosādayo antarantarā uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1959_3: sīlavikalena ca na sakkā lokiyāpi sampattiyo pāpuṇituṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1959_5: sabbasampattīnaṃ pana aggabhūtāya sammāsambodhiyā adhiṭṭhānabhūtena sīlena paramukkaṃsagatena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1959_6: tasmā “kikīva aṇḍa”ntiādinā vuttanayena sammā sīlaṃ rakkhantena suṭṭhutaraṃ tayā pesalena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1960_0: Api ca tayā dhammadesanāya yānattaye sattānaṃ avatāraṇaparipācanāni kātabbāni,
atk-s0512a0:1960_1: sīlavikalassa ca vacanaṃ na paccetabbaṃ hoti,
atk-s0512a0:1960_3: tasmā kathāhaṃ saddheyyo hutvā sattānaṃ avatāraṇaparipācanāni kareyyanti sabhāvaparisuddhasīlena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1960_4: Kiñca jhānādiguṇavisesayogena me sattānaṃ upakārakaraṇasamatthatā paññāpāramiādiparipūraṇañca,
atk-s0512a0:1960_5: jhānādayo ca guṇā sīlapārisuddhiṃ vinā na sambhavantīti sammadeva sīlaṃ parisodhetabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1961_2: “seyyathāpi puriso iṇaṃ ādāya kammante payojeyyā”tiādinā kāmacchandādīsu ādīnavadassanapubbaṅgamā vuttavipariyāyena
atk-s0512a0:1961_3: “abbhokāso pabbajjā”tiādinā pabbajjādīsu ānisaṃsapaṭisaṅkhāvasena nekkhammapāramiyaṃ paccavekkhaṇā veditabbā.
atk-s0512a0:1962_0: Tathā “paññāya vinā dānādayo dhammā na visujjhanti,
atk-s0512a0:1962_1: yathāsakaṃ byāpārasamatthā ca na hontī”ti paññāguṇā manasikātabbā.
atk-s0512a0:1962_2: Yatheva hi jīvitena vinā sarīrayantaṃ na sobhati,
atk-s0512a0:1962_3: na ca attano kiriyāsu paṭipattisamatthaṃ hoti,
atk-s0512a0:1962_4: yathā ca cakkhādīni indriyāni viññāṇena vinā yathāsakaṃ visayesu kiccaṃ kātuṃ nappahonti,
atk-s0512a0:1962_5: evaṃ saddhādīni indriyāni paññāya vinā sakiccapaṭipattiyaṃ asamatthānīti pariccāgādipaṭipattiyaṃ paññā padhānakāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1962_6: Ummīlitapaññācakkhukā hi mahābodhisattā attano aṅgapaccaṅgānipi datvā anattukkaṃsakā aparavambhakā ca honti,
atk-s0512a0:1962_8: Paññāvasena hi upāyakosallayogato pariccāgo parahitappavattiyā dānapāramibhāvaṃ upeti.
atk-s0512a0:1963_0: Tathā paññāya abhāvena taṇhādisaṃkilesāviyogato sīlassa visuddhi eva na sambhavati,
atk-s0512a0:1963_2: Paññavā eva ca gharāvāse kāmaguṇesu saṃsāre ca ādīnavaṃ pabbajjāya jhānasamāpattiyaṃ nibbāne ca ānisaṃsaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1963_3: suṭṭhu sallakkhento pabbajitvā jhānasamāpattiyo nibbattetvā nibbānābhimukho pare ca tattha patiṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0512a0:1963_4: Vīriyañca paññāvirahitaṃ yathicchitamatthaṃ na sādheti durārambhabhāvato.
atk-s0512a0:1963_6: paññāsahitena pana vīriyena na kiñci duradhigamaṃ upāyapaṭipattito.
atk-s0512a0:1963_7: Tathā paññavā eva parāpakārādīnaṃ adhivāsakajātiko hoti,
atk-s0512a0:1963_9: Paññāvirahitassa ca parehi upanītā apakārā khantiyā paṭipakkhameva anubrūhenti,
atk-s0512a0:1963_10: paññavato pana te khantisampattiyā paribrūhanavasena assā thirabhāvāya saṃvattanti.
atk-s0512a0:1963_11: Paññavā eva tīṇipi saccāni nesaṃ kāraṇāni paṭipakkhe ca yathābhūtaṃ jānitvā paresaṃ avisaṃvādako hoti.
atk-s0512a0:1964_0: Tathā paññābalena attānaṃ upatthambhetvā dhitisampadāya sabbapāramīsu acalasamādānādhiṭṭhāno hoti.
atk-s0512a0:1964_1: Paññavā eva ca piyamajjhattaverivibhāgaṃ akatvā sabbattha hitūpasaṃhārakusalo hoti.
atk-s0512a0:1964_2: Tathā paññāvasena lābhālābhādilokadhammasannipāte nibbikāratāya majjhatto hoti.
atk-s0512a0:1964_3: Evaṃ sabbāsaṃ pāramīnaṃ paññāva pārisuddhihetūti paññāguṇā paccavekkhitabbā.
atk-s0512a0:1964_4: Api ca paññāya vinā na dassanasampatti,
atk-s0512a0:1964_7: asamāhitena ca na sakkā attahitamattampi sādhetuṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1964_8: pageva ukkaṃsagataṃ parahitanti parahitāya paṭipannena “nanu tayā sakkaccaṃ paññāya parivuddhiyaṃ āyogo karaṇīyo”ti bodhisattena attā ovaditabbo.
atk-s0512a0:1964_9: Paññānubhāvena hi mahāsatto caturadhiṭṭhānādhiṭṭhito catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi lokaṃ anuggaṇhanto satte niyyānamagge avatāreti,
atk-s0512a0:1965_0: Tathā paññābalena khandhāyatanādīsu pavicayabahulopavattinivattiyo yāthāvato parijānanto dānādayo guṇe
atk-s0512a0:1965_1: visesanibbedhabhāgiyabhāvaṃ nayanto bodhisattasikkhāya paripūrakārī hotīti evamādinā anekākāravokāre
atk-s0512a0:1966_0: Tathā dissamānānipi lokiyāni kammāni nihīnavīriyena pāpuṇituṃ asakkuṇeyyāni,
atk-s0512a0:1966_1: agaṇitakhedena pana āraddhavīriyena duradhigamaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0512a0:1966_2: Nihīnavīriyo hi “saṃsāramahoghato sabbasatte santāressāmī”ti ārabhitumeva na sakkuṇāti.
atk-s0512a0:1966_4: Ukkaṭṭhavīriyo pana attasukhanirapekkho ārambhapāramimadhigacchatīti vīriyasampatti paccavekkhitabbā.
atk-s0512a0:1966_5: Api ca “yassa attano eva saṃsārapaṅkato samuddharaṇatthamārambho,
atk-s0512a0:1966_6: tassāpi na vīriyassa sithilabhāve manorathānaṃ matthakappatti sakkā sambhāvetuṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1966_7: pageva sadevakassa lokassa samuddharaṇatthaṃ katābhinīhārenā”ti ca “rāgādīnaṃ dosagaṇānaṃ mattamahāgajānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1966_8: viya dunnivārabhāvato tannidānānañca kammasamādānānaṃ ukkhittāsikavadhakasadisabhāvato tannimittānañca
atk-s0512a0:1966_10: tattha niyojakānañca pāpamittānaṃ sadā sannihitabhāvato tadovādakāritāya ca bālassa puthujjanabhāvassa
atk-s0512a0:1966_11: satisambhave yuttaṃ sayameva saṃsāradukkhato nissaritunti micchāvitakkā vīriyānubhāvena dūrībhavantī”ti
atk-s0512a0:1966_12: ca “yadi pana sambodhi attādhīnena vīriyena sakkā samadhigantuṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1966_13: kimettha dukkara”nti ca evamādinā nayena vīriyaguṇā paccavekkhitabbā.
atk-s0512a0:1967_0: Tathā khanti nāmāyaṃ niravasesaguṇapaṭipakkhassa kodhassa vidhamanato guṇasampādane sādhūnamappaṭihatamāyudhaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1968_0: Api ca “ete sattā khantisampattiyā abhāvato idhaloke tappanti,
atk-s0512a0:1968_1: paraloke ca tapanīyadhammānuyogato”ti ca “yadipi parāpakāranimittaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0512a0:1968_2: tassa pana dukkhassa khettabhūto attabhāvo bījabhūtañca kammaṃ mayāva abhisaṅkhata”nti ca “tassa ca dukkhassa
atk-s0512a0:1968_3: āṇaṇyakāraṇameta”nti ca “apakārake asati kathaṃ mayhaṃ khantisampadā sambhavatī”ti ca “yadipāyaṃ etarahi
atk-s0512a0:1968_5: ayaṃ nāma pubbe anena mayhaṃ upakāro kato”ti ca “apakāro eva vā khantinimittatāya upakāro”ti ca “sabbepime sattā mayhaṃ puttasadisā,
atk-s0512a0:1968_6: puttakatāparādhesu ca ko kujjhissatī”ti ca “yena kodhapisācāvesena ayaṃ mayhaṃ aparajjhati,
atk-s0512a0:1968_12: sabbepi te tasmiṃ eva khaṇe niruddhā kassidāni kena kopo kātabbo”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1968_13: “anattatāya sabbadhammānaṃ ko kassa aparajjhatī”ti ca paccavekkhantena khantisampadā anubrūhetabbā.
atk-s0512a0:1969_0: Yadi panassa dīgharattaṃ paricayena parāpakāranimittako kodho cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭheyya,
atk-s0512a0:1969_2: “khanti nāmesā parāpakārassa paṭipakkhapaṭipattīnaṃ paccupakārakāraṇa”nti ca “apakāro ca mayhaṃ dukkhūpanisā
atk-s0512a0:1969_3: saddhāti dukkhuppādanena saddhāya sabbaloke anabhiratisaññāya ca paccayo”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1969_5: Tattha aniṭṭhavisayasamāyogo mayhaṃ na siyāti taṃ kutettha labbhā”ti ca “kodhavasiko satto kodhena ummatto vikkhittacitto,
atk-s0512a0:1969_6: tattha kiṃ paccapakārenā”ti ca “sabbepime sattā sammāsambuddhena orasaputtā viya paripālitā,
atk-s0512a0:1969_7: tasmā na tattha mayā cittakopo kātabbo”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1969_8: “aparādhake ca sati guṇe guṇavati mayā kopo na kātabbo”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1969_9: “asati guṇe visesena karuṇāyitabbo”ti ca “kopena ca mayhaṃ guṇayasā nihīyantī”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1969_11: “kodho ca nāmāyaṃ sabbāhitakārako sabbahitavināsako balavā paccatthiko”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1969_12: “sati ca khantiyā na koci paccatthiko”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1969_13: “aparādhakena aparādhanimittaṃ yaṃ āyatiṃ laddhabbaṃ dukkhaṃ sati ca khantiyā mayhaṃ tadabhāvo”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1969_14: “cintanena kujjhantena ca mayā paccatthikoyeva anuvattito hotī”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1969_15: “kodhe ca mayā khantiyā abhibhūte tassa dāsabhūto paccatthiko sammadeva abhibhūto hotī”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1969_17: “sati ca kodhe guṇavirodhapaccanīkadhamme kathaṃ me sīlādidhammā pāripūriṃ gaccheyyuṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1969_18: asati ca tesu kathāhaṃ sattānaṃ upakārabahulo paṭiññānurūpaṃ uttamaṃ sampattiṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1969_19: “khantiyā ca sati bahiddhā vikkhepābhāvato samāhitassa sabbe saṅkhārā aniccato dukkhato sabbe dhammā
atk-s0512a0:1969_20: anattato nibbānañca asaṅkhatāmatasantapaṇītatādibhāvato nijjhānaṃ khamanti buddhadhammā ca acinteyyāparimeyyappabhāvā”ti.
atk-s0512a0:1970_0: Tato ca anulomiyaṃ khantiyaṃ ṭhito kevalā ime attattaniyabhāvarahitā dhammamattā yathāsakaṃ paccayehi uppajjanti vayanti,
atk-s0512a0:1970_4: na cettha koci kassaci byāpāroti ahaṃkāramamaṃkārānadhiṭṭhānatā nijjhānaṃ khamati,
atk-s0512a0:1970_5: yena bodhisatto bodhiyā niyato anāvattidhammo hotīti evamādinā khantipāramiyā paccavekkhaṇā veditabbā.
atk-s0512a0:1971_0: Tathā saccena vinā sīlādīnaṃ asambhavato paṭiññānurūpaṃ paṭipattiyā abhāvato ca,
atk-s0512a0:1971_1: saccadhammātikkame ca sabbapāpadhammānaṃ samosaraṇato asaccasandhassa apaccayikabhāvato āyatiñca anādeyyavacanatāvahanato sampannasaccassa ca,
atk-s0512a0:1972_0: Tathā dānādīsu daḷhasamādānaṃ taṃpaṭipakkhasannipāte ca nesaṃ acalādhiṭṭhānaṃ tattha ca dhīravīrabhāvaṃ
atk-s0512a0:1972_1: vinā na dānādisambhārā sambodhinimittā sambhavantītiādinā adhiṭṭhāne guṇā paccavekkhitabbā.
atk-s0512a0:1973_0: Tathā “attahitamatte avatiṭṭhantenāpi sattesu hitacittataṃ vinā na sakkā idhalokaparalokasampattiyo pāpuṇituṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1973_2: “pacchā sabbasattānaṃ lokuttarasampattiṃ ākaṅkhantena idāni lokiyasampattiākaṅkhā yuttarūpā”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1973_3: “idāni āsayamattena paresaṃ hitasukhūpasaṃhāraṃ kātuṃ asakkonto kadā payogena taṃ sādhessāmī”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1973_4: “idāni mayā hitasukhūpasaṃhārena saṃvaḍḍhitā pacchā dhammasaṃvibhāgasahāyā mayhaṃ bhavissantī”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1973_6: tasmā sabbabuddhaguṇavibhūtinipphattikāraṇattā mayhaṃ ete paramaṃ puññakkhettaṃ anuttaraṃ kusalāyatanaṃ uttamaṃ gāravaṭṭhāna”nti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1973_9: Vimariyādīkatena hi cetasā sattesu hitasukhūpasaṃhāraniratassa tesaṃ ahitadukkhāpanayanakāmatā balavatī uppajjati daḷhamūlā.
atk-s0512a0:1973_10: Karuṇā ca sabbesaṃ buddhakārakadhammānaṃ ādi caraṇaṃ patiṭṭhā mūlaṃ mukhaṃ pamukhanti evamādinā mettāya guṇā paccavekkhitabbā.
atk-s0512a0:1974_0: Tathā “upekkhāya abhāve sattehi katā vippakārā cittassa vikāraṃ uppādeyyuṃ,
atk-s0512a0:1974_1: sati ca cittavikāre dānādīnaṃ sambhārānaṃ sambhavo eva natthī”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1974_2: “mettāsinehena sinehite citte upekkhāya vinā sambhārānaṃ pārisuddhi na hotī”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1974_3: “anupekkhako sambhāresu puññasambhāraṃ tabbipākañca sattahitatthaṃ pariṇāmetuṃ na sakkotī”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1974_4: “upekkhāya abhāve deyyadhammapaṭiggāhakānaṃ vibhāgaṃ akatvā pariccajituṃ na sakkotī”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1974_5: “upekkhārahitena jīvitaparikkhārānaṃ jīvitassa ca antarāyaṃ amanasikaritvā sīlavisodhanaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotī”ti ca,
atk-s0512a0:1974_6: tathā upekkhāvasena aratiratisahasseva nekkhammabalasiddhito upapattito ikkhaṇavasena sabbasambhārakiccanipphattito
atk-s0512a0:1974_7: accāraddhassa vīriyassa anupekkhaṇe padhānakiccākaraṇato upekkhato eva titikkhānijjhānasambhavato upekkhāvasena
atk-s0512a0:1974_8: sattasaṅkhārānaṃ avisaṃvādanato lokadhammānaṃ ajjhupekkhaṇena samādinnadhammesu acalādhiṭṭhānasiddhito
atk-s0512a0:1974_10: upekkhānubhāvena sampajjantīti evamādinā nayena upekkhāpāramī paccavekkhitabbā.
atk-s0512a0:1974_11: Evaṃ apariccāgapariccāgādīsu yathākkamaṃ ādīnavānisaṃsapaccavekkhaṇā dānādipāramīnaṃ paccayoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:1975_0: Tathā saparikkhārā pañcadasa caraṇadhammā pañca ca abhiññāyo.
