atk-s0512a0:2011_5: Tañca kho akusalato vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpanavasena,
atk-s0512a0:2011_13: na nīcataraṃ paṭipannassa attā uccatare ṭhapetabbo,
atk-s0512a0:2011_14: na ca paresu sabbena sabbaṃ asevinā bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:2012_1: Na ca paresaṃ purato piye vigarahati,
atk-s0512a0:2012_10: pamādāpanne satte abhiññābalena yathārahaṃ nirayādike dassento saṃvejetvā assaddhādike saddhādīsu patiṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0512a0:2012_13: Evamayaṃ mahāpurisassa cārittabhūto aparimāṇo puññābhisando kusalābhisando uparūpari abhivaḍḍhatīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:2013_0: Api ca yā sā “kiṃ sīlaṃ kenaṭṭhena sīla”ntiādinā pucchaṃ katvā “pāṇātipātādīhi viramantassa vattapaṭipattiṃ
atk-s0512a0:2013_1: vā pūrentassa cetanādayo dhammā sīla”ntiādinā nayena nānappakārato sīlassa vitthārakathā visuddhimagge vuttā,
atk-s0512a0:2013_4: idha mahābodhisattavasena karuṇūpāyakosallapubbaṅgamaṃ katvā vattabbāti ayameva viseso.
atk-s0512a0:2013_5: Yato idaṃ sīlaṃ mahāpuriso yathā na attano duggatiyaṃ parikkilesavimuttiyā sugatiyampi,
atk-s0512a0:2013_7: na cakkavatti, na deva, na sakka, na māra,
atk-s0512a0:2013_15: atha kho sabbaññubhāvena sabbasattānaṃ anuttarasīlālaṅkārasampādanatthameva pariṇāmetīti.
atk-s0512a0:2014_0: Tathā yasmā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā ādīnavadassanapubbaṅgamā kāmehi ca bhavehi ca nikkhamanavasena pavattā kusalacittuppatti nekkhammapāramī,
atk-s0512a0:2014_3: kāmānañca satthadhārālaggamadhubindu viya ca avaliyhamānā parittassādā vipulānatthānubandhāti ca,
atk-s0512a0:2014_20: appassādatāya aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamātiādinā ca nayena ādīnavaṃ sallakkhetvā tabbipariyāyena nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ
atk-s0512a0:2014_24: Pabbajjamanutiṭṭhantena ca mahāsattena asati buddhuppāde kammavādīnaṃ kiriyavādīnaṃ tāpasaparibbājakānaṃ pabbajjā anuṭṭhātabbā.
atk-s0512a0:2015_0: Uppannesu pana sammāsambuddhesu tesaṃ sāsane eva pabbajitabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:2015_1: Pabbajitvā ca yathāvutte sīle patiṭṭhitena tassā eva hi sīlapāramiyā vodāpanatthaṃ dhutaguṇā samādātabbā.
atk-s0512a0:2015_2: Samādinnadhutadhammā hi mahāpurisā sammadeva te pariharantā appicchāsantuṭṭhāsallekhapavivekaasaṃsaggavīriyārambhasubharatādi-
atk-s0512a0:2015_4: patiṭṭhitā catutthaṃ bhāvanārāmatāsaṅkhātaṃ ariyavaṃsaṃ adhigantuṃ cattārīsāya ārammaṇesu yathārahaṃ
atk-s0512a0:2015_6: Evaṃ hissa sammadeva nekkhammapāramī paripūritā hoti.
atk-s0512a0:2016_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne terasahi dhutadhammehi saddhiṃ dasa kasiṇāni,
atk-s0512a0:2016_6: ekaṃ vavatthānanti cattārīsāya samādhibhāvanāya kammaṭṭhānāni bhāvanāvidhānañca vitthārato vattabbāni.
atk-s0512a0:2016_7: Taṃ panetaṃ sabbaṃ yasmā visuddhimagge sabbākārato vitthāretvā vuttaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:2016_10: idha mahābodhisattassa vasena karuṇūpāyakosallapubbaṅgamaṃ katvā vattabbanti ayameva visesoti.
atk-s0512a0:2017_0: Tathā paññāpāramiṃ sampādetukāmena yasmā paññā āloko viya andhakārena mohena saha na vattati,
atk-s0512a0:2017_3: arati tandi vijambhitā ālasiyaṃ gaṇasaṅgaṇikārāmatā niddāsīlatā anicchayasīlatā ñāṇasmiṃ akutūhalatā
atk-s0512a0:2017_4: micchādhimāno aparipucchakatā kāyassa na sammāparihāro asamāhitacittatā duppaññānaṃ puggalānaṃ sevanā
atk-s0512a0:2017_5: paññavantānaṃ apayirupāsanā attaparibhavo micchāvikappo viparītābhiniveso kāyadaḷhibahulatā asaṃvegasīlatā
atk-s0512a0:2017_7: Saṅkhepato ye vā pana dhamme āsevato anuppannā paññā nuppajjati,
atk-s0512a0:2017_9: Iti imāni sammohakāraṇāni parivajjentena bāhusacce jhānādīsu ca yogo karaṇīyo.
atk-s0512a0:2018_1: pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanāni aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo cattāri saccāni bāvīsatindriyāni dvādasapadiko paṭiccasamuppādo
atk-s0512a0:2018_5: iti evaṃ pakāraṃ sakalameva sutavisayaṃ upāyakosallapubbaṅgamāya paññāya satiyā vīriyena ca sādhukaṃ
atk-s0512a0:2018_6: uggahaṇasavanadhāraṇaparicayaparipucchāhi ogāhetvā tattha ca paresaṃ patiṭṭhāpanena sutamayā paññā nibbattetabbā.
atk-s0512a0:2019_0: Tathā sattānaṃ itikattabbatāsu ṭhānuppattikapaṭibhānabhūtā āyāpāyaupāyakosallabhūtā ca paññā hitesitaṃ nissāya tattha tattha yathārahaṃ pavattetabbā.
atk-s0512a0:2019_1: Tathā khandhādīnaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ ākāraparivitakkanamukhena te nijjhānaṃ khamāpentena cintāmayā paññā nibbattetabbā.
atk-s0512a0:2019_2: Khandhādīnaṃyeva pana salakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇapariggahaṇavasena lokiyapariññā nibbattentena pubbabhāgabhāvanāpaññā sampādetabbā.
atk-s0512a0:2019_3: Evañhi nāmarūpamattamidaṃ yathārahaṃ paccayehi uppajjati ceva nirujjhati ca,
atk-s0512a0:2019_4: na ettha koci kattā vā kāretā vā,
atk-s0512a0:2019_7: avasavattanaṭṭhena anattāti ajjhattikadhamme bāhirakadhamme ca nibbisesaṃ parijānanto tattha āsaṅgaṃ
atk-s0512a0:2019_8: pajahanto pare ca tattha taṃ jahāpento kevalaṃ karuṇāvaseneva yāva na buddhaguṇā hatthatalaṃ āgacchanti,
atk-s0512a0:2019_9: tāva yānattaye satte avatāraṇaparipācanehi patiṭṭhapento jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattiyo abhiññāyo ca
atk-s0512a0:2019_10: lokiyā vasībhāvaṃ pāpento paññāya matthakaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0512a0:2020_0: Tattha yā imā iddhividhañāṇaṃ dibbasotadhātuñāṇaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ
atk-s0512a0:2020_3: ñāṇaparicayaṃ katvā sīlavisuddhicittavisuddhīti mūlabhūtāsu imāsu dvīsu visuddhīsu patiṭṭhāya diṭṭhivisuddhikaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhimaggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi-
atk-s0512a0:2020_4: paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiñāṇadassanavisuddhīti sarīrabhūtā imā pañca visuddhiyo sampādentena bhāvetabbā lokiyalokuttarabhedā bhāvanāpaññā,
atk-s0512a0:2020_5: tāsaṃ sampādanavidhānaṃ yasmā “tattha ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotītiādikaṃ iddhivikubbanaṃ kātukāmena ādikammikena
atk-s0512a0:2020_6: yoginā”tiādinā “khandhāti rūpakkhandho vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho”tiādinā
atk-s0512a0:2020_7: ca visayavibhāgena saddhiṃ visuddhimagge sabbākārato vitthāretvā vuttaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:2020_9: Kevalañhi tattha sāvakabodhisattassa vasena paññā āgatā,
atk-s0512a0:2020_10: idha mahābodhisattassa vasena karuṇūpāyakosallapubbaṅgamaṃ katvā vattabbā,
atk-s0512a0:2020_11: ñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ apāpetvā paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiyaṃyeva vipassanā ṭhapetabbāti ayameva viseso.
atk-s0512a0:2021_0: Tathā yasmā sammāsambodhiyā katābhinīhārena mahāsattena pāramiparipūraṇatthaṃ sabbakālaṃ yuttappayuttena bhavitabbaṃ ābaddhaparikaraṇena,
atk-s0512a0:2021_1: tasmā kālena kālaṃ “ko nu kho ajja mayā puññasambhāro ñāṇasambhāro vā upacito,
atk-s0512a0:2021_2: kiṃ vā mayā parahitaṃ kata”nti divase divase paccavekkhantena sattahitatthaṃ ussāho karaṇīyo.
atk-s0512a0:2021_3: Sabbesampi sattānaṃ upakārāya attano pariggahabhūtaṃ vatthu kāye jīvite ca nirapekkhacittena ossajitabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:2021_4: Yaṃ kiñci kammaṃ karoti kāyena vācāya vā,
atk-s0512a0:2021_7: Uḷārehi ittarehi ca kāmehi vinivattacitteneva bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:2022_0: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sattahite āraddhavīriyena bhavitabbaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādisabbasahena avisaṃvādinā.
atk-s0512a0:2022_1: Sabbepi sattā anodhiso mettāya karuṇāya ca pharitabbā.
atk-s0512a0:2022_6: Yañca kiñci kammaṃ karoti kāyena vācāya vā,
atk-s0512a0:2022_8: Iminā hi upāyena dānādīsu yuttappayuttassa thāmavato daḷhaparakkamassa mahāsattassa bodhisattassa aparimeyyo
atk-s0512a0:2022_9: puññasambhāro ñāṇasambhāro ca divase divase upacīyati.
atk-s0512a0:2023_0: Api ca sattānaṃ paribhogatthaṃ paripālanatthañca attano sarīraṃ jīvitañca pariccajitvā khuppipāsāsītuṇhavātātapādidukkhapatikāro
atk-s0512a0:2023_3: tathā ramaṇīyesu ārāmuyyānapāsādataḷākādīsu araññāyatanesu ca kāyacittasantāpābhāvena abhinibbutattā attanā sukhaṃ paṭilabhati,
atk-s0512a0:2023_4: yañca suṇāti buddhānubuddhapaccekabuddhā mahābodhisattā ca nekkhammapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārabhūtaṃ
atk-s0512a0:2024_0: Samāhitabhūmiyaṃ pana patiṭṭhito attanā yathānubhūtaṃ visesādhigamanibbattaṃ pītiṃ passaddhiṃ sukhaṃ
atk-s0512a0:2024_1: samādhiṃ yathābhūtañāṇañca sattesu adhimuccanto upasaṃharati pariṇāmeti.
atk-s0512a0:2024_2: Tathā mahati saṃsāradukkhe tassa ca nimittabhūte kilesābhisaṅkhāradukkhe nimuggaṃ sattanikāyaṃ disvā
atk-s0512a0:2024_3: tatrāpi chedanabhedanaphālanapiṃsanaggisantāpādijanitā dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā nirantaraṃ cirakālaṃ
atk-s0512a0:2024_6: jotimālākulasarīre khuppipāsāvātātapādīhi ḍayhamāne ca visussamāne ca vantakheḷādiāhāre uddhabāhuṃ viravante
atk-s0512a0:2024_8: pariyeṭṭhimūlakaṃ mahantaṃ anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇante hatthacchedādikāraṇāyogena dubbaṇṇaduddasikadaliddādibhāvena
atk-s0512a0:2024_9: khuppipāsādiābādhayogena balavantehi abhibhavanīyato paresaṃ vahanato parādhīnato ca,
atk-s0512a0:2024_13: aggikkhandhe viya anupasantapariḷāhavuttike anupasantanihataparādhīne kāmāvacaradeve ca,
atk-s0512a0:2024_14: mahatā vāyāmena vidūramākāsaṃ vigāhitasakuntā viya balavatā dūre pāṇinā khittasarā viya ca,
atk-s0512a0:2024_15: satipi cirappavattiyaṃ aniccantikatāya pātapariyosānā anatikkantajātijarāmaraṇā evāti rūpārūpāvacaradeve
atk-s0512a0:2024_16: ca passantena mahantaṃ saṃvegaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā mettāya karuṇāya ca anodhiso sattā pharitabbā.
atk-s0512a0:2024_17: Evaṃ kāyena vācāya manasā ca bodhisambhāre nirantaraṃ upacinantena yathā pāramiyo pāripūriṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0512a0:2024_18: evaṃ sakkaccakārinā sātaccakārinā anolīnavuttinā ussāho pavattetabbo,
atk-s0512a0:2025_30: navalokuttarāvakkantīti evamādikā sabbāpi bodhisambhārapaṭipatti vīriyānubhāveneva samijjhatīti abhinīhārato
atk-s0512a0:2025_31: yāva mahābodhi anossajjantena sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ vīriyaṃ yathā uparūpari visesāvahaṃ hoti,
atk-s0512a0:2025_33: Sampajjamāne ca yathāvutte vīriye khantisaccādhiṭṭhānādayo ca dānasīlādayo ca sabbepi bodhisambhārā tadadhīnavuttitāya
atk-s0512a0:2025_34: sampannā eva hontīti khantiādīsupi imināva nayena paṭipatti veditabbā.
atk-s0512a0:2026_0: Iti sattānaṃ sukhūpakaraṇapariccāgena bahudhā anuggahakaraṇaṃ dānena paṭipatti,
atk-s0512a0:2026_9: upekkhāya nesaṃ upakārāpakāresu vikārānāpattīti evaṃ aparimāṇe satte ārabbha anukampitasabbasattassa
atk-s0512a0:2026_10: mahābodhisattassa puthujjanehi asādhāraṇo aparimeyyo puññañāṇasambhārūpacayo ettha paṭipattīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:2027_4: Tattha katābhinīhārassa bodhisattassa parahitakaraṇābhininnāsayapayogassa kaṇhadhammavokiṇṇā sukkadhammā pāramiyo eva,
atk-s0512a0:2028_0: Evaṃ ādimajjhapariyosānesu paṇidhānārambhapariniṭṭhānesu tesaṃ vibhāgoti apare.
atk-s0512a0:2028_2: Lajjāsatimānāpassayānaṃ lokuttaradhammādhipatīnaṃ sīlasamādhipaññāgarukānaṃ tāritataritatārayitūnaṃ anubuddhapaccekabuddhasammāsambuddhānaṃ pāramī,
atk-s0512a0:2029_6: Tathā puttadārādikassa tividhassāpi hetu avītikkamanavasena tisso sīlapāramiyo,
atk-s0512a0:2029_7: tesu eva tividhesu vatthūsu ālayaṃ upacchinditvā nikkhamanavasena tisso nekkhammapāramiyo,
atk-s0512a0:2029_8: upakaraṇaṅgajīvitataṇhaṃ samūhanitvā sattānaṃ hitāhitavinicchayakaraṇavasena tisso paññāpāramiyo.
atk-s0512a0:2029_14: upakaraṇādiupaghātakesupi sattesu mettāya avijahanavasena tisso mettāpāramiyo,
atk-s0512a0:2029_15: yathāvuttavatthuttayassa upakārāpakāresu sattasaṅkhāresu majjhattatāpaṭilābhavasena tisso upekkhāpāramiyoti evamādinā etāsaṃ vibhāgo veditabbāti.
atk-s0512a0:2030_1: Ettha pana yathā etā vibhāgato tiṃsavidhāpi dānapāramiādibhāvato dasavidhā,
atk-s0512a0:2030_5: nīvaraṇavivekabhāve pana jhānapāramiyā kusaladhammabhāve chahipi saṅgahitā.
atk-s0512a0:2031_0: Etesañca dānādīnaṃ channaṃ guṇānaṃ aññamaññasambandhānaṃ pañcadasayugalādīni pañcadasayugalādisādhakāni honti.
atk-s0512a0:2031_21: Evaṃ itarehipi tikehi catukkādīhi ca yathāsambhavaṃ tikāni ca catukkādīni ca yojetabbāni.
atk-s0512a0:2032_0: Evaṃ chabbidhānampi pana imāsaṃ pāramīnaṃ catūhi adhiṭṭhānehi saṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-s0512a0:2032_14: Tattha avisesato tāva lokuttaraguṇe katābhinīhārassa anukampitasabbasattassa mahāsattassa paṭiññānurūpaṃ sabbapāramipariggahato saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:2033_0: Visesato pana yācakajanaṃ avisaṃvādetvā dassāmīti paṭijānanato paṭiññaṃ avisaṃvādetvā dānato dānaṃ avisaṃvādetvā
atk-s0512a0:2033_2: yathārahaṃ yathākālaṃ yathāvidhānañca dānato paññuttarato ca kusaladhammānaṃ caturadhiṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ dānaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:2033_3: Tathā saṃvarasamādānassa avītikkamanato dussīlyapariccāgato duccaritavūpasamanato paññuttarato ca caturadhiṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ sīlaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:2034_10: upasamādhiṭṭhānapariggahitāni saccacāgapaññādhiṭṭhānāni kilesapariḷāhavūpasamanato kāmūpasamanato kāmapariḷāhavūpasamanato ca,
atk-s0512a0:2034_11: paññādhiṭṭhānapariggahitāni saccacāgūpasamādhiṭṭhānāni ñāṇapubbaṅgamato ñāṇānuparivattanato cāti evaṃ
atk-s0512a0:2034_12: sabbāpi pāramiyo saccappabhāvitā cāgaparibyañjitā upasamopabrūhitā paññāparisuddhā.
atk-s0512a0:2034_20: Ādimajjhapariyosānesu paññādhiṭṭhānaṃ tasmiṃ sati sambhavato asati abhāvato yathāpaṭiññañca bhāvato.
atk-s0512a0:2035_0: Tattha mahāpurisā satatamattahitaparahitakarehi garupiyabhāvakarehi saccacāgādhiṭṭhānehi gihibhūtā āmisadānena pare anuggaṇhanti.
atk-s0512a0:2035_1: Tathā attahitaparahitakarehi garupiyabhāvakarehi upasamapaññādhiṭṭhānehi ca pabbajitabhūtā dhammadānena pare anuggaṇhanti.
atk-s0512a0:2036_2: Tatra hi gabbhokkantiṭhitiabhinikkhamanesu paññādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena sato sampajāno saccādhiṭṭhānapāripūriyā
atk-s0512a0:2036_3: sampatijāto uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gantvā sabbā disā oloketvā saccānuparivattinā vacasā –
atk-s0512a0:2037_1: Cāgādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena mahato ñātiparivaṭṭassa hatthagatassa ca cakkavattirajjassa anapekkhapariccāgoti.
atk-s0512a0:2038_0: Dutiye ṭhāne abhisambodhiyaṃ caturadhiṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇanti keci.
atk-s0512a0:2038_1: Tattha hi yathāpaṭiññaṃ saccādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ abhisamayo,
atk-s0512a0:2039_0: Tatiye ṭhāne dhammacakkappavattane caturadhiṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇanti aññe.
atk-s0512a0:2039_1: Tattha hi saccādhiṭṭhānasamudāgatassa dvādasahi ākārehi ariyasaccadesanāya saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:2039_3: Upasamādhiṭṭhānasamudāgatassa sayaṃ upasantassa paresaṃ upasamanena upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:2040_0: Catutthe ṭhāne parinibbāne caturadhiṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇanti apare.
atk-s0512a0:2040_1: Tatra hi parinibbutattā paramatthasaccasampattiyā saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:2040_5: Tatra mahāpurisassa visesena mettākhette abhijātiyaṃ saccādhiṭṭhānasamudāgatassa saccādhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇamabhibyattaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:2040_8: visesena upekkhākhette parinibbāne upasamādhiṭṭhānasamudāgatassa upasamādhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇamabhibyattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:2041_5: Tathā saccādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena dosāgatiṃ na gacchati avisaṃvādanato.
atk-s0512a0:2041_8: Paññādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena mohāgatiṃ na gacchati yathā bhūtāvabodhato.
atk-s0512a0:2042_12: Karuṇāpaññāpariggahitā hi dānādiguṇā mahābodhisambhārā bhavanti buddhattasiddhipariyosānāti.
atk-s0512a0:2043_1: Sakalassāpi puññādisambhārassa sammāsambodhiṃ uddissa anavasesasambharaṇaṃ avekallakāritāyogena,
atk-s0512a0:2043_5: Taṃ panassa kālaparimāṇaṃ parato āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0512a0:2043_7: Tathā mahāsattena bodhāya paṭipajjantena sammāsambodhāya buddhānaṃ puretarameva attā niyyātetabbo –
atk-s0512a0:2043_12: tesaṃ pana dinnāvasesaṃ eva mayā paribhuñjitabba”nti.
atk-s0512a0:2044_0: Evaṃ hissa sammadeva pariccāgāya kate cittābhisaṅkhāre yaṃ uppajjati pariggahavatthu aviññāṇakaṃ saviññāṇakaṃ vā,
atk-s0512a0:2044_1: tattha ye ime pubbe dāne akataparicayo,
atk-s0512a0:2044_5: tesu yadā mahābodhisattassa saṃvijjamānesu deyyadhammesu paccupaṭṭhite ca yācakajane dāne cittaṃ na pakkhandati na kamati.
atk-s0512a0:2044_6: Tena niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ “addhāhaṃ dāne pubbe akataparicayo,
atk-s0512a0:2044_7: tena me etarahi dātukamyatā citte na saṇṭhātī”ti.
atk-s0512a0:2044_8: So evaṃ me ito paraṃ dānābhirataṃ cittaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0512a0:2044_10: nanu mayā paṭikacceva pariggahavatthu yācakānaṃ pariccattanti dānaṃ deti muttacāgo payatapāṇī vosaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato.
atk-s0512a0:2044_11: Evaṃ mahāsattassa paṭhamo dānavinibandho hato hoti vihato samucchinno.
atk-s0512a0:2045_0: Tathā mahāsatto deyyadhammassa parittabhāve sati vekalle ca iti paṭisañcikkhati –
atk-s0512a0:2045_1: “ahaṃ kho pubbe adānasīlatāya etarahi evaṃ paccayavikalo jāto,
atk-s0512a0:2045_2: tasmā idāni mayā parittena vā hīnena vā yathāladdhena deyyadhammena attānaṃ pīḷetvāpi dānameva dātabbaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:2045_4: So itarītarena taṃ dānaṃ deti muttacāgo payatapāṇī vosaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato.
atk-s0512a0:2045_5: Evaṃ mahāsattassa dutiyo dānavinibandho hato hoti vihato samucchinno.
atk-s0512a0:2046_0: Tathā mahāsatto deyyadhammassa uḷāramanuññatāya adātukamyatācitte uppajjamāne iti paṭisañcikkhati –
atk-s0512a0:2046_1: “nanu tayā sappurisa uḷāratamā sabbaseṭṭhā sammāsambodhi abhipatthitā,
atk-s0512a0:2046_2: tasmā tadatthaṃ tayā uḷāramanuññe eva deyyadhamme dātuṃ yuttarūpa”nti.
atk-s0512a0:2046_3: So uḷāraṃ manuññañca deti muttacāgo payatapāṇī vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato.
atk-s0512a0:2046_4: Evaṃ mahāpurisassa tatiyo dānavinibandho hato hoti vihato samucchinno.
atk-s0512a0:2047_0: Tathā mahāsatto dānaṃ dento yadā deyyadhammassa parikkhayaṃ passati,
atk-s0512a0:2047_4: Api ca me pubbe tādisassa dānassa akatattā evaṃ bhogānaṃ parikkhayo dissati,
atk-s0512a0:2047_5: handāhaṃ yathāladdhena deyyadhammena parittena vā vipulena vā dānameva dadeyyaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:2047_7: So yathāladdhena dānaṃ deti muttacāgo payatapāṇī vosaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato.
atk-s0512a0:2047_8: Evaṃ mahāsattassa catuttho dānavinibandho hato hoti vihato samucchinno.
atk-s0512a0:2047_9: Evaṃ ye ye dānapāramiyā vinibandhabhūtā anatthā,
atk-s0512a0:2047_10: tesaṃ tesaṃ yathārahaṃ paccavekkhitvā paṭivinodanaṃ upāyo.
atk-s0512a0:2048_0: Api ca yaṃ mahāsattassa buddhānaṃ attasanniyyātanaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:2048_2: Buddhānañhi attānaṃ niyyātetvā ṭhito mahāpuriso tattha tattha bodhisambhārapāripūriyā ghaṭento vāyamanto
atk-s0512a0:2048_3: sarīrassa sukhūpakaraṇānañca upacchedakesu dussahesupi kicchesu durabhisambhavesupi sattasaṅkhārasamupanītesu
atk-s0512a0:2048_4: anatthesu tibbesu pāṇaharesu “ayaṃ mayā attabhāvo buddhānaṃ pariccatto,
atk-s0512a0:2048_5: yaṃ vā taṃ vā ettha hotū”ti taṃnimittaṃ na kampati na vedhati,
atk-s0512a0:2049_0: Api ca samāsato katābhinīhārassa attani sinehassa parisosanaṃ paresu ca sinehassa parivaḍḍhanaṃ etāsaṃ sampādanūpāyo.
atk-s0512a0:2049_1: Sammāsambodhisamadhigamāya hi katamahāpaṇidhānassa mahāsattassa yāthāvato parijānanena sabbesu dhammesu
atk-s0512a0:2049_2: anupalittassa attani sineho parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0512a0:2049_3: mahākaruṇāsamāsevanena pana piyaputte viya sabbasatte sampassamānassa tesu mettākaruṇāsineho parivaḍḍhati,
atk-s0512a0:2049_6: accantaṃ janassa saṅgahakaraṇena upari yānattaye avatāraṇaṃ paripācanañca karoti.
atk-s0512a0:2050_0: Mahāsattānañhi mahākaruṇā mahāpaññā ca dānena alaṅkatā,
atk-s0512a0:2050_4: Tesaṃ sabbepi satte attanā nibbisese katvā bodhisambhāresu paṭipajjantānaṃ sabbattha samānasukhadukkhatāya samānattatāya siddhi.
atk-s0512a0:2050_5: Buddhabhūtānampi ca teheva catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi caturadhiṭṭhānaparipūritābhivuddhehi janassa accantikasaṅgahakaraṇena abhivinayanaṃ sijjhati.
atk-s0512a0:2054_0: Nirapekkho ca sabbattha, aho acchariyo jino.
atk-s0512a0:2056_0: Sadā sattahite yutto, aho acchariyo jino.
atk-s0512a0:2058_0: Uyyutto akilāsū ca, aho acchariyo jino”ti.
atk-s0512a0:2059_1: Heṭṭhimena tāva paricchedena cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni mahākappānaṃ satasahassañca,
atk-s0512a0:2059_3: uparimena pana soḷasa asaṅkhyeyyāni mahākappānaṃ satasahassañca.
atk-s0512a0:2059_4: Ete ca bhedā yathākkamaṃ paññādhikasaddhādhikavīriyādhikavasena ñātabbā.
atk-s0512a0:2059_5: Paññādhikānañhi saddhā mandā hoti paññā tikkhā,
atk-s0512a0:2059_8: paññānubhāvena ca sammāsambodhi adhigantabbāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:2060_0: Apare pana “vīriyassa tikkhamajjhimamudubhāvena bodhisattānaṃ ayaṃ kālavibhāgo”ti vadanti.
atk-s0512a0:2060_1: Avisesena pana vimuttiparipācanīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ tikkhamajjhimamudubhāvena yathāvuttakālabhedena bodhisambhārā
atk-s0512a0:2060_2: tesaṃ pāripūriṃ gacchantīti tayopete kālabhedā yuttātipi vadanti.
atk-s0512a0:2060_3: Evaṃ tividhā hi bodhisattā abhinīhārakkhaṇe bhavanti ugghahaṭitaññūvipañcitaññūneyyabhedena.
atk-s0512a0:2060_5: so sammāsambuddhassa sammukhā catuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ suṇanto gāthāya tatiyapade apariyosite eva chahi abhiññāhi
atk-s0512a0:2060_6: saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ adhigantuṃ samatthūpanissayo hoti,
atk-s0512a0:2061_0: Dutiyo bhagavato sammukhā catuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ suṇanto apariyosite eva gāthāya catutthapade chahi abhiññāhi
atk-s0512a0:2062_0: Itaro pana bhagavato sammukhā catuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā pariyositāya gāthāya chahi abhiññāhi arahattaṃ pattuṃ samatthūpanissayo hoti.
atk-s0512a0:2063_0: Tayopete vinā kālabhedena katābhinīhāro buddhānaṃ santike laddhabyākaraṇā ca anukkamena pāramiyo paripūrentā
atk-s0512a0:2063_2: Tesu tesu pana kālabhedesu aparipuṇṇesu te te mahāsattā divase divase vessantaradānasadisaṃ mahādānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:2063_3: dentāpi tadanurūpe sīlādisabbapāramidhamme ācinantāpi pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajantāpi ñātatthacariyā
atk-s0512a0:2063_4: lokatthacariyā buddhatthacariyā paramakoṭiṃ pāpentāpi antarā ca sammāsambuddhā bhavissantīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Kasmā?
atk-s0512a0:2063_6: Paricchinnakālanipphāditaṃ viya hi sassaṃ yathāvuttakālaparicchedena parinipphāditā sammāsambodhi tadanantarā
atk-s0512a0:2063_7: sabbussāhena vāyamantenāpi na sakkā adhigantunti pāramipāripūri yathāvuttakālavisesena sampajjatīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:2064_0: Ko ānisaṃsoti? Ye te katābhinīhārānaṃ bodhisattānaṃ –
atk-s0512a0:2070_0: Jāyamānā manussesu, jaccandhā na bhavanti te.
atk-s0512a0:2080_2: bodhisatto tusitā kāyā cavitvā mātukucchiṃ okkamatī”tiādinā soḷasa acchariyabbhutadhammappakārā,
atk-s0512a0:2080_6: bodhisatte ayaṃ dasasahassī lokadhātu saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhatī”tiādinā ca dvattiṃsa pubbanimittappakārā,
atk-s0512a0:2080_7: ye vā panaññepi bodhisattānaṃ adhippāyasamijjhanaṃ kammādīsu vasībhāvoti evamādayo tattha tattha jātakabuddhavaṃsādīsu dassitākārā ānisaṃsā,
atk-s0512a0:2081_0: Api ca yasmā bodhisatto abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya sabbasattānaṃ pitusamo hoti hitesitāya,
atk-s0512a0:2081_1: dakkhiṇeyyako garu bhāvanīyo paramañca puññakkhettaṃ hoti guṇavisesayogena.
atk-s0512a0:2081_7: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ uḷārena vaṇṇena uḷārena yasena uḷārena sukhena uḷārena balena uḷārena ādhipateyyena aññe satte abhibhavati puññavisesayogato.
atk-s0512a0:2082_16: tattha sattānaṃ bhayādayo upaddavā yebhuyyena anuppannā nuppajjanti,
atk-s0512a0:2082_19: na tattha pacurajano viya dukkhena adhimattaṃ pīḷīyati,
atk-s0512a0:2082_21: Tasmā mahāpurisassa yathārahaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave labbhamānā ete sattānaṃ pitusamatādakkhiṇeyyatādayo guṇavisesā ānisaṃsāti veditabbā.
atk-s0512a0:2083_0: Tathā āyusampadā rūpasampadā kulasampadā issariyasampadā ādeyyavacanatā mahānubhāvatāti etepi mahāpurisassa pāramīnaṃ ānisaṃsāti veditabbā.
atk-s0512a0:2083_1: Tattha āyusampadā nāma tassaṃ tassaṃ upapattiyaṃ dīghāyukatā ciraṭṭhitikatā,
atk-s0512a0:2083_5: tāya rūpappamāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ pasādāvaho hoti sambhāvanīyo.
atk-s0512a0:2083_9: Issariyasampadā nāma mahāvibhavatā mahesakkhatā mahāparivāratā ca,
atk-s0512a0:2084_5: sayameva pana pare aññadatthu abhibhavati dhammena samena yathābhūtaguṇehi ca,
atk-s0512a0:2084_7: sayañca aparimāṇassa puññasambhārassa parivuḍḍhihetubhūtā yānattaye sattānaṃ avatāraṇassa paripācanassa ca kāraṇabhūtāti veditabbā.
atk-s0512a0:2085_5: Yāvatā pana buddhaguṇā ye anekehipi kappehi sammāsambuddhenāpi vācāya pariyosāpetuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0512a0:2086_0: “Buddhopi buddhassa bhaṇeyya vaṇṇaṃ, kappampi ce aññamabhāsamāno;
atk-s0512a0:2087_0: Khīyetha kappo ciradīghamantare, vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassā”ti. ;
atk-s0512a0:2089_0: Yaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ “datvā dātabbakaṃ dāna”ntiādinā sabbāpi pāramī ekajjhaṃ dassetvā parato “kosajjaṃ bhayato
atk-s0512a0:2089_2: taṃ yehi vīriyārambhamettābhāvanā appamādavihārehi yathāvuttā buddhakārakadhammā visadabhāvaṃ gatā sammāsambodhisaṅkhātā
atk-s0512a0:2090_1: vīriyārambhañca khematoti iminā paṭipakkhe ādīnavadassanamukhena vīriyārambhe ānisaṃsaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0512a0:2093_1: Vitthārato pana sakalena buddhavacanena pakāsitā sabbāpi sampattiyo ekanteneva sammappadhānādhīnā,
atk-s0512a0:2093_2: tasmā bhagavā vīriyārambhe niyojetvā “esā buddhānusāsanī”ti āha.
atk-s0512a0:2094_1: yvāyaṃ sabbasaṃkilesamūlabhāvato sabbānatthavidhāyakanti kosajjaṃ bhayato tappaṭipakkhato catūhi yogehi
atk-s0512a0:2094_2: anupaddavabhāvasādhanato vīriyārambhañca khemato disvā adhisīlasikkhādisampādanavasena vīriyassa ārambho
atk-s0512a0:2094_6: esā buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ anusāsanī anusiṭṭhi ovādoti.
atk-s0512a0:2095_5: Atha vā avivādanti avivādahetubhūtaṃ chabbidhaṃ sāraṇīyadhammaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:2095_7: kāyena ceva cittena ca sahitā aviramitā aviyuttāti attho.
atk-s0512a0:2095_10: Esā buddhānusāsanīti ettha sabbena sabbaṃ vivādamanupagamma yadidaṃ chasāraṇīyadhammaparipūraṇavasena samaggavāse niyojanaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:2095_12: Samaggavāsañhi vasamānā sīladiṭṭhisāmaññagatā avivadamānā sukheneva tisso sikkhā paripūressantīti satthā
atk-s0512a0:2096_1: kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pamussanaṃ akusalesu ca dhammesu cittavossaggaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:2096_4: kāyaduccarite vā vacīduccarite vā manoduccarite vā pañcasu vā kāmaguṇesu cittassa vosaggo vosaggānuppadānaṃ
atk-s0512a0:2097_2: Atthato hi appamādo nāma satiyā avippavāso,
atk-s0512a0:2097_3: “satiyā avippavāso”ti ca niccaṃ upaṭṭhitāya satiyā evetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:2097_4: Apare pana “satisampajaññappadhānā tathā pavattā cattāro arūpino khandhā appamādo”ti vadanti.
atk-s0512a0:2097_5: Yasmā pana appamādabhāvanā nāma visuṃ ekā bhāvanā natthi.
atk-s0512a0:2098_0: Visesato pana vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ kāyikavācasikasaṃvarañca upādāya sabbā sīlabhāvanā,
atk-s0512a0:2098_6: “Appamādo”ti hi idaṃ padaṃ mahantaṃ atthaṃ dīpeti,
atk-s0512a0:2098_8: sakalampi tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ āharitvā appamādapadassa atthaṃ katvā kathento dhammakathiko “atitthena pakkhando”ti na vattabbo. Kasmā?
atk-s0512a0:2098_10: Tathā hi sammāsambuddho kusinārāyaṃ yamakasālānamantare parinibbānasamaye nipanno abhisambodhito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0512a0:2098_11: pañcacattālīsāya vassesu attanā bhāsitaṃ dhammaṃ ekeneva padena saṅgahetvā dassento “appamādena sampādethā”ti
atk-s0512a0:2098_24: Tattha appamādabhāvanaṃ sikhāppattaṃ dassento satthā “bhāvethaṭṭhaṅgikaṃ magga”nti āha.
atk-s0512a0:2099_1: yo esa sīlādikhandhattayasaṅgaho sammādiṭṭhipubbaṅgamo sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃyeva aṭṭhannaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena aṭṭhaṅgiko ariyamaggo,
atk-s0512a0:2099_3: Dassanamaggamatte aṭhatvā upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ uppādanavasena vaḍḍhetha,
atk-s0512a0:2099_5: Esā buddhānusāsanīti yadidaṃ kusalesu dhammesu appamajjanaṃ,
atk-s0512a0:2099_6: tañca ussukkāpetvā ariyamaggassa bhāvanā esā buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ anusiṭṭhi ovādoti.
atk-s0512a0:2100_1: Itthaṃ sudantiādīsu itthanti kappe ca satasahassetiādinā pakārena.
atk-s0512a0:2100_4: Attano pubbacariyanti purimāsu akittipaṇḍitādijātīsu attano paṭipattidukkarakiriyaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:2100_5: Sambhāvayamānoti hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya sammadeva pakāsento.
atk-s0512a0:2100_6: Buddhāpadāniyaṃ nāmāti buddhānaṃ purātanakammaṃ porāṇaṃ dukkarakiriyaṃ adhikicca pavattattā desitattā buddhāpadāniyanti evaṃnāmakaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:2100_10: taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthattā ca na vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a0:2115_0: Iti taṃ saṅkharontena, yaṃ taṃ adhigataṃ mayā;
atk-s0512a0:2120_0: Tasmiṃ sagāravā niccaṃ, hontu sabbepi pāṇino.
